Name: PrevUKPRN_01
ErrorMessage: The UKPRN is not valid
Intent: To correct errors in the learners previous UKPRN
Guidance: Shows an invalid previous UKPRN in the learner record, this code will need to be amended to the correct UKPRN or removed from the learner record
Description: Shows an invalid previous UKPRN in the learner record
DetailedDescription:
If returned,  the UKPRN in previous year (

Learner.PrevUKPRN


 is known) must be a valid lookup on the UKPRN table

(error where <> valid lookup on the Org_PartnerUKPRN table)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: Inconsistent UKPRN
ErrorMessage: The UKPRN in the file name does not match the provider's UKPRN in the Submit Learner Data service
Intent: To ensure that files are submitted to the correct account by matching the submitted and service-held UKPRNs
Guidance: This rule triggers directly on upload to Submit learner data and is not included in your Rule violation report. Please ensure that the UKPRN in your file (or MIS application) matches the UKPRN of your Submit Learner Data account.  SLD service will compare that on the submitted file and error where they do not match.
Description: Creates an error if the Provider UKPRN in the SLD service does not match that on the submitted file
DetailedDescription: This rule only runs in Submit Learner Data upon the submission of a file and creates an error if the Provider UKPRN in the SLD service does not match that on the submitted file

Name: Namespace Mismatch
ErrorMessage: ILR submissions must use the correct namespace
Intent: To ensure that files are submitted to the correct account by matching the submitted and service-held file Namespaces
Guidance: This rule triggers directly on upload to Submit learner data and is not included in your Rule violation report. Please ensure that the Namespace in your file submission matches the UKPRN of your Submit Learner Data account.  SLD service will compare that on the submitted file and error where they do not match.
DetailedDescription: This rule runs in FIS and the Submit Learner Data service upon the submission of a file and creates an error where the namespace of the file does not match that of the schema.

Name: Protected ZIP file
ErrorMessage: ZIP file is password protected and cannot be processed
Intent: To ensure that files are submitted in the correct format and only encrypted to the specifications given in the ILR specification
Guidance: This rule triggers directly on upload to Submit learner data and is not included in your Rule violation report. Please ensure that your file submission is not password protected.  SLD service will error where the file submission is password protected.
Description: This rule creates an error where the submitted file is password protected
DetailedDescription: This rule runs in FIS and through Submit Learner Data upon the submission of a ZIP file and creates an error where the file is password protected

Name: ZIP_CORRUPT
ErrorMessage: Zip folder is corrupt or invalid
Intent: To ensure that files are submitted in the correct format
Guidance: This rule triggers directly on upload to Submit learner data and is not included in your Rule violation report. Ensure that your file submission is in the correct format. This may mean that the file is in a previous year format and will error in the SLD service.
DetailedDescription: This rule runs in FIS and Submit Learner Data upon the submission of a ZIP file and fails where the file is corrupt or invalid.
Exclusions: None

Name: ZIP_EMPTY
ErrorMessage: Zip folder must contain only one XML file
Intent: To ensure that files are submitted in the correct format and that only one file is included in a single submission
Guidance: This rule triggers directly on upload to Submit learner data and is not included in your Rule violation report. Please ensure that your file submission ZIP folder only contains only one file. This error will trigger where there is more than one file in the ZIP folder, or where the folder is empty.
DetailedDescription: This rule runs in FIS and Submit Learner Data upon the submission of a ZIP folder and fails when the folder is empty or it contains more than one xml file.

Name: ZIP_INCONSISTENT_FILENAME
ErrorMessage: Zip filename does not match the xml filename
Intent: To ensure that when a ZIP folder is submitted to the service, the XML file within it has the same filename as the ZIP folder.
Guidance: This rule triggers directly on upload to Submit learner data and is not included in your Rule violation report. Please ensure that your file submission ZIP folder and the XML file within it both have the same filename (extension excluded).
DetailedDescription: This rule runs in FIS and Submit Learner Data upon the submission of a ZIP file and triggers when the filename of the xml file does not match the filename of the ZIP file (extension excluded).

Name: Header_3
ErrorMessage: The UKPRN in the filename does not match the UKPRN in the Header
Intent: This rule ensures that the UKPRN in the filename matches the organisation which has submitted the data
Guidance: Ensure that the UKPRN recorded in the exported XML file matches the UKPRN in the Submit Learner Data platform
DetailedDescription: UKPRN must be same as in filename

Name: Header_2
ErrorMessage: The file preparation date is after today's date
Intent: This rule ensures that the data of the submitted file is not in the future, ILR files must be exported and then submitted to ensure that the data is correct.
Guidance: Export a new ILR file from your MIS system and then upload that file to the Submit Learner Data platform
DetailedDescription: File preparation date must be on or before today's date

Name: Filename_7
ErrorMessage: The file date/time is after today's date/time
Intent: This rule ensures that the file submitted to the SLD platform has the same date as the date of upload, this is to ensure that correct files are submitted and there is no risk of incorrect data overwriting previous files.
Guidance: Export a new file from the MIS system and upload it to the SLD platform
DetailedDescription: The file date/time must be on or before today's date/time

Name: Filename_6
ErrorMessage: The serial number must not be 00
Intent: This is to ensure the serial number is in the mandatory format
Guidance: Ensure that the filename is correct in your MIS system
DetailedDescription: Serial number must not be 00

Name: Filename_8
ErrorMessage: The date/time of the file is earlier than a previous transmission for this collection
Intent: To ensure that the uploaded file contains the most up to date data and does not duplicate an earlier upload
Guidance: Ensure that you export a new file from your MIS application for each SLD upload, so that the date/time of the file is greater than previous UKPRN and collection year uploads
DetailedDescription: The date/time of the file must be greater than previous transmission with the same UKPRN and collection year

Name: Filename_4
ErrorMessage: The year of collection is not the current year
Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR file submitted is correct for the relevant return to ensure that previous years files cannot be uploaded to the active year.
Guidance: Ensure that the correct file is exported from the MIS system for the relevant year and upload it to the SLD platform.
DetailedDescription: Year of collection must be current year

Name: Entity_1
ErrorMessage: There are no valid learners in the the Learner record
Intent: To ensure that when a File is submitted to the service, there is at least one learner record in the file.
Guidance: This rule triggers directly on upload to Submit learner data and is not included in your Rule violation report. Please ensure that your file submission to Submit Learner Data has at least one learner record in the file.
DetailedDescription: There must be at least one learner record in the Learner record space in your uploaded file
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: Filename_5
ErrorMessage: The serial number is not a 2 digit number
Intent: This rule ensures that the file serial number is a 2 digit number
Guidance: Check that the file upload serial number is a 2 digit number
DetailedDescription: Serial number must be 2 digit numeric (starts at 01)

Name: Filename_2
ErrorMessage: A file with the same UKPRN, collection year and date/time combination has been received before
Intent: This rule ensures that duplicate files are not submitted to the SLD platform
Guidance: Export a new file with a new date and time stamp from your MIS system and then re-submit that file to the SLD platform
DetailedDescription: A file with the same UKPRN, collection year and date/time combination must not have been received before

Name: Filename_1
ErrorMessage: The filename is not in the correct format
Intent: This rule ensures that the exported XML file is in the correct and so the file will be excepted by the SLD platform
Guidance: To clear this error you will need to export a new file from your MIS system ensuring the filename is in the following format  ILR-LLLLLLLL-YYYY-yyyymmdd-hhmmss-NN.XML
DetailedDescription: Filename must be in the correct format of ILR-LLLLLLLL-YYYY-yyyymmdd-hhmmss-NN.XML

Name: UKPRN_06
ErrorMessage: There is no Adult skills funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of the Adult skills fund provision associated with the file upload.
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed contract in your MyESF service. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learning aim is Adult education funded (FM = 35) there must be an active contract relationship in FCT for this UKPRN, to fund this provision
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is Adult skills funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35) there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ASFC-ASCL2526, STFIG2526, ASFC-FCFJ2526)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07 = Y), (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 357, 
OLASS - Offender in Custody (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 034'), where the 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is known and in the previous teaching year,
combined authorities (DD35 =Y),
19-24 Traineeships - 2020 procurement (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 377),
Procured Adult Education Budget 2021 (AEB) (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 379)
Procured Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB) (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 388
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Funding stream codes updated

Name: UKPRN_10
ErrorMessage: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of the Apprenticeships provision associated with the file upload
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed apprenticeships contract in your MyESF service. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learning aim is an apprenticeship (ACT = 1 and FM = 36) started on or after 1 May 2017, there must be an active contract relationship in FCT, for this UKPRN, to fund this provision
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is an apprenticeship (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1) and (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36) started on or after 1 May 2017 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2017-05-01), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = LEVY1799 or NONLEVY2019)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered when 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not null and in the previous teaching year
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: UKPRN_08
ErrorMessage: There is no Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of the Advanced learner loans provision associated with the file upload.
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed contract for Advanced learner loans in your MyESF service. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learner is in receipt of Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding (FAM Type = ALB), there must be an active contract relationship in FCT, for this UKPRN, to fund this provision
DetailedDescription:
If the learner is in receipt of Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = ALB), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT for this 

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 where ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ALLB2526, ALLBC2526)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered where the 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is known and in the previous teaching year
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The funding stream period code has been updated

Name: UKPRN_09
ErrorMessage: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of apprenticeships provision associated with the file upload
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed contract for apprenticeships in your MyESF service. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learning aim is part of an apprenticeship (DD07 = Y), there must be an active contract relationship in FCT, for this UKPRN, to fund this provision
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is a apprenticeship (DD07 = Y), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = APPS2526)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered on OLASS learning aims (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 034), or apprenticeship levy funded aims (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36), or when 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDat


e is not null and in the previous teaching year, or 
the aim is a Non-apprenticeship Sporting Excellence Award (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 353), or
or Non-apprenticeship Sea Fishing (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 355), or 
a non funded learning aim (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The funding stream period code has been updated

Name: UKPRN_11
ErrorMessage: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of the Apprenticeships provision associated with the file upload.
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed apprenticeships contract in your MyESF service. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learning aim is a non levy apprenticeship (ACT = 2 and FM = 36) started on or after 1 May 2017, there must be an active contract relationship in FCT, for this UKPRN, to fund this provision.
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is a non-levy apprenticeship (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 2) and (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36), started on or after 1 May 2017 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2017-05-01), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = APPS2526, 16-18NLAP2018 or ANLAP2018 )
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered when 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not null and in the previous teaching year
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The funding stream period codes have been updated

Name: UKPRN_12
ErrorMessage: There is no Adult skills funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of the Adult skills provision associated with the file upload
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed Adult skills contract in your MyESF service. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learning aim starting on or after 1st November 2017 and is identified as procured Adult Education Budget (AEB), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim starting on or after 1st November 2017 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2017-11-01) and is identified as procured Adult Education Budget (AEB) (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 357), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = AEB-19TRN2021, AEB-AS2021, STFI2021)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered when 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not null and in the previous teaching year
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: UKPRN_13
ErrorMessage: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of the Apprenticeships provision associated with the file upload.
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed Apprenticeships contract in your MyESF service. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learning aim starting on or after 1st January 2018 and is identified as procured non levy apprenticeships (ACT 2) programme (ZPROG aim), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim starting on or after 1st January 2018 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2018-01-01) and is identified as procured non levy apprenticeships (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 2) and
(

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1)  there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = 16-18NLAP2018, ANLAP2018)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by LDM 358 (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 358) and by restarts (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1), or (when 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not null and in the previous teaching year)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: UKPRN_14
ErrorMessage: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of the Apprenticeships provision associated with the file upload.
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed Apprenticeships contract in your MyESF service. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learning aim is identified as a non procured non levy apprenticeships (ACT 2) programme (ZPROG aim), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is identified as non procured non levy apprenticeships (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 358) and
(

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 2), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = APPS2526)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered when 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not null and in the previous teaching year
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The funding stream period code has been updated

Name: PMUKPRN_01
ErrorMessage: The UKPRN is not valid
Intent: To correct errors in the learners pre-merger UKPRN
Guidance: Shows an invalid pre-merger UKPRN in the learner record, this code will need to be amended to the correct UKPRN or removed from the learner record
Description: Shows an invalid previous UKPRN in the learner record
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Pre-merger UKPRN (

Learner.PMUKPRN


 is known) must be a valid lookup on the UKPRN table.

(error where <> valid lookup on the Org_PartnerUKPRN table)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: UKPRN_16
ErrorMessage: This learning aim cannot be started after the Stop New Starts date for this funding relationship
Intent: To ensure that there are no new starts under the delivery contract once a 'Stop New Starts' order has been placed on it.
Guidance: Where a 'Stop New Starts' order has been placed on the contract for delivery, no new starts can be returned until this order has been removed from the contract.
Description: If the learning aim is identified as procured non levy (ACT = 2 and FM = 36)  there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN, but the aim cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date.
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is identified as procured non levy (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 2) and (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) and (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36)  there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN and ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = 16-18NLAP2018, ANLAP2018), it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date in FCT (ContractAllocation.StartDate)

(error where ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate is not null and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate of the latest ContractAllocation.StartDate in FCT)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by Restarts (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: UKPRN_18
ErrorMessage: This learning aim cannot be started after the Stop New Starts date for this funding relationship
Intent: To ensure that there are no new starts under the delivery contract once a 'Stop New Starts' order has been placed on it.
Guidance: Where a 'Stop New Starts' order has been placed on the contract for delivery, no new starts can be returned until this order has been removed from the contract.
Description: If the learning aim is identified as Agency education budget - including traineeships (FM = 35 and SOF = 105) where there is a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN, it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is identified as Agency funded adult skills - including traineeships (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


  = 105) where there is a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN and where ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ASFC-ASCL2526, STFIG2526, ASFC-FCFJ2526, it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date in FCT (ContractAllocation.StartDate)

(error where ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate is not null and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate of the latest ContractAllocation.StartDate in FCT)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by Procured Adult Education Budget (AEB)


LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


  = 357,


LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The funding stream period code has been updated

Name: CampID_01
ErrorMessage: The Campus identifier is not valid
Intent: To identify that a Campus identifier is valid
Guidance: Where a Campus identifier is returned, you must ensure that it is a valid code in the Campus identifier table
Description: Where a Campus identifier is returned, must be a valid lookup on the Campus identifier table
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Campus identifier (

Learner.CampId


 is known) must be a valid lookup on the Campus identifier table

(error where  <> valid lookup on the CampId table)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: UKPRN_15
ErrorMessage: There is no apprenticeship funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of the Apprenticeships provision associated with the file upload.
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed Apprenticeships contract in your MyESF service. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learning aim is identified as non procured non levy apprenticeships programme (ACT = 2), there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is identified as non procured non levy apprenticeships (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 358) and
(

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 2), there must not be a funding relationship in FCT for a procured non levy contract (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = 16-18NLAP2018 or ANLAP2018)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered when 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not null and in the previous teaching year
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: UKPRN_23
ErrorMessage: There is no Adult skills funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of the Adult skills provision associated with the file upload.
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed Adult skills contract in your MyESF service. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learning aim is identified as Adult skills (FM = 35 and SOF = 105 and LDM = 379) starting on or after 1st August 2021 there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim starting on or after 1st August 2021 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2021-08-01) and is identified as procured Adult Education Budget 2021 (AEB), (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 379) and the learning aim is Adult skills funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 105) there must be a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


= ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN)

(error where there is no funding relationship in FCT ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = AEB-AS2324, AEB-NSF2324)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered when 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not null and in the previous teaching year
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: UKPRN_19
ErrorMessage: This learning aim cannot be started after the Stop New Starts date for this funding relationship
Intent: To ensure that there are no new starts under the delivery contract once a 'Stop New Starts' order has been placed on it.
Guidance: Where a 'Stop New Starts' order has been placed on the contract for delivery, no new starts can be returned until this order has been removed from the contract.
Description: If the learning aim is identified as Adult education budget (FM = 35 and SOF = 105 and LDM = 357) where there is a funding relationship in FCT for this UKPRN, it cannot be started on or after the Stop New Starts date of the latest contract start date.
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is identified as procured Adult Education Budget (AEB) ((

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 105) and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 357) and where there is a funding relationship in FCT for this 

LearningProvider.UKPRN

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate

DetailedDescription:

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= ContractAllocation.StopNewStartsFromDate of the latest ContractAllocation.StartDate in FCT)

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)

Name: UKPRN_26
ErrorMessage: There is no Adult skills funding relationship for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that there is a live contract for delivery of the Adult skills provision associated with the file upload.
Guidance: Please ensure that, to avoid this rule is triggering, you have an active and signed Skills bootcamps contract contract in your MyESF service or a matching Contract Reference Number in the Skills Bootcamps Contracts database. This rule may also trigger an error where the contract is signed and a file uploaded on the same day; in this case please resubmit your file upload on the following day.
Description: If the learning aim is identified as Skills Bootcamps (programme type = 32) there must be either; a valid contract reference number and deliverable code in FCT for this UKPRN, or a matching Contract Reference Number in the Skills Bootcamps Contracts database
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is identified as Skills Bootcamps (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32) there must be either a funding relationship, a valid contract reference number and deliverable code in FCT for this UKPRN or a matching Contract Reference Number in the Skills Bootcamps Contracts database. 

error where 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32
and
((there is no matching record in FCS where


LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ContractAllocation.DeliveryUKPRN
and
ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = SB2022 ,SB-PAA2022 or SB2023
and 
the first part of 

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


 (up to the second hyphen) matches a ContractAllocation.ContractAllocationNumber)
and 
the second part of 

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


 (after the second hyphen) matches a ContractDeliverable.DeliverableCode for the contract allocation)
or
there is no matching record in Skills Bootcamp Contract database where


LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


 = SkillsBootcampContracts.ILRContractRefNumber) )
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

 = 99, 10, 11), the ULN should not be the default value

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1)

Guidance: Please ensure that, where the learner is Office for Students (OfS) funded and the aim has a planned or actual duration of less than 5 days, their Unique learner number (ULN) should not be 999999999 if the file preparation date is on or after 1 January of the current teaching year and the Learning start date is 60 or more days before the file preparation date
Description: If the file preparation date is on or after 1 January of the current teaching year, and the learner is  learner is Office for Students (OfS) funded, and the aim has a planned or actual duration of less than 5 days and the Learning start date is 60 or more days before the file preparation date, the Unique learner number (ULN) should not be 999999999
DetailedDescription:
If the file preparation date is on or after 1 January of the current teaching year (file preparation date >= 1 January), and the aim is Office for Students (OfS) funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99 and (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1), and the aim has a planned  or actual duration of >= 5 days and the Learning start date is <= 60 days before the file preparation date ((

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 5 OR 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


  - 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 5) and file preparation date - 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 60 days), the Unique learner number (ULN) should not be 999999999

(Error where 

Learner.ULN


 = 9999999999)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered on OLASS learning aims (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 034
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Intent: To ensure that, where the learner is an 'OLASS - Offender in Custody', their Unique learner number (ULN) is not 999999999 where the aim duration is 5 days or less and the aim start is more than 60 days before the file preparation date

If the file preparation date is on or after 1 January of the current teaching year (file preparation date >= 1 January), and the aim is Office for Students (OfS) funded (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode

 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 5 or 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


  >= 5), and the Learning start date on or less than 60 days before the file preparation date file preparation date - 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 60 days) the Unique learner number (ULN) should not be 9999999999

Learner.ULN

 = 108)) OR (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 10), and the Planned learning hours are 10 or less (

Learner.PlanLearnHours


 <= 10), and the Unique learner number has been returned (

Learner.ULN


 <> 9999999999), the Family name must be returned 

(error where 

Learner.FamilyName


 is unknown or contains all whitespace)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnAimRef_130
ErrorMessage: The aim must have COMM_LEARN Validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database
Intent: To ensure that learning aims are returned for the correct valid dates in the LARS service for Community learning funded delivery
Guidance: Ensure that, for new starts on or after 1 August 2023 that Community learning funded, the learning aim must have COMM_LEARN Validity Category in the Validity table in the LARS database, shown through the FALA service
Description: For new starts on or after 1 August 2023 and are Community Learning funded then the aims must have COMM_LEARN Validity Category in the Validity table in the LARS database
DetailedDescription:
For new starts on or after 1 August 2023 and are Community Learning funded then the aims must have COMM_LEARN Validity Category in the Validity table in the LARS database.


(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2023-08-01  and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 10 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory <> COMM_LEARN)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpId_02
ErrorMessage: The Employer identifier is not valid
Intent: To ensure that a valid Employer ID has been returned in the learner's Employment status record
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Employer identifier is a nine digit number
Description: If returned, the Employer identifier must pass the check sum calculation in validation
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Employer identifier (

LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId


 is known) must either be the default number or be a valid lookup on the EDS system 

(error where 

LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId


 is <> (999999999 or a valid lookup on edrs_lookup))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpId_01
ErrorMessage: The Employer identifier is not valid
Intent: To ensure that a valid Employer ID has been returned in the learner's Employment status record
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Employer identifier is the default number (999999999) or a valid lookup on the EDS system
Description: If returned, the Employer identifier must either be the default number or be a valid lookup on the EDS system
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Employer identifier (

LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId


 is known) must either be the default number or be a valid lookup on the EDS system 

(error where 

LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId


 is <> (999999999 or a valid lookup on edrs_lookup))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: DateEmpStatApp_02
ErrorMessage: The Date employment status applies must not be before 1 August 1990
Intent: To ensure that, where required, a relevant Employment status record has been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Date employment status applies is not before 1 August 1990
Description: If returned, the Date employment status applies must not be before 1 August 1990
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Date employment status applies (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 is known), must not be before 1 August 1990 

(error where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 < 1990-08-01)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: DateEmpStatApp_01
ErrorMessage: The Date employment status applies must not be after the current teaching year
Intent: To ensure that, where required, a relevant Employment status record has been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Date employment status applies is not after the current teaching year
Description: If returned, the Date employment status applies, must not be after the current teaching year
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Date employment status applies (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 is known), must not be after the current teaching year

(error where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 > the current teaching year)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpStat_22
ErrorMessage: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies to the learning aim start date
Intent: To ensure that, for Tailored Learning provision, an Employment status record has been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, for aims funded through Tailored Learning provision, an Employment status record has been returned
Description: For Tailored Learning provision an Employment status record must exist
DetailedDescription:
For the Tailored Learning provision (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 11) an Employment status record must exist

(error where 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


  = 11 and there is no Employment status record where 


LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 is not on or before the 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 of the learning aim)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpStat_20
ErrorMessage: The learner must be in paid employment for this Learning Delivery Monitoring code to be used.
Intent: To ensure that, Low wage learners are recorded as 'In paid employment' on the start date of the learning aim
Guidance: Ensure that, where learners are marked 'Learners in receipt of low wages', the employment status on the start date of the learning aim is 'In paid employment'
Description: If the learning aim has the monitoring status of 'Learners in receipt of low wages', the employment status on the start date of the learning aim must be 'In paid employment'
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim has the monitoring status of 'Learners in receipt of low wages' (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 363), the employment status on the start date of the learning aim (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


) must be 'In paid employment'

(error where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 <> 10)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpStat_15
ErrorMessage: The Employment status on the start date of an apprenticeship programme must not be unknown
Intent: To ensure that, for apprenticeships, an Employment status record of 'Employed' has been returned that applies on the Learning start date
Guidance: Ensure that, for apprenticeship programmes that started on or after 1 August 2016, the employment status on the start date of the programme is 'employed'
Description: For aims that started on or after 1 August 2016, for apprenticeship provision, that are programme aims, the employment status on the start date of an apprenticeship programme must not be unknown
DetailedDescription:
For aims that started on or after 1 August 2016 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2016-08-01), for apprenticeship provision (DD07 = Y), that are programme aims  (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), the employment status on the start date of an apprenticeship programme must not be unknown 

(error where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 = 98 on the employment status record that is applicable for the start date of the learning aim)
Exclusions:
Not triggered for (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 353, 355)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpStat_12
ErrorMessage: The Employment status on the start date of an apprenticeship programme should be employed
Intent: To ensure that, for apprenticeships, an Employment status record of 'Employed' has been returned that applies on the Learning start date
Guidance: Ensure that, for apprenticeship programmes, the employment status should be recorded as 'Employed' on the start date of the aim
Description: For apprenticeships, where the aim is a programme aim, the employment status should be employed on the start date of the aim
DetailedDescription:
For apprenticeships (DD07 = Y), where the aim is a programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), the employment status should be employed on the start date of the aim 

(error where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 <> 10 on the  

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


)
Exclusions:
Not triggered for (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 353, 355)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpStat_11
ErrorMessage: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that, for certain apprenticeships and start dates, an Employment status record has been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship, with a start date on or before 31 July 2014, there must be an Employment status record with a Date that applies on or before the Programme start date
Description: If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship, and the aim is a programme aim, with a start date on or before 31 July 2014, there must be an Employment status record with a Date that applies on or before the Programme start date
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning aim start date is on or after 1 August 2014 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2014-08-01), and the provision is 16-19 non-apprenticeship (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 25 or 82), and the total of the Planned learning hours and the Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours is less than 540 (sum of (

Learner.PlanLearnHours


 and 

Learner.PlanEEPHours


) < 540), there must be an applicable Employment status record

(error where there is no Employment status record where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 < 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpStat_09
ErrorMessage: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that, for apprenticeships starting on or after 1 August 2014, an Employment status record is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learner is a start on or after 1 August 2014, and adult skills, Skills Bootcamp or non funded provision, and they are 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record must be returned
Description: If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship, and the aim is a Programme aim, and the start date is on or after 1 August 2014, there must be an applicable Employment status record
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2014 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2014-08-01), and adult skills, Skills Bootcamp or non funded provision (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35, 37, 81 or 99), and the learner is 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record must exist

(error where there is no Employment status record where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 < 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 of the learning aim)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpStat_08
ErrorMessage: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that, for certain Funding models and start dates, where the start on or after 1 August 2014, and the learner is 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learner is a start on or after 1 August 2014, and adult skills, Skills Bootcamp or non funded provision, and they are 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record must be returned
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2014, and adult skills, Skills Bootcamp or non funded provision, and the learner is 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record must exist
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2014 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2014-08-01), and adult skills, Skills Bootcamp or non funded provision (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35, 37, 81 or 99), and the learner is 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record must exist

(error where there is no Employment status record where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 < 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 of the learning aim)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship learning aims (DD07 = Y), or Community learning aims (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99 and

 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType 


= SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 108)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpStat_05
ErrorMessage: The Employment status is not a valid code
Intent: To ensure that, where returned, the learner Employment status is a valid code
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the learner Employment status is a valid lookup code in the EmpStat lookup table
Description: If returned, the Employment status must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Employment status must be a valid lookup 

(error where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 is known and <> valid lookup on ILR_EMP_STAT)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_156
ErrorMessage: The Maths Minimum Hours field must be returned for this learner
Intent: This rule ensures that the Maths minimum hours has been returned for an applicable programme
Guidance: If the learner is 16 or over on the 31 August and if the aim is 16-19 funded and if the aim has EFA Funding Condition and  and the learner's planned hours are 150 or over, then the Maths Minimum Hours must be returned to clear this error, unless they have a pass grade for Maths functional skills
Description: If the learner is 16 or over on the 31 August and if the aim is 16-19 funded and if the aim has EFA Funding Condition with no valid exemptions the Maths minimum hours must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learner is 16 or over on the 31 August and if the aim is 16-19 funded and if the aim has EFA Funding Condition - English qualification validity category  (LARS_ValidityCategory = EFAConFundEnglish) or an aim under the King's Trust TEAM programme, the learner does not hold a GCSE English condition of funding exemption ( there is no record of 

LearnFamType.


 MCF and 

Learner.LearnFAMCod


e = 1,2,3,4), the learner's highest Maths GCSE grade is 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE (

Learner.MathGrade


 = 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE) and the learner's planned hours are 150 or over, then the Maths Minimum Hours must be returned.

Error where


Learner.DateOfBirth


 is returned and >= 16 years on the 31 August of the current teaching year
and


LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 25
and


LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and

 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 107
And
(

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef 


= LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = EFAConFundMaths or (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef = 60023995,60027307,60027629,60032121,60033344 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 331))
and
there is no record of Learner.FAM LearnFamType.MCF and Learner.LearnFAMCode = 1,2,3,4
And


Learner.MathGrade 


= 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE
and


(Learner.PlanLearnHours


+

Learner.PlanEEPHours 


= > 150 or (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 31 and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 with the latest

 LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


and 

LearningDelivery.Phours


  = >150 )) 
and
there is no record where 

LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType


 = MMH
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by:

Learner holds a pass grade for functional skills level 2 in Maths and Maths GCSE grade is below grade 3 (LearnerFAM.LearnFamType.MCF  Learner.LearnFAMCode = 5 and Learner.MathGrade = 2,1,U,E,F,G,X,NONE)

T Levels that started before 1 August 2022 (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2022-08-01)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for version 1

Name: R_155
ErrorMessage: The English Minimum Hours field must be returned for this learner
Intent: This rule ensures that the English minimum hours has been returned for an applicable programme
Guidance: If the learner is 16 or over on the 31 August and if the aim is 16-19 funded and if the aim has EFA Funding Condition and  and the learner's planned hours are 150 or over, then the English Minimum Hours must be returned to clear this error, unless they have a pass grade for English functional skills
Description: If the learner is 16 or over on the 31 August and if the aim is 16-19 funded and if the aim has EFA Funding Condition with no valid exemptions the English minimum hours must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learner is 16 or over on the 31 August and if the aim is 16-19 funded and if the aim has EFA Funding Condition - English qualification validity category  (LARS_ValidityCategory = EFAConFundEnglish) or an aim under the King's Trust TEAM programme, the learner does not hold a GCSE English condition of funding exemption ( there is no record of 

LearnFamType.


 ECF and 

Learner.LearnFAMCod


e = 1,2,3,4), the learner's highest English GCSE grade is 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE (Learner.EngGrade = 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE) and the learner's planned hours are 150 or over, then the Maths Minimum Hours must be returned.

Error where


Learner.DateOfBirth


 is returned and >= 16 years on the 31 August of the current teaching year
and


LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 25
and


LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and

 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 107
And
(

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef 


= LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = EFAConFundEnglish or (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef = 60023995,60027307,60027629,60032121,60033344 and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 331))
and
there is no record of Learner.FAM LearnFamType.MCF and Learner.LearnFAMCode = 1,2,3,4
And


Learner.MathGrade 


= 3,2,1,U,D,E,F,G,X,NONE
and


(Learner.PlanLearnHours


+

Learner.PlanEEPHours 


= > 150 or (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 31 and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 with the latest

 LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


and 

LearningDelivery.Phours


  = >150 )) 
and
there is no record where 

LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType


 = EMH
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by:

Learner holds a pass grade for functional skills level 2 in English and English GCSE grade is below grade 3 (LearnerFAM.LearnFamType.ECF  Learner.LearnFAMCode = 5 and Learner.EngGrade = 2,1,U,E,F,G,X,NONE)

T Levels that started before 1 August 2022 (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 31 and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate < 2022-08-01)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for version 1

Name: AFinDate_13
ErrorMessage: The price must not be after the achievement date
Intent: This rule ensures that the TNP date recorded is not after the achievement date
Guidance: Check that the financial details recorded to ensure that the TNP dates are not set after the learners achievement date
Description: For the apprenticeship standard programme, the apprenticeship financial record date for a price record must not be after the achievement date or must not be after the learning actual end date where the learner has withdrawn.
DetailedDescription:
For the apprenticeship standard programme, the apprenticeship financial record date for a price record must not be after the achievement date or must not be after the learning actual end date where the learner has withdrawn.

(error where 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25 and 

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is returned and 

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinDate 


> LearningDelivery.AchDate) or (LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25  and LearningDelivery.AchDate is not returned and LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason is returned and AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinDate > 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_153
ErrorMessage: The date applies from must be on or after 1 August 2025 for the Event Indicator
Intent: This rule ensures that the Event indicators date is after the first of August 2025
Guidance: Ensure that the start date of the Skills bootcamp programme aim is after the 1st of August 2025 before recording an Event indicator aim.
Description: For a Skills Bootcamps learner, if the earliest learning start date of any programme aims with the same Contract Reference Number is before 1 August 2025, an Event Indicator must not be returned.
DetailedDescription:
For a Skills Bootcamp learner, if the earliest learning start date of any programme aims with the same Contract Reference Number is on or after 1 August 2025 and the Event Indicator has been returned, (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType


 = EVI)  the date applies from must be on or after 1 August 2025. 
 
error where  


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32
and 
LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 
and the earliest 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 1 August 2025 with the same Contract Reference Number (

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


) 
and there is a record of LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType = EVI and  
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom is < 1 August 2025
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for version 1

Name: R_152
ErrorMessage: The Event Indicator must not be used for learning aims starting before 1 August 2025
Intent: This rule ensures that the Event indicators are not recorded on any starts prior to the first of August 2025
Guidance: Ensure that the start date of the Skills bootcamp programme aim is after the 1st of August 2025 before recording an Event indicator aim.
Description: For a Skills Bootcamps learner, if the earliest learning start date of any programme aims with the same Contract Reference Number is before 1 August 2025, an Event Indicator must not be returned.
DetailedDescription:
For a Skills Bootcamps learner, if the earliest learning start date of any programme aims with the same Contract Reference Number is before 1 August 2025, an Event Indicator (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType


 = EVI) must not be returned. 

error where


LearningDelivery.ProgType 


= 32
and 


LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1   
and the earliest 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < 1 August 2025 with the same Contract Reference Number (

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


) 
and there is a record of

 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType 


= EVI
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for version 1

Name: R_89
ErrorMessage: The Learning actual end date for the latest programme aim must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest component aim (not including English and maths)
Intent: This rule ensures that the programme aim is not closed with an actual end date if one of the component aims are still open, this does not include English and Maths.
Guidance: Check that the actual end date has not been added in error on the Programme aim, if the learner has completed the actual end date will need to be added onto the programme aim that matches the latest component.
Description: Where the Learning actual end date has been returned for the programme aim, it must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest aim within that programme.
DetailedDescription:
Where the Learning actual end date has been returned  (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is known) for the programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1), it must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest aim within that programme.  

(error where the latest programme aim LearnActEndDate is <  latest component LearnActEndDate (AimType = 3) 
with the same combination of ProgType and StdCode (where applicable))

(This rule is not triggered for English and maths component aims (
AimType = 3, and  (LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef, and LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The framework and pathway code has been removed

Name: R_66
ErrorMessage: All funded component aims must have a corresponding programme aim with the same Programme type and Standard code
Intent: This rule ensures that the programme structure is recorded correctly and that it has been recorded with a programme aim and associated components
Guidance: Check the ILR data has been recorded correctly and that the rest of the programme is recorded, if the aim is not part of a programme then this must be recorded as aim type 4
Description: If there is a component aim there must be a matching programme aim with the same value of programme type and standard code
DetailedDescription:
A funded component aim (LearningDelivery.

AimType 


= 3) must have a corresponding programme aim with the same combination of Funding model, Programme type and Standard code

(error where there is no programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) with the same combination of (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


) and (

LearningDelivery.ProgType 


and 

LearningDelivery.StdCode


)
Exclusions: This is not triggered by non funded component aims (AimType = 3 and FundModel = 99))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Framework and pathway code have been removed from the rule

Name: R_56
ErrorMessage: A funded component aim must not have a non-funded programme aim
Intent: This rule ensures that a none funded programme does not have a funded component aim added to the programme
Guidance: Remove any funded component aims from the none funded programme, if the learner has changed to none funded due to any circumstances all component aims need to be changed to none funded
Description: An open non-funded programme aim ), must not have a funded component aim with the same combination of Programme type and Standard code
DetailedDescription:
An open (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 = unknown), non-funded (

LearningDelivery.FundMode


l = 99), programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), must not have a funded component aim with the same combination of Programme type and Standard code.

(error where there is a matching (same combination of

 LearningDelivery.ProgType


 and 

LearningDelivery.StdCode


 (where applicable)), funded component aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> 99))
ChangeSummary:
Version 1 - Reference to traineeships removed
Removal of Framework and pathway code from the rule

Name: R_31
ErrorMessage: An open programme must have an associated learning aim with the same Programme type and Standard code
Intent: This rule ensures that the programme structure is recorded correctly and that it has been recorded with a programme aim and associated components
Guidance: Check the ILR data has been recorded correctly and that the programme aim is recorded, if the learner is not on a  programme then this must be recorded as aim type 4
Description: If there is an open programme aim, there must be an associated component aim
DetailedDescription:
If there is an open programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1 and

 LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate 


= unknown), there must be an associated component aim


(error where there is no component aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) with the same combination of (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 and 

LearningDelivery.StdCode


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Framework and pathway have been removed from the rule

Name: R_30
ErrorMessage: All aims that are part of a programme must have a corresponding programme aim with the same Programme type and Standard code
Intent: This rule ensures that the programme structure is recorded correctly and that it has been recorded with a programme aim and associated components
Guidance: Check the ILR data has been recorded correctly and that the rest of the programme is recorded, if the aim is not part of a programme then this must be recorded as aim type 4
Description: If there is a component aim there must be a matching programme aim with the same value of programme type and standard code
DetailedDescription:
If there is a component aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3), there must be a matching programme aim with the same value of 

LearningDelivery.ProgType,


  or 

LearningDelivery.StdCode




(error where there is no programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) with the same combination of (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 and 

LearningDelivery.StdCode


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Framework and pathway removed from the rule

Name: PERMADDCOUNTRY_02
ErrorMessage: This is not a valid code
Intent: This rule ensures that if the Domicile is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, if the Domicile is returned for the learning aim and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If returned, the Domicile must be a valid lookup from Appendix D
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY


 

is known), the Domicile must be a valid lookup from Appendix D

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY


 

<> valid lookup on ILR_

PERMADDCOUNTRY)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Change of field names within rule description, error message, change of rule name

Name: PERMADDCOUNTRY_01
ErrorMessage: The PERMADDCOUNTRY_01 must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that if the  Country of Permanent is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, if the  Country of Permanent is returned for the learning aim and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned, and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013, then the Country of Permanent must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2013-08-01), then the Country of Permanent must be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY


 unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Change of field names within rule description, error message, change of rule name

Name: MSTUFEE_07
ErrorMessage: As Major Source of Tuition Fees 03 or 10 has been recorded then the Student Support Number should be returned
Intent: This rule ensures that if the Major source of tuition fees is 03 of 10 then the Student support number must be returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the Major source of tuition fees is 03 of 10 then the Student support number must be returned
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2025, and the Major Source of Tuition Fees is  Student Awards Agency for Scotland (SAAS) or Student Loans Company (SLC) then the Student Support Number should be returned.
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2025 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-05) and the Major Source of Tuition Fees is  Student Awards Agency for Scotland (SAAS) or Student Loans Company (SLC) then the Student Support Number should be returned.

Error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-01 and 

LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE


 = 03,10 and LearningDeliveryHE.SSN is not returned For starts on or after 1 August 2025 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-05) and the Major Source of Tuition Fees is  Student Awards Agency for Scotland (SAAS) or Student Loans Company (SLC) then the Student Support Number should be returned.

Error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-01 and 

LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE


 = 03,10 and 

LearningDeliveryHE.SSN


 is not returned
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for version 1

Name: MSTUFEE_06
ErrorMessage: As Major Source of Tuition Fees 02, 03, 04, 52, 53, 54 has been recorded then the Student Support Number should be returned
Intent:
This rule ensures that the Major source of tuition fees 

 02, 03, 04, 52, 53, 54 

 is returned on an applicable learning aim then the Student support number must be returned
Guidance:
Ensure that, if the Major source of tuition fees 

 02, 03, 04, 52, 53, 54 

the student support number is returned
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2021 and the Major Source of Tuition Fees is  'English or Welsh LEA award', 'Student Awards Agency for Scotland (SAAS)',  'DELNI/Northern Ireland Education and Library Boards',  'Mix of learner and SLC, 'Mix of learner and SAAS/SLC' or 'Mix of learner and DELNI/NIELB' then the Student Support Number should be returned.
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2021 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


>= 2021-08-01)and on or prior to 31 July 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31)  and the Major Source of Tuition Fees is  'English or Welsh LEA award', 'Student Awards Agency for Scotland (SAAS)',  'DELNI/Northern Ireland Education and Library Boards',  'Mix of learner and SLC, 'Mix of learner and SAAS/SLC' or 'Mix of learner and DELNI/NIELB' then the Student Support Number should be returned.

Error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


>= 2021-08-01 
and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31 
and 
 

LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE


 = 02, 03, 04, 52, 53, 54 and 

LearningDeliveryHE.SSN


 is not returned
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Amendment to rule to add LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31 to the error condition

Name: MSTUFEE_05
ErrorMessage: The Major source of tuition fees is not consistent with the Country of Permanent Address
Intent: This rule ensures that the Major source of tuition fees is returned on an applicable learning aim when the HE dataset is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the Country of Permanent Address is recorded as England or Wales the MSTUFEE code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the Country of Permanent Address is England or Wales, the Major source of tuition fees should not be 'Student Awards Agency for Scotland' or 'DELNI/Northern Ireland Education and Library Boards'
DetailedDescription:
If the Domicile is England or Wales (

LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY


 

= XF or XI), the Major source of tuition fees should not be 'Student Awards Agency for Scotland' or 'DELNI/Northern Ireland Education and Library Boards'

(error where

 LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE 


= 3 or 4)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Change of field names within rule description and error message

Name: MSTUFEE_04
ErrorMessage: The Major source of tuition fees is not consistent with the Country of Permanent Address
Intent: This rule ensures that the Major source of tuition fees is returned on an applicable learning aim when the HE dataset is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the Country of Permanent Address is recorded as Northern Ireland MSTUFEE code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the Country of Permanent Address is Scotland, the Major source of tuition fees should not be 'English or Welsh LEA award' or 'DELNI/Northern Ireland Education and Library Boards'
DetailedDescription:
If the Country of Permanent Address is Northern Ireland (

LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY 


= XG), the Major source of tuition fees should not be 'English or Welsh LEA award' or 'Student Awards Agency for Scotland'

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE


 = 2 or 3)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Change of field names within rule description and error message

Name: UCASSCHEMECODE_02
ErrorMessage: The UCAS Scheme code must be two alphabetic characters followed by two numeric digits.
Intent: This rule ensures that UCAS scheme code is returned in the correct format
Guidance: Ensure that, the UCAS scheme code returned on this learning aim using a code from the ILR specification
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2025, the UCAS Scheme Code must be two alphabetic characters followed by two numeric digits.
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2025 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-01) the UCAS Scheme Code must be two alphabetic characters followed by two numeric digits.

Error where


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-01
and


LearningDelivery.UCASSCHEMECODE


 is not two alphabetic characters followed by two numeric digits
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for version 1

Name: UCASSCHEMECODE_01
ErrorMessage: The UCAS scheme code must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that UCAS scheme code is returned for this learning aim
Guidance: Ensure that, the UCAS scheme code returned on this learning aim
Description: The UCAS scheme code must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2013-08-01), and the UCAS personal ID has been returned (LearnerHE.UCASPERID), then the UCAS application code must be returned 


(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.UCASSCHEMECODE


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The UCAS scheme code must be returned for this learning aim

Name: SEC_02
ErrorMessage: The Socio-economic Classification must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: Ensure that, the Socio-economic Classification is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, the Socio-economic Classification is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013, then the Socio-economic Classification must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2013-08-01), the UCAS application code has been returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.UCASSCHEMECODE


 is known), and Country of Permanent Address code is within the British Isles (

LearningDeliveryHEPERMADDCOUNTRY


 = 'XF', 'XG', 'XH', 'XI', or 'XK'), then the Socio-economic Classification must be returned 


(error where

 LearningDeliveryHE.SEC 


is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Change of field names within rule description and error message

Name: SEC_01
ErrorMessage: The Socio-economic classification is not a valid code
Intent: This rule ensures that Socio-economic classification is a valid look up in the ILR specification
Guidance: Ensure that, the Socio-economic classification is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If returned the Socio-economic classification must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.SEC


 is known), the Socio-economic classification must be a valid lookup (error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.SEC


 <> valid lookup in ILR_SEC)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Change of field names within rule description and error message

Name: SOC_04
ErrorMessage: The Occupation code is not a valid code
Intent: This rule ensures that Occupation code is valid in the ILR specification
Guidance: Ensure that, the Occupation code has been returned and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If returned, and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2014, then the Occupation code must be a valid lookup from SOC lookup in the ILR specification
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.SOC


 is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2014 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


=> 2014-08-01), then the Occupation code must be a valid lookup from SOC2010 lookup in Appendix L

(error where LearningDeliveryHE.SOC <> valid lookup in ILR_SOC)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Change of field names within rule description, change of rule name

Name: LearningDeliveryHE_07
ErrorMessage: A Learning Delivery HE record must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that a Learning Delivery HE record is not returned, except where necessary, for framework apprenticeships
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learning aim is part of a Higher apprenticeship, and prescribed HE in the LARS database, and delivered by a college or grant funded provider and the UKPRN is a valid lookup on the Office for Students register, the Learning Delivery HE record must be returned; unless the aim record is generated by HESA or where the organisation is an UHEO
Description: If the learning aim is part of a Higher apprenticeship, and prescribed HE in the LARS database, and delivered by a college or grant funded provider and the UKPRN is a valid lookup on the Office for Students register, then the Learning Delivery HE record must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is part of a Higher apprenticeship (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25), and prescribed HE in the LARS database (LARS_EnglPrscID = 1 or 2 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef)), and delivered by a college or grant funded provider (DD27 = Y) and the UKPRN is a valid lookup on the Office for Students register (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = UKPRN.OfSProviders) then the Learning Delivery HE record must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is unknown)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by records generated by HESA (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 352), or by records where 

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ORG_UKPRNS and LegalOrgType = UHEO
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The programme types 20, 21, 22, 23 have been removed from this rule

Name: SOC_02
ErrorMessage: The Occupation code must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that Occupation code is entered into the learning aim
Guidance: Ensure that, the Occupation code has been returned
Description: If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 the UCAS application code has been returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2013-08-01), the UCAS scheme code has been returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.UCASSCHEMECODE


 is known), and the Country of Permanent Address code is within the British Isles (

LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY


 = 'XF', 'XG', 'XH', 'XI', or 'XK'), then the Occupation code must be returned 


(error where

 LearningDeliveryHE.SOC


 is unknown)
