ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Change of field names within rule description, change of rule name

Name: GROSSFEE_03
ErrorMessage: The Gross tuition fee must not be greater than 9535
Intent: This rule ensures that if the GROSSFEE is recorded under a specific value
Guidance: Ensure that, if the GROSSFEE value does not exceed the value detailed in the rule description
Description: If returned, the GROSS fee should not be greater than 9535
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE


 is known), the Gross tuition fee should not be greater than 9535

(error where

 LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE


 > 9535)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - The value has been changed to 9535 in the error message and error condition

Name: GROSSFEE_02
ErrorMessage: The Gross tuition fee must be equal to or greater than the Net tuition fee
Intent: This rule ensures that if the GROSSFEE is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, the value of the GROSSFEE is greater than or equal to the NETFEE value
Description: If returned, the Gross tuition fee must be equal to or greater than the Net tuition fee
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE


 is known), the Gross tuition fee must be equal to or greater than the Net tuition fee

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE


 < 

LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: NETFEE_02
ErrorMessage: The Net tuition fee should not be greater than 9535
Intent: This rule ensures that if the NETFEE is recorded under a specific value
Guidance: Ensure that, if the NETFEE value does not exceed the value detailed in the error condition
Description: If returned, the Net tuition fee should not be greater than 9535
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE


 is known), the Net tuition fee should not be greater than 9535

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE


 > 9535)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - The value has been changed to 9535 in the error condition and error message

Name: MSTUFEE_03
ErrorMessage: The Major source of tuition fees is not consistent with the Country of Permanent Address
Intent: This rule ensures that the Major source of tuition fees is returned on an applicable learning aim when the HE dataset is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the Domicile is recorded as Scotland MSTUFEE code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the Country of Permanent Address is Scotland, the Major source of tuition fees should not be 'English or Welsh LEA award' or 'DELNI/Northern Ireland Education and Library Boards'
DetailedDescription:
If the Country of Permanent Address is Scotland (

LearningDeliveryHE.PERMADDCOUNTRY


= XH), the Major source of tuition fees should not be 'English or Welsh LEA award' or 'DELNI/Northern Ireland Education and Library Boards'

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE


 = 2 or 4)
ChangeSummary: Version 2 - Change of field name within rule description and error message

Name: LearningDeliveryHE_10
ErrorMessage: A programme aim must not have the HE dataset returned
Intent: To ensure that the HE dataset is not recorded on programme aims and only on applicable level 4 and above components
Guidance: Ensure that, if any programme aims have been returned that they do not contain the Learning delivery HE dataset
Description: For new starts on or after 1 August 2025, the learning delivery HE entity must not be returned on the programme aim.
DetailedDescription:
For new starts on or after 1 August 2025 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-01, the learning delivery HE entity must not be returned on the programme aim. 


(error where

 LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-01 and LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - New rule for version 3

Name: AFinDate_14
ErrorMessage: The Payment (PMR) record must not be after the file preparation date
Intent: This rule ensures that the PMR date recorded is not after the file preparation date as payments can only be recorded once they are received
Guidance: Check that the financial details recorded to ensure that the PMR dates are not set after file preparation date, PMR records can only be reported once they are paid and should not have a future date.
Description: For the apprenticeship standard programme, the apprenticeship financial record date for a price record must not be after the achievement date or must not be after the learning actual end date where the learner has withdrawn.
DetailedDescription:
If a Payment record date has been returned (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = PMR and

 AppFinRecord.AFinDate


 is returned), the Payment record date must not be after the file preparation date.

error where:
there is a record of 

AppFinRecord.AFinDate


 where 

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = PMR
and


AppFinRecord.AFinDate


 is > file preparation date
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - New rule for version 3

Name: LearnDelFAMDateFrom_03
ErrorMessage: The Date applies from must not be returned for this FAM type
Intent: To ensure that valid FAM types are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where Learning Support Funding, Apprenticeship Contract Type or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary FAM type is not returned, the 'Date applies from' must not be returned
Description: If Learning Support Funding, Apprenticeship Contract Type or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary FAM type is not returned, then the Date applies from must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If Learning Support Funding, Apprenticeship Contract Type or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary or Event indicator  FAM type is not returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 <> LSF, ACT,ALB or EVI ), then the Date applies from must not be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom


 is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 2 - Amendment to the rule to include Event indicators

Name: DateOfBirth_59
ErrorMessage: The learner must not be 25 or over at the start of the learning for a funded foundation apprenticeship standard programme
Intent: To ensure that a learner is not over the age of 25 at the start of a funded foundation apprenticeship standard
Guidance: Ensure that, the learners date of birth is recoded correctly, if they are over the age of 25 they are not eligible for a funded foundation apprenticeship and an alternative apprenticeship standard should be used.
Description: For new starts from 1st August 2025, if a funded foundation apprenticeship standard programme has been returned, the learner must not be 25 or over at the start of the learning aim.
DetailedDescription:
For new starts from 1st August 2025, if a funded foundation apprenticeship standard programme has been returned, the learner must not be 25 or over at the start of the learning aim.

error where


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-01
and


LearningDelivery.FundMode


l = 36
and


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25
and


LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1
and


LearningDelivery.StdCode


 = LARS_StandardCode
and
LARS_ApprenticeshipStandardTypeCode = A0001
and


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


- Learner.DateOfBirth >= 25 years
Exclusions:
This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - New rule at version 3

Name: WorkPlaceStartDate_03
ErrorMessage: A Work placement record must not be returned for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that a Work Placement record is not returned, where necessary
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learning aim is not work experience, a Work Placement record is not returned
Description: If the learning aim is not work experience, then a Work Placement record must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is not work experience (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 <> (Z0007834, Z0007835, Z0007836, Z0007837, Z0007838, Z0002347, ZWRKX001, ZWRKX002 or ZWRKX003) then a Work Placement record must not be returned

(error where there is a record of LearningDelivery.WorkPlacement)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: WorkPlaceEmpId_02
ErrorMessage: The Work placement employer identifier does not pass the checksum calculation
Intent: To ensure that a Work Placement record is returned correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Work placement employer identifier must pass the check sum calculation in DD14, unless the identifier is 999999999
Description: If returned, the Work placement employer identifier, must pass the check sum calculation in DD14
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Work placement employer identifier (

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpId


 is known and not 999999999), must pass the check sum calculation in DD14

(error where DD14 <> character 9 of 

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpId


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: WorkPlaceEmpId_01
ErrorMessage: The Work placement employer identifier is not valid
Intent: To ensure that a Work Placement record is returned correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Work placement identifier is be a valid lookup on the EDS system or be 999999999
Description: If returned, the Work placement identifier must be a valid lookup on the EDS system of all available employer numbers or be 999999999
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Work placement identifier (

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpId


 is known) must be a valid lookup on the EDS system of all available employer numbers or be 999999999 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpId


 is <> 999999999 or a valid lookup on edrs_lookup)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: WorkPlacement_01
ErrorMessage: A Work placement record must be returned
Intent: To ensure that a Work Placement record is returned correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where a T-Level industry placement aim has been returned, a work placement record is also returned
Description: If the T-Level industry placement aim has been returned then a work placement record must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the T Level industry placement aim has been returned then a work placement record must be returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = ZWRKX003 and there is no record of LearningDelivery.WorkPlacement)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: WorkPlaceMode_01
ErrorMessage: The Work placement mode must be a valid code
Intent: To ensure that a Work Placement record is returned correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Work placement mode is a valid lookup
Description: The Work placement mode must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
The Work placement mode (

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceMode


 is known) must be a valid lookup

(error where <> valid lookup on ILR_WorkPlaceMode)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: WorkPlaceEndDate_01
ErrorMessage: The Work placement end date must be after the Work placement start date
Intent: To ensure that a Work Placement record is returned correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Work placement end date is on or after the Work placement start date
Description: If returned, the Work placement end date must be on or after the Work placement start date
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Work placement end date (

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEndDate


 is known) must be on or after the Work placement start date

(error where 

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEndDate


 < 

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceStartDate


 )
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: WorkPlaceEndDate_02
ErrorMessage: The Work placement end date must be before the Learning actual end date
Intent: To ensure that a Work Placement record is returned correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned,  the Work placement end date is on or before the Learning actual end date
Description: If returned, the Work placement end date must be on or before the Learning actual end date
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Work placement end date (

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEndDate


 is known) must be on or before the Learning actual end date

(error where 

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEndDate


 > 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: WorkPlaceStartDate_04
ErrorMessage: 16-19 Funding model must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that a Work Placement record is returned correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learning aim is a CDF Industry Placement or T Level work experience aim, the 16-19 funding model is also returned
Description: If the learning aim is a CDF Industry Placement or T Level work experience aim, then the 16-19 funding model must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is a CDF Industry Placement or T Level work experience aim (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = ZWRKX002 or ZWRKX003), then the 16-19 funding model must be returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> 25)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by: Non-funded T-Levels (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: WorkPlaceStartDate_01
ErrorMessage: The Work Placement record must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that a Work Placement record is returned, where necessary
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim start is or after 1 August 2014 and is a work experience aim, a Supported Internship or an Industry placement learning aim, a Work Placement record is also returned
Description: If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2014 and is a work experience aim, a Supported Internship or an Industry placement learning aim, then a Work Placement record must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2014 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2014-08-01) and is a work experience aim, a Supported Internship or an Industry placement learning aim  (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = (Z0007834, Z0007835, Z0007836, Z0007837, Z0007838, Z0002347, ZWRKX001 or ZWRKX002)) then a Work Placement record must be returned

(error where here is no record of LearningDelivery.WorkPlacement)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: WorkPlaceStartDate_02
ErrorMessage: The Work placement start date must be after the Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that a Work Placement record is returned correctly
Guidance: Ensure that the Work placement start date is on or after the Learning start date of the learning aim
Description: The Work placement start date must be on or after the Learning start date of the learning aim
DetailedDescription:
The Work placement start date must be on or after the Learning start date of the learning aim

(error where 

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceStartDat


e < 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinType_01
ErrorMessage: An apprenticeship Financial Record for the Total training price must be returned
Intent: This rule ensures that apprenticeship financial recorded
Guidance: Ensure that, A TNP record is added onto the programme aim
Description: If the programme aim is part of a trailblazer apprenticeship standard Ensure that, A TNP record is added onto the programme aim
DetailedDescription:
If the programme aim is part of a trailblazer apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 81, 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25) and

 AimType 


= 1), then a Apprenticeship Financial Record of TNP1 must be returned

(error where there is no record of

 AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinType_02
ErrorMessage: The financial type and code is not valid
Intent: This rule ensures that apprenticeship financial record is a valid lookup
Guidance: Ensure that, A TNP or PMR records are a valid look up in the ILR specification
Description: If a  financial type is returned, then the financial code must be a valid lookup for that financial type
DetailedDescription:
If a  financial type is returned (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 is known), then the financial code must be a valid lookup for that financial type

(error where 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode


 <> valid lookup on ILR_AppFinRecordAFinTypeAFinCode)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinType_04
ErrorMessage: The Apprenticeship Financial Record must not be returned for this learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that apprenticeship financial details are not recorded on any other provision
Guidance: Ensure that, a TNP or PMR price is not recorded on a non apprenticeship aim or programme
Description: The Apprenticeship Financial Record must not be returned if the aim is not an apprenticeship standard programme aim or apprenticeship funded programme aim
DetailedDescription:
The Apprenticeship Financial Record must not be returned (the Apprenticeship Financial Record is unknown) if the aim is not an apprenticeship standard programme aim or apprenticeship funded programme aim

(error where  (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 81, 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25 and

 LearningDelivery.AimType =


 1) or (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 36 and LearningDelivery.AimType = 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinType_07
ErrorMessage: A financial record for the total assessment price must be returned
Intent: This rule ensures that a TNP 2 record has been returned that a price record is added
Guidance: Ensure that, A TNP 2 price is recorded where a TNP 2 record has been entered
Description: If an assessment payment is recorded, then there must be an assessment price record for an apprenticeship standard programme
DetailedDescription:
If an assessment payment is recorded (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and

 AppFinRecord.AFinCode


  = 2) for an apprenticeship standard programme (

LearningDelivery.ProgType 


= 25 and

 LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1), then there must be an assessment price record

(error where there is no record where

 AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode 


= 2 or 4)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinType_08
ErrorMessage: This Financial code must not be used for this funding model
Intent: This rule ensures that the apprenticeship financial records are only returned on funding model 36
Guidance: Ensure that, A TNP record is removed from any funding model which is not 36
Description: If the financial record is a residual price record, then the funding model must be 36
DetailedDescription:
If the financial record is a residual price record (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and

 AppFinRecord.AFinCode


= 3 or 4), then the funding model must be 36

(error where 

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


<> 36)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinType_10
ErrorMessage: The end-point assessment price should be returned
Intent: This rule ensures that the assessment price is returned for apprenticeship standards
Guidance: Ensure that, A TNP 2 or 4 records are entered onto an apprenticeship standard
Description: If the programme is an apprenticeship standard, then an end point assessment price should be recorded
DetailedDescription:
If the programme is an apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25 and 

LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1), then an end point assessment price should be recorded

(error where there is no record where (

AppFinRecord.AFinType 


= TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode


 = 2 or 4)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinType_11
ErrorMessage: This Financial code must not be used for apprenticeship frameworks
Intent: This rule ensures that the assessment price is not returned for apprenticeship frameworks
Guidance: Ensure that, No TNP 2 or 4 records are entered onto an apprenticeship frameworks
Description: If the programme is an apprenticeship funded framework, then the financial code cannot be for assessment
DetailedDescription:
If the programme is an apprenticeship funded framework (

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


= 36), then the financial code cannot be for assessment 

(error where 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode


 = 2 or 4)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinType_12
ErrorMessage: The price must be returned for this programme
Intent: This rule ensures that a apprenticeship financial record is recorded from a funded apprenticeship
Guidance: Ensure that, The TNP record is returned on the programme aim
Description: If the programme is apprenticeship funded, there must be a price record
DetailedDescription:
If the programme is apprenticeship funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


= 36 and 

AimType 


= 1), there must be a price record

(error where there is no record where 

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinType_13
ErrorMessage: There must be a price record that applies from the start of the programme
Intent: This rule ensures that a apprenticeship financial record is recorded from the start of the apprenticeship programme
Guidance: Ensure that, The TNP date matches the learning start date on the programme aim
Description: An apprenticeship funded programme must have a price record that applies from the start date of the programme.
DetailedDescription:
An apprenticeship funded programme (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) must have a price record that applies from the start date of the programme. 

(error where there is no record where (

AppFinRecord.AFinDate


 where 

AppFinRecord.AFinType 


= TNP) = 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinType_14
ErrorMessage: A financial record for the training price must be returned
Intent: This rule ensures that a apprenticeship financial record is recorded
Guidance: Ensure that, The TNP or PRM is recorded if the Apprenticeship financial record is returned
Description: If a training payment is recorded, then there must be a training price record
DetailedDescription:
If a training payment is recorded, then there must be a training price record  (

LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1 and 

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = PMR and 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode


 = 1)

(error where there is no record where AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1 or 3
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMDateTo_05
ErrorMessage: The Date applies to must not be after the Learning actual end date
Intent: To ensure that valid FAM types are returned for apprenticeships
Guidance: Ensure that, where the returned FAM type is ACT, the 'Date to' is before the achievement date of the aim for apprenticeships
Description: Where the FAM type is ACT, if returned, the 'Date to' must not be after the achievement date of the aim for apprenticeships
DetailedDescription:
Where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


e = ACT, if returned, the 'Date To' (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 is known) must not be after the achievement date of the aim for apprenticeships, (

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


= 36) 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 > 

LearningDelivery.AchDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMDateTo_04
ErrorMessage: The Date applies to must not be returned for this FAM type
Intent: To ensure that FAM types are not returned, unless necessary
Guidance: Ensure that, if the FAM type is not Learning Support Funding, Apprenticeship Contract Type or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary, then the Date applies to must not be returned
Description: If the FAM type is not Learning Support Funding, Apprenticeship Contract Type or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary, then the Date applies to must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the FAM type is not Learning Support Funding, Apprenticeship Contract Type or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 <> LSF, ACT or ALB), then the Date applies to must not be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMDateTo_03
ErrorMessage: The Date applies to must not be after the Learning actual end date
Intent: To ensure that valid FAM types are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the 'Date to' is not after the Learning actual end date of the aim for apprenticeships, adult and non-funded
Description: If returned, the 'Date to' must not be after the Learning actual end date of the aim for apprenticeships, adult and non-funded
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the 'Date To' (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 is known) must not be after the Learning actual end date of the aim for apprenticeships, adult and non-funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35, 36, 38, 81 or 99) 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 > 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


)
Exclusions:
This rule does not trigger where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMDateTo_02
ErrorMessage: The Date applies to should not be after the Learning planned end date
Intent: To ensure that valid FAM types are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned and the aim is not an Achieved apprenticeship programme, the Date applies to is not after the Learning planned end date of the aim
Description: If returned, the Date applies to should not be after the Learning planned end date of the aim
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Date applies to (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 is known) should not be after the Learning planned end date of the aim 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 > 

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


)
Exclusions:
This is not triggered by - Apprenticeship Contract Type records where the Achievement Date has been returned on the programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 and  

LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT and there is a record of 

LearningDelivery.AchDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMDateTo_01
ErrorMessage: The Date applies to must not be before the Date applies from for this FAM type
Intent: To ensure that valid FAM types are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Date applies to must be on or after the Date applies from for the FAM type
Description: If returned, the Date applies to must be on or after the Date applies from for this FAM type
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Date applies to (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 is known) must be on or after the Date applies from for this FAM type

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 < 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMDateFrom_04
ErrorMessage: The Date applies from must be returned for this FAM type
Intent: To ensure that valid FAM types are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Apprenticeship Contract Type FAM type is returned, the 'Date applies from' is also returned
Description: If the Apprenticeship Contract Type FAM type is returned, then the Date applies from must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Apprenticeship Contract Type FAM type is returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT), then the Date applies from must be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMDateFrom_02
ErrorMessage: The Date applies from must be after the Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that valid FAM types are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the 'Date applies from' is on or after the Learning start date of the aim for apprenticeships, adult and non-funded
Description: If returned, the Date applies from must be on or after the Learning start date of the aim for apprenticeships, adult and non-funded
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Date applies from must be on or after the Learning start date of the aim (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom


 is known) for apprenticeships, adult and non-funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35, 36, 38, 81 or 99)

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom


 < 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMDateFrom_01
ErrorMessage: The Date applies from or the Date applies to must be returned for this FAM type
Intent: To ensure that valid FAM types are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where Learning Support Funding or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary FAM type is returned, the Date applies from and the Date applies to is also returned
Description: If the Learning Support Funding or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary FAM type is returned, then the Date applies from and the Date applies to must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Support Funding or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary FAM type is returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LSF or ALB), then the Date applies from and the Date applies to must be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom


 or 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinDate_03
ErrorMessage: The apprenticeship financial record date must not be after the file preparation date
Intent: This rule ensures that a apprenticeship financial record date is not after the file preparation date
Guidance: Ensure that, The TNP or PRM date is not recorded after the file preparation date
Description: The apprenticeship financial record date for a price record must not be after the learning actual end date of the apprenticeship framework programme
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the apprenticeship financial record date (

AppFinRecord.AFinDate


 is known) must not be after the file preparation date 

(error where

 AppFinRecord.AFinDate


 is > file preparation date)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinDate_04
ErrorMessage: The price must not be after the learning actual end date
Intent: This rule ensures that a new TNP 1 is not returned after a TNP 3 record is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if a TNP 3 record has been returned no further TNP 1 records are entered as all subsequent records for residual assessment prices must be recorded as TNP 3
Description: The apprenticeship financial record date for a price record must not be after the learning actual end date of the apprenticeship framework programme
DetailedDescription:
The apprenticeship financial record date for a price record must not be after the learning actual end date of the apprenticeship framework programme (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is known)

(error where  

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinDate 


>

 LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


)
Exclusions: This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship standards (ProgType = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinDate_05
ErrorMessage: A total training price must not be returned after a residual training price has been recorded
Intent: This rule ensures that a new TNP 1 is not returned after a TNP 3 record is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if a TNP 3 record has been returned no further TNP 1 records are entered as all subsequent records for residual assessment prices must be recorded as TNP 3
Description: If a total training price has been returned for this aim, there must not be a residual training price returned on the same date, there must not be a total assessment price returned with a later date
DetailedDescription:
If a residual training price has been returned for this aim (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode 


= 3), there must not be a total training price returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1) with a later date

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1) > AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 3))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinDate_06
ErrorMessage: A total assessment price must not be returned after a residual assessment price has been recorded
Intent: This rule ensures that a new TNP 2 is not returned after a TNP 4 record is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if a TNP 4 record has been returned no further TNP 2 records are entered as all subsequent records for residual assessment prices must be recorded as TNP 4
Description: If a total training price has been returned for this aim, there must not be a residual training price returned on the same date, there must not be a total assessment price returned with a later date
DetailedDescription:
If a residual assessment price has been returned for this aim (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode


 = 4), there must not be a total assessment price returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2) with a later date

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2) > AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 4))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinDate_07
ErrorMessage: A total training price and residual training price record must not have the same financial date
Intent: This rule ensures that the TNP 1 and TNP 3 values are not recorded on the same date
Guidance: Check that the financial record dates to ensure that they are at least 1 day apart as the TNP 1 and 3 records cannot be the same day
Description: If a total training price has been returned for this aim, there must not be a residual training price returned on the same date
DetailedDescription:
If a total training price has been returned for this aim (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode 


= 1), there must not be a residual training price returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType  = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode  = 3) on the same date

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 1) = AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 3))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinDate_08
ErrorMessage: A total assessment price and residual assessment price record must not have the same financial date
Intent: This rule ensures that the TNP 2 and TNP 4 values are not recorded on the same date
Guidance: Check that the financial record dates to ensure that they are at least 1 day apart as the TNP 2 and 4 records cannot be the same day
Description: If a total assessment price has been returned for this aim, there must not be a residual assessment price returned on the same date
DetailedDescription:
If a total assessment price has been returned for this aim (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode


 = 2), there must not be a residual assessment price returned (AppFinRecord.AFinType  = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode  = 4) on the same date

(error where AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 2) = AppFinRecord.AFinDate of (AppFinRecord.AFinType = TNP and AppFinRecord.AFinCode = 4))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AFinDate_09
ErrorMessage: The apprenticeship financial record date must not be more than one year before the start of the apprenticeship programme
Intent: This rule ensures that the TNP or PMR date recorded is not more than a year before the learning start date
Guidance: Check that the financial record dates are not more than one year before the learning start date
Description: The apprenticeship financial record date must not be more than one year before the Learning start date
DetailedDescription:
The apprenticeship financial record date must not be more than one year before the Learning start date of the apprenticeship standard or framework programme (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 =  25) 

(error where  

AppFinRecord.AFinDate 


> 1 year before

  LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Removal of apprenticeship frameworks from the rule

Name: AFinDate_12
ErrorMessage: The apprenticeship financial record date should not be more than two years after the Learning actual end date of the apprenticeship programme
Intent: This rule ensures that the TNP or PMR date recorded more than two years after the actual end date
Guidance: Check that the financial record dates are not more than two years after the actual end date
Description: The apprenticeship financial record date must not be more than two years after the Learning actual end date of the apprenticeship standard
DetailedDescription:
The apprenticeship financial record date must not be more than two years after the Learning actual end date of the apprenticeship standard programme (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 a d 

LearningDelivery.ProgType 


=  25)

(error where 

AppFinRecord.AFinDate 


> 2 years after  

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Removal of apprenticeship frameworks from the rule

Name: ProvSpecDelMonOccur_01
ErrorMessage: The Provider specified delivery monitoring occurrence is not 'A' , 'B', 'C' or 'D'
Intent: This rule ensures that the Provider Specified monitoring is recorded correctly
Guidance: Check that the provider specified monitoring has been recorded correctly
Description: If returned, Provider specified delivery monitoring occurrence must be 'A', 'B', 'C' or 'D'
DetailedDescription:
If returned, Provider specified delivery monitoring occurrence (

ProviderSpecDeliveryMonitoring.ProvSpecDelMonOccur


 is known) must be 'A', 'B', 'C' or 'D'

(error where

 ProviderSpecDeliveryMonitoring.ProvSpecDelMonOccur 


<> 'A' , 'B', 'C' or 'D')
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: Tlout_01
ErrorMessage: A completed or withdrawn Tailored Learning funded aim must have a Tailored learning outcome recorded
Intent: This rule ensures that the Tlout code is recorded when a learner is completed or withdrawn
Guidance: Check the learner has been recorded correctly as withdrawn or completed and add the appropriate Tlout code
Description: For Tailored learning provision  if a learning aim is recorded completed or withdrawn the Tailored learning outcomes field must be returned
DetailedDescription:
For Tailored learning provision (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 11),  if a learning aim is recorded completed or withdrawn (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus 


= 2 or 3) the Tailored learning outcomes field must be returned 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.TLout


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: Tlout_02
ErrorMessage: The Tlout identifier must be a valid lookup
Intent: This rule ensures that the Tlout code recorded is valid in the ILR specification
Guidance: Check the Tlout code recorded is valid
Description: If returned, the Tlout identifier must be a valid lookup on the Tlout lookup table
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Tlout identifier (LearningDelivery.Tlout is known) must be a valid lookup on the Tlout identifier table

(error where  <> valid lookup on the 

Tlout 


table)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFamType_134
ErrorMessage: This Source of Funding is not valid for Adult Skills (FM35) or Community Learning (FM10)
Intent:
To ensure that funding model 35 and 10 is not returned for the new starts on the Devolved authorities starting in 
25/26
Guidance: Ensure that the new funding modes are used to record Devolved Adult skills delivery and Tailored learning as the previous funding models are not available for new starts
Description: If the Source of Funding is East Midlands Combined County Authority, York and North Yorkshire Combined Authority or Cornwall Council, the funding model must not be Adult Skills or Community Learning.
DetailedDescription:
If the Source of Funding is East Midlands Combined County Authority, York and North Yorkshire Combined Authority or Cornwall Council, the funding model must not be Adult Skills or Community Learning.

(Error where:


LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF
and


 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 121,122,123
and


LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 or 10)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - New rule for version 3

Name: LearningDeliveryHE_09
ErrorMessage: A Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that a Learning Delivery HE record is returned, only where necessary
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learning aim is Tailored learning funded and is  level 3 or below, the Learning Delivery HE record is not returned
Description: If the learning aim is Tailored learning funded and is a  level 3 or below, the Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is Tailored learning funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 11) and is a  level 3 or below, the Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by aims with LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = '4', '5', '6', '7', '8' OR 'H' where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearningDeliveryHE_08
ErrorMessage: A Learning Delivery HE record must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that a Learning Delivery HE record is returned, where necessary
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learning aim is prescribed HE in the LARS database, and not being delivered by a college or grant funded provider and the UKPRN is a valid lookup on the Office for Students register, the Learning Delivery HE record should be returned; unless the aim record is generated by HESA or where the organisation is an UHEO
Description: If the learning aim is prescribed HE in the LARS database, and not being delivered by a college or grant funded provider and the UKPRN is a valid lookup on the Office for Students register then the Learning Delivery HE record should be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is prescribed HE in the LARS database (LARS_EnglPrscID = 1 or 2 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef)), and not being delivered by a college or grant funded provider (DD27 = N) and the UKPRN is a valid lookup on the Office for Students register (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = UKPRN.OfSProviders) then the Learning Delivery HE record should be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is unknown))
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by records generated by HESA (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 352), or by records where 

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ORG_UKPRNS and LegalOrgType = UHEO
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearningDeliveryHE_06
ErrorMessage: A Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that a Learning Delivery HE record is not returned, except where necessary, for Community funded aims
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learning aim is Community learning funded and is a  level 3 or below and the LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = '4', '5', '6', '7', '8' OR 'H', the Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned
Description: If the learning aim is community learning funded and is a  level 3 or below, the Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned, unless the LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = '4', '5', '6', '7', '8' OR 'H'
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is community learning funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 10) and is a  level 3 or below, the Learning Delivery HE record must not be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by aims with LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = '4', '5', '6', '7', '8' OR 'H' where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearningDeliveryHE_03
ErrorMessage: A Learning Delivery HE record must be returned for this Source of funding
Intent: To ensure that a Learning Delivery HE record is returned, where necessary
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learning aim is Office for Students (OfS) funded and a HESA record is not returned, a Learning Delivery HE record is returned
Description: If the learning aim is Office for Students (OfS) funded, then the Learning Delivery HE record must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 25, 35, 38 or 99), is a level 4 or above in the LARS database (LARS_NotionalNVQLevel_v2 = '4', '5', '6', '7', '8' OR 'H' where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef), and delivered by a college or grant funded provider (DD27 = Y) and the UKPRN is a valid lookup on the Office for Students register (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = UKPRN.OfSProviders) then the Learning Delivery HE record must be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is unknown)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by records generated by HESA (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 352), or by records where 

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ORG_UKPRNS and LegalOrgType = UHEO


Apprenticeships (DD07 = Y)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearningDeliveryHE_02
ErrorMessage: A Learning Delivery HE record must be returned for this Source of funding
Intent: To ensure that a Learning Delivery HE record is returned, where necessary
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learning aim is Office for Students (OfS) funded and a HESA record is not returned, a Learning Delivery HE record is returned
Description: If the learning aim is Office for Students (OfS) funded, then the Learning Delivery HE record must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is Office for Students (OfS) funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


= 99 and (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1)), then the Learning Delivery HE record must be returned

(Error where LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FINTYPE_02
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than one record with a Financial support type of Cash, Near cash, Accommodation discounts, or Other
Intent: To ensure that only one Financial support type is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if a Financial support type is returned, only one record of type is returned
Description: If the Financial support type is 'Cash', 'Near cash', 'Accommodation discounts' or 'Other', there must be only one occurrence of that type
DetailedDescription:
If the Financial support type is 'Cash', 'Near cash', 'Accommodation discounts' or 'Other', there must be only one occurrence of that type

(error where 

LearnerHEFinancialSupport.FINTYPE


 = 1, 2, 3 or 4 and occurrence > 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FINTYPE_01
ErrorMessage: The Financial support type is not a valid code
Intent: To ensure that a valid Financial support type is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if a Financial support type is returned, it is a valid lookup
Description: If returned, the Financial support type must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Financial support type (

LearnerHEFinancialSupport.FINTYPE


 is known) must be a valid lookup

(error where 

LearnerHEFinancialSupport.FINTYPE


 <> a valid lookup on ILR_FINTYPE)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: TTACCOM_04
ErrorMessage: The Term time accommodation must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that the Term time accommodation 'valid to' date is observed
Guidance: Ensure that, if the earliest start date of the learning aims is on or after 1 August 2013, and the Mode of study is 'Full-time or Sandwich', the Term time accommodation must be returned
Description: If the earliest start date of the learning aims is on or after 1 August 2013, and the Mode of study is 'Full-time or Sandwich', then the Term time accommodation must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the earliest start date of the learning aims is on or after 1 August 2013 (DD06 => 2013-08-01), and the Mode of study is 'Full-time or Sandwich' (

LearningDeliveryHE.MODESTUD


 = 1), then the Term time accommodation must be returned 

(error where 

LearnerHE.TTACCOM


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: TTACCOM_02
ErrorMessage: The Term time accommodation is not a valid code for this Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that the Term time accommodation 'valid to' date is observed
Guidance: Ensure that, the earliest aim start date is not after the 'Valid to' date in the Term time accommodation lookup table
Description: The earliest start date of the learning aims must not be after the 'Valid to' date in the Term time accommodation lookup table
DetailedDescription:
The earliest start date of the learning aims must not be after the 'Valid to' date in the Term time accommodation lookup table

(error where DD06 > 'Valid to' in ILR_TTAccom for this 

LearnerHE.TTACCOM


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: TTACCOM_01
ErrorMessage: The Term time accommodation is not a valid code
Intent: To ensure that the Term time accommodation code is a valid lookup
Guidance: Ensure that, if returned, the Term time accommodation code is a valid lookup
Description: If returned, the Term time accommodation must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Term time accommodation (

LearnerHE.TTACCOM


 is known), must be a valid lookup

(error where 

LearnerHE.TTACCOM


 <> valid lookup in ILR_TTAccom)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnerHE_02
ErrorMessage: A Learning Delivery HE record must be returned
Intent: To ensure that a Learning Delivery HE record is returned where necessary
Guidance: Ensure that,  in the case of a Learner HE record being returned,  a Learning Delivery HE record is also returned
Description: If the Learner HE record is returned, then there must be a Learning Delivery HE record
DetailedDescription:
If the Learner HE record is returned (Learner.LearnerHE is known), then there must be a Learning Delivery HE record

(error where there is no record of LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: HEPostCode_01
ErrorMessage: The HE centre location postcode should be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table or be ZZ99 9ZZ
Intent: This rule ensures that if the HEPostcode is recorded in a valid in the lookup data
Guidance: Ensure that, the HEPostcode recorded in a valid on the ONS postcode tables or recorded as ZZ99 9ZZ
Description: If returned, the HE centre location postcode should be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table or be ZZ99 9ZZ
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.HEPostCode 


is known), the HE centre location postcode should be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table or be ZZ99 9ZZ

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.HEPostCode 


<> valid lookup on PAF_ILR_Postcodes or <> ZZ99 9ZZ)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: HEPostCode_02
ErrorMessage: The Postcode must conform to the valid postcode format
Intent: This rule ensures that if the HEPostcode is recorded in a valid format matching the ILR specification
Guidance: Ensure that, the HEPostcode is recorded in a valid format
Description: If returned, the Postcode must conform to the valid postcode format
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.HEPostCode 


is known), the Postcode must conform to the valid postcode format

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.HEPostCode


 <> valid format of 1 or 2 capital letters followed by (1 or 2 numbers or 1 number and a capital letter) and the second part <> valid format of (nXX) where n = 0-9 and XX are capital letters excluding C, I, K, M, O and V)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ELQ_02
ErrorMessage: The ELQ is not a valid code
Intent: This rule ensures that if the ELQ is returned it is a valid code in the ILR specification
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learning aim is OFS funded under SOF 1 then the ELQ is returned and the code is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If returned, the ELQ must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.ELQ 


is known), the ELQ must be a valid lookup

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.ELQ 


<> valid lookup on ILR_ELQ)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ELQ_01
ErrorMessage: The ELQ must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that if the learning aim is OFS funded under SOF 1 then the ELQ is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learning aim is OFS funded under SOF 1 then the ELQ is returned
Description: If the learning aim is OfS funded, then the Equivalent or lower qualification must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is OfS funded (

LearningDelivery.FundMode


l = 99 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1), then the Equivalent or lower qualification must be returned

(error where

 LearningDeliveryHE.ELQ


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: GROSSFEE_01
ErrorMessage: The Gross tuition fee must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that if the GROSSFEE is recorded on a HE learning aim where the NETFEE  has been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the NETFEE has been returned for a HE learning aim that the GROSSFEE is also recorded
Description: If the Net tuition fee is returned, then the Gross tuition fee must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Net tuition fee is returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE


 is known), then the Gross tuition fee must be returned

(error where

 LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE 


is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: NETFEE_01
ErrorMessage: The Net tuition fee must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that if the NETFEE is recorded on a HE learning aim where the SNN number has not been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the SSN number has not been returned for a HE learning aim that the NETFEE is recorded
Description: If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned, and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2012, and the Student support number has not been returned, then the Net tuition fee must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2012 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2012-08-01), and the Student support number has not been returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.SSN


 is unknown), then the Net tuition fee must be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: SPECFEE_02
ErrorMessage: The Special fee indicator is not valid for this Mode of study
Intent: This rule ensures that if the SPECFEE is recorded as sandwich placement if the mode of study is recorded as code 2
Guidance: Ensure that, if the Mode of study is recorded as code 2 the SPECFEE code is recorded as code 1
Description: If the learning aim start date is on or after 1 August 2009, and the Mode of study is 'sandwich year out', then the Special fee indicator must be 'sandwich placement'
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim start date is on or after 1 August 2009 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


=> 2009-08-01), and the Mode of study is 'sandwich year out' (

LearningDeliveryHE.MODESTUD


 = 2), then the Special fee indicator must be 'sandwich placement' 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.SPECFEE


 <> 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: SPECFEE_01
ErrorMessage: This Special fee indicator is not valid
Intent: This rule ensures that the SPECFEE is valid in the ILR specification
Guidance:
Ensure that, if the 

SPECFEE 

code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned, then the Special fee Indicator must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), then the Special fee Indicator must be a valid lookup

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.SPECFEE


  <> valid lookup in ILR_SpecFee)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: PCOLAB_01
ErrorMessage: The Percentage not taught by this institution must be returned for this learning aim
Intent:
This rule ensures that the 

PCOLAB

 is returned on an applicable learning aim when the HE dataset is returned
Guidance:
Ensure that, if the 

PCOLAB 

code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 and the Subcontracted or partnership UKPRN has been returned, then the Percentage not taught by this institution must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


=> 2013-08-01), and the Subcontracted or partnership UKPRN has been returned (

LearningDelivery.PartnerUKPRN


 is known), then the Percentage not taught by this institution must be returned

(error where

 LearningDeliveryHE.PCOLAB


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: MSTUFEE_02
ErrorMessage: The Major source of tuition fees is not valid for this Learning start date
Intent: This rule ensures that the Major source of tuition fees is returned on an applicable learning aim when the HE dataset is returned
Guidance:
Ensure that, if the 

MSTUFEE 

code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: The Learning start date must not be after the 'Valid to' date in the Major source of tuition fees lookup table
DetailedDescription:
The Learning start date must not be after the 'Valid to' date in the Major source of tuition fees lookup table

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


>  'Valid to' in ILR_MSTUFEE for this 

LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: MSTUFEE_01
ErrorMessage: The Major source of tuition fees is not valid
Intent: This rule ensures that the Major source of tuition fees is returned on an applicable learning aim when the HE dataset is returned
Guidance:
Ensure that, if the 

MSTUFEE 

code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned, then the Major source of tuition fees must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), then the Major source of tuition fees must be a valid lookup

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.MSTUFEE


 <> valid lookup in ILR_MSTUFEE)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: STULOAD_04
ErrorMessage: The Student instance FTE must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that the Student FTE is returned on an applicable learning aim when the HE dataset is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the STULOAD code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned, and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013, then the Student instance FTE must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2013-08-01), then the Student instance FTE must be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.STULOAD


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: OrigLearnStartDate_06
ErrorMessage: The Learning aim reference is Adult skills funded and is not valid in the LARS database on this Original learning start date
Intent: This rule ensures that the learning aim is valid for study on the learners original start date under funding model 35
Guidance: Check the validity start date and end date in LARS ensuring that the aim is valid on the original start date recorded in the ILR, if the aim is not valid on the date recorded in the ILR the original learner start date must not be used.
Description: If the Original learning start date is returned and the aim is Adult skills funded then the Original learning start date must be between the validity start date and end date in the LARS database for this learning aim
DetailedDescription:
If the Original learning start date is returned (LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is known), and the aim is Adult skills funded (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 35), then the Original learning start date must be between the validity start date and end date in the LARS database for this learning aim 


(error where there is no record where LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate is between LARS_StartDate and LARS_EndDate in the LARS_Validity table where (LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = ADULT_SKILLS, UNEMPLOYED or OLASS_ADULT)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by apprenticeships (DD07= Y)
Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_130
ErrorMessage: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that aim starts on or after 1 August 2024 that are Adult Skills Fund funded, where the learner is aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim, are recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim start is on or after 1 August 2024 and is Adult Skills Fund funded, and where the learner is aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim, and has a prior attainment of level 2 or above, full funding is not claimed where the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold and the LARS aim learning delivery category is 37
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2024 and are Adult Skills Fund funded, and where learning delivery category is 37  for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim, and has a prior attainment of level 2 or above, full funding cannot be claimed if the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01) and are Adult Skills Fund funded  (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38), and where learning delivery category is 37  for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim ((

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


) >= 19 years and <=23 years), and has a prior attainment of level 2 or above (

PriorAttain.PriorLevel


 = 4, 6, 7, 8, 9, 10,  97 or 98), full funding cannot be claimed if the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1) and there is no record of (error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 391 on the same learning aim)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered for: Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)


English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))


Essential Digital Skill (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 43 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))


Digital Functional Skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 44 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null)


Combined authorities (DD35 = Y))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_129
ErrorMessage: The start date of the learning aim must be between the effective dates of the Free Courses for Jobs category code 56
Intent: To ensure that 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' aims are recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and is combined authority funded, the learning start date of the aim is between the Effective dates of the LARS category code 'Free Courses for Jobs MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications'
Description: If the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and is a combined authority, then the learning start date of the aim must be between the Effective dates of the LARS category code 'Free Courses for Jobs MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications'
DetailedDescription:
If the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and is a combined authority, then the learning start date of the aim must be between the Effective dates of the LARS category code 'Free Courses for Jobs MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications.'

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378 and DD35 = Y and LARS_CategoryRef = 56 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <  LARS_EffectiveFrom or > LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory))
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by: Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)

National Skills Fund Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs rate 1 (LARS_CategoryRef = 45)

National Skills Fund Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs rate 2  (LARS_CategoryRef = 46)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_128
ErrorMessage: The funding model for LDM 396 must be 81
Intent: To ensure that 'Project S Pilot for Skills Bootcamps' aims are recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where the 'Project S Pilot for Skills Bootcamps' learning delivery monitoring code is returned, the aim is 'Other Adult' funded
Description: If the 'Project S Pilot for Skills Bootcamps' learning delivery monitoring code is returned, then the aim must be Other Adult agency funded
DetailedDescription:
If the 'Project S Pilot for Skills Bootcamps' learning delivery monitoring code is returned, then the aim must be Other Adult agency funded. 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 396 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> 81)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_127
ErrorMessage: The funding model for LDM 395 must be 38
Intent: To ensure that 'Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers' aims are recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim has the 'Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers' learning delivery monitoring code returned, the aim is Adult Skills Fund funded
Description: If the 'Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned, then the aim must be Adult Skills Fund funded
DetailedDescription:
If the 'Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned, then the aim must be Adult Skills Fund funded 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


  = 395 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <>38)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_126
ErrorMessage: For Tailored learning starts from the 1st of August 2024 an ACL code is required
Intent: To ensure that  Tailored learning funded aims are recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim start is on or after to 1 August 2024 and funded by Tailored learning (Funding model 11), an ACL code is returned on the aim record
Description: From the 1st of August 2024 new Tailored learning starts on Funding model 11 must have an ACL code returned
DetailedDescription:
From the 1st of August 2024 new Tailored learning starts on Funding model 11 must have an ACL code returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 11 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACL has not been returned)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_125
ErrorMessage: The learning aim is not valid for Adult Skills Fund funding
Intent: To ensure that Adult skills funding is used for the correct aims, levels and learner age categories
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim start is on or after to 1 August 2024 and the learner is aged 24 or over at the start of the aim and are Adult Skills Fund funded, and for aims that are level 3 and in the entitlement category, and where the Free Courses for Jobs Learning delivery monitoring code has not been returned, the aim is not Adult Skills Fund funded
Description: For starts after 31 July 2024 and are Adult Skills Fund funded for learners aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim, for aims that are level 3 and in the entitlement category, and where the Free Courses for Jobs Learning delivery monitoring code has not been returned, the aim cannot be Adult Skills Fund funded
DetailedDescription:
For starts after 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > 2024-07-31)  and are Adult Skills Fund funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38)  for learners aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim ((

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


) >= 24 years), for aims that are level 3 (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 3) and in the entitlement category (LARS_CategoryRef  = 38), and where the Free Courses for Jobs Learning delivery monitoring code has not been returned  the aim cannot be Adult Skills Fund funded  

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > 2024-07-31 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 >= 24 years and 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 3 and LARS_CategoryRef  = 38 and there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


= 378)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered for: Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)


Full Funding for learners in devolved areas  (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 023)


Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 395)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_123
ErrorMessage: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that Adult skills funding is used for the correct aims, levels and learner age categories
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim start is on or after to 1 August 2024 and the learner is aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim and are Adult Skills Fund funded, full funding is not claimed where the aims are level 2 or below and the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2024, where learning delivery category is not 37 and are Adult Skills Fund funded, for learners aged between 19-23 at the start of the aim, for aims that are level 2 or below, full funding cannot be claimed if the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01) and where learning delivery category is not 37 and are Adult Skills Fund funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38), for learners aged between 19-23 at the start of the aim ((

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


) >= 19 years and <=23 years), for aims that are level 2 or below (LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = E, 1, or 2 where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef), full funding cannot be claimed if the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1 and there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 391 on the same learning aim)
Exclusions:
This is not triggered for: Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES),


English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null)),
 
Essential Digital Skill (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 43 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))


Digital Functional Skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 44 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null)


Combined authorities (DD35 = Y)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_122
ErrorMessage: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that Adult skills funding is used for the correct aims, levels and learner age categories
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim start is on or after to 1 August 2024 and the learner is aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim and are Adult Skills Fund funded, full funding is not claimed where the aims are level 2 and not in the entitlement category and the, and the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold
Description: For starts after 31 July 2024 and are Adult Skills Fund funded for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim, for aims that are level 2 and not in the entitlement category and the, and the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold, full funding cannot be claimed
DetailedDescription:
For starts after 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > 2024-07-31) and are Adult Sklls Fund funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38) for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim ((

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


) >= 19 years and <=23 years), for aims that are level 2 (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 2) and not in the entitlement category and the  (LARS_CategoryRef  <> 37), and the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold (there is no record of LearningDeliveryFAM provided with 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 391) full funding cannot be claimed

(error where (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1)
Exclusions:
Exclusions: Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)


English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))
