Full Funding for learners in devolved areas  (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = 023)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_124
ErrorMessage: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that Adult skills funding is used for the correct aims, levels and learner age categories
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim start is on or after to 1 August 2024 and the learner is aged over 24 at the start of the aim and are Adult Skills Fund funded, full funding is not claimed where the aim is level 2 or below and the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold
Description: For starts after 31 July 2024 and are Adult Skills Fund funded, for learners aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim, is a level 2 or below learning aim and the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold, full funding cannot be claimed
DetailedDescription:
For starts after 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > 2024-07-31)  and are Adult Skills Fund funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38), for learners aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim ((

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


) >= 24 years), is a level 2 or below learning aim (LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = E, 1, or 2 where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef) and the learner is not earning below the earnings threshold (there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 391) full funding cannot be claimed


(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1)
Exclusions:
Exclusions: Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)


English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))


Full Funding for learners in devolved areas (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 023)


Essential Digital Skill (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 43 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))


Digital Functional Skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 44 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_121
ErrorMessage: A valid LARS category code must be returned for this LDM code
Intent: To ensure that the  'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' LDM code has been used for the correct aims
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim start is on or after to 1 August 2024 and the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim is Adult Skills Fund funded, the aim has LARS category codes 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 1', 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 2', 'National Skills Funding Level 3 Offer - short qualification or 'Free Courses for Jobs  MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications'
Description: For starts on or after to 1 August 2024 if the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim is Adult Skills Fund funded the aim must have LARS category codes 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 1', 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 2', 'National Skills Funding Level 3 Offer - short qualification or 'Free Courses for Jobs  MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications'
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after to 1 August 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01) if the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim is Adult Skills Fund funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38) the aim must have LARS category codes 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 1', 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 2', 'National Skills Funding Level 3 Offer - short qualification or 'Free Courses for Jobs  MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications'

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38 and LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_CategoryRef  <> 45, 46, 49 or 56)
Exclusions:
Excluding: Project S Pilot for Adult Skills Fund Providers (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 95)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_120
ErrorMessage: LDM382 and LDM391 must be recorded on the same Learning aim
Intent: To ensure that the Free Courses for Jobs Learning delivery monitoring code is used correctly
Guidance: For starts on or after the 1 August 2024 where the Free Courses for Jobs Learning delivery monitoring code has been returned on a learning aim then the Learning delivery monitoring code for the Earnings Threshold must be returned on the same learning aim
Description: For starts on or after the 1 August 2024 where the Free Courses for Jobs Learning delivery monitoring code has been returned on a learning aim then the Learning delivery monitoring code for the Earnings Threshold must be returned on the same learning aim
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after the 1 August 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01) where the Free Courses for Jobs Learning delivery monitoring code has been returned on a learning aim then the Learning delivery monitoring code for the Earnings Threshold must be returned on the same learning aim.

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


  >= 2024-08-01 and there is a record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and

 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378 and there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 391 on the same learning aim)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_119
ErrorMessage: For Community learning starts from the 1st of August 2023 an ACL code is required
Intent: To ensure that ACL codes are returned for Community learning aims
Guidance: Ensure that, for Community learning starts from the 1 August 2023, an ACL code is returned
Description: From the 1 August 2023 new community learning starts on funding model 10 must have an ACL code returned
DetailedDescription:
From the 1 August 2023 new community learning starts on funding model 10 must have an ACL code returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2023-08-01 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 10 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACL has not been returned)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_118
ErrorMessage: If the T Level Programme Type has been returned the Source of Funding must be 16-19
Intent: To ensure that T Levels are returned with the correct Source of Funding
Guidance: Ensure that, if the T Level programme type has been returned, the Source of funding is 16-19 funded
Description: If the T Level programme type has been returned, the Source of funding must be 16-19
DetailedDescription:
If the T Level programme type has been returned (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 31), the Source of funding must be 16-19

(error where 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 31 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 <> 107)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_117
ErrorMessage: The aim must be a regulated qualification or be a non regulated aim that forms part of the 2023 AEB procurement when using LDM 388
Intent: To ensure that the Procured 'Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB)' LDM code is used on the correct aims
Guidance: Ensure that,  if the Procured 'Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB)' LDM code is returned, the aim is a regulated qualification or an AEB Procurement 2023 non-regulated learning aim
Description: If Learning Delivery Monitoring code for the Procured Adult Education Budget procurement 2023 has been returned then it must be a regulated qualification or be an AEB Procurement 2023 non-regulated learning aim
DetailedDescription:
If Learning Delivery Monitoring code for the Procured Adult Education Budget procurement 2023 (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


= 388) has been returned then it must be a regulated qualification (LearningDeliveryGenre = EOQ, EOU, EQQ) or be an AEB Procurement 2023 non-regulated learning aim.

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


= 388 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and (LARS_LearningDeliveryGenre <> EOQ, EOU, EQQ or LARS_CategoryRef  <> 65))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_116
ErrorMessage: LDM388 can only be recorded on Funding models 35, 10, 11 or 38, be Adult funded and a programme type must not be returned
Intent: To ensure that the Procured 'Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB)' LDM code is used on the correct aims
Guidance: Ensure that,  if the Procured 'Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB)' LDM code is returned, the aim is Funding model 35, 38, 11 or 10, the source of funding is Adult funded, and the Programme type is not returned
Description: If the Learning Delivery Monitoring code for Procured 'Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB)' is returned, then the aim must be a Funding model 35, 38, 11 or 10, the source of funding must be Adult funded and the programme type must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery Monitoring code for Procured 'Adult Education Budget 2023 (AEB)' (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


= 388) is returned, then the aim must be a Funding model 35, 38, 11 or 10, the source of funding must be Adult funded and the programme type must not be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 388
and (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> 35, 10, 11 or 38 or (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 <> 105) or 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 is returned))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_115
ErrorMessage: LDM379 and LDM388 cannot be recorded on the same Learning aim
Intent: To ensure that LDM code 379 and 388 are not returned on the same aim
Guidance: Ensure that, the Learning delivery monitoring code for the Adult Education Budget procurement 2021 and the Adult Education Budget procurement 2023 Learning delivery monitoring code are not returned on the same learning aim
Description: Where the Learning delivery monitoring code for the Adult Education Budget procurement 2021 has been returned on a learning aim, then the Adult Education Budget procurement 2023 Learning delivery monitoring code must not be returned on the same learning aim
DetailedDescription:
Where the Learning delivery monitoring code for the Adult Education Budget procurement 2021 has been returned on a learning aim, then the Adult Education Budget procurement 2023 Learning delivery monitoring code must not be returned on the same learning aim.

(error where there is a record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 379 and there is a record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 388 on the same learning aim)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_114
ErrorMessage: The start date of the learning aim must be between the effective dates of the Free Courses for Jobs category codes
Intent: To ensure that the Free Courses for Jobs LDM code is used on the correct dates
Guidance: Ensure that,  if the aim start is on or prior to 31 July 2024 and the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim is ESFA funded, the learning start date of the aim is between the Effective dates of the LARS category codes 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 1', 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 2'
Description: For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 and if the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and is ESFA funded, then the learning start date of the aim must be between the Effective dates of the LARS category codes 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 1', 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 2'
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31) and if the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and is ESFA funded, then the learning start date of the aim must be between the Effective dates of the LARS category codes 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 1', 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 2'.

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31 and  

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378 and DD35 = N and LARS_CategoryRef = 45 or 46 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <  LARS_EffectiveFrom or > LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_113
ErrorMessage: The funding model for the Adult T level Pilot must be 81
Intent: To ensure that the the correct funding indicator is used for LDM code 384
Guidance: Ensure that, where LDM code 384 is recorded, the funding model is 81
Description: If LDM code 384 is recorded then the funding model must be 81
DetailedDescription:
If LDM code 384 is recorded then the funding model must be 81

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 384 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> 81)

Intent: To ensure that the the correct funding indicator is used for Skills Bootcamp programmes
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim is Skills Bootcamps, the Source of funding record is Adult funding
Description: For Skills Bootcamps, the Source of funding record must be Adult
DetailedDescription:
For Skills Bootcamps (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32), the Source of funding record must be Adult

(error where

 = 32 and there is no record of

 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 <> 105)

Name: LearnDelFAMType_111
ErrorMessage: The Full or co-funding indicator must be returned for this Programme Type
Intent: To ensure that the the correct full or co-funding indicator is used for Skills Bootcamps programmes
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim is Skills Bootcamps, the full or co-funding indicator is returned
Description: If the learning aim is Skills Bootcamps, the full or co-funding indicator must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is Skills Bootcamps (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32), the full or co-funding indicator must be returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32 and there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI)

Name: LearnDelFAMType_110
ErrorMessage: A valid Source of funding indicator must be returned for this LARS category code
Intent: To ensure that Combined Authority funding is used for the correct aims
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim record has 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code returned and the aim has LARS category code 'Free Courses for Jobs  MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications', the Source of funding indicator is a Combined Authority
Description: If the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim has LARS category code 'Free Courses for Jobs  MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications' then the Source of funding indicator must be a Combined Authority
DetailedDescription:
If the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim has LARS category code 'Free Courses for Jobs  MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications' then the Source of funding indicator must be a Combined Authority.

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378
and DD35 = N and LARS_CategoryRef  = 56 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >=  LARS_EffectiveFrom and <= LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)

Name: LearnDelFAMType_109
ErrorMessage: This programme type cannot be used for this source of funding indicator
Intent: To ensure that Combined Authority funding is used for the correct aims
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim is Combined Authority funded, it is not an Apprenticeship, a Traineeship or a T Level programme
Description: If Combined Authority Source of funding indicator has been returned then the aim must not be an Apprenticeship, a Traineeship or a T Level programme
DetailedDescription:
If Combined Authority Source of funding indicator has been returned (DD35 = Y) then the aim must not be an Apprenticeship, a Traineeship or a T Level programme.

(error where DD35 = Y and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 2, 3, 20, 21, 22, 23, 25, 24, 30 or 31)

Name: LearnDelFAMType_108
ErrorMessage: LDM 382 and LDM 378 must be recorded on the same Learning aim
Intent: To ensure that the Free Courses for Jobs (Level 3 Offer) for Low Wage Learners and the Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs LDM codes are used together
Guidance: Ensure that,  if the aim start is on or prior to 31 July 2024 and the Learning delivery monitoring code for Free Courses for Jobs (Level 3 Offer) for Low Wage Learners (LDM 382) has been returned on a learning aim, the Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs Learning delivery monitoring code (LDM 378) is returned on the same aim
Description: For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 where the Learning delivery monitoring code for Free Courses for Jobs (Level 3 Offer) for Low Wage Learners has been returned on a learning aim, then the Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs Learning delivery monitoring code must be returned on the same learning aim
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31) where the Learning delivery monitoring code for Free Courses for Jobs (Level 3 Offer) for Low Wage Learners has been returned on a learning aim, then the Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs Learning delivery monitoring code must be returned on the same learning aim

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31 and there is a record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 382 and there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378 on the same learning aim)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_106
ErrorMessage: LDM 320 and 321 must only be recorded for learners who are 14
Intent: To ensure that the LDM code 320 and 321 are used in the correct valid format
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learner is direct FE funded (LDM 320) or a home schooling (LDM 321), they are aged 14 or over on 31 August of the current academic year
Description: If the learner is direct FE funded LDM320 or a home schooling LDM321 the Learner must be aged 14
DetailedDescription:
If the learner is direct FE funded LDM 320 or a home schooling LDM 321 the Learner must be aged 14 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 320 or 321 and 

Learner.DateofBirth


 < 14 years on the 31 August)

Name: LearnDelFAMType_105
ErrorMessage: LDM379 can only be recorded on Funding models 35 or 10, be Adult funded and a programme type must not be returned
Intent: To ensure that the LDM code for 'Procured Adult Education Budget 2021 (AEB)' is used correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Learning Delivery Monitoring code for 'Procured Adult Education Budget 2021 (AEB)' is returned, the aim must be a Funding model 35 or 10, the source of funding must be Adult funded, and there must not be a programme type returned
Description: If the Learning Delivery Monitoring code for 'Procured Adult Education Budget 2021 (AEB)' is returned, then the aim must be a Funding model 35 or 10, the source of funding must be Adult funded and the programme type must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery Monitoring code for 'Procured Adult Education Budget 2021 (AEB)' (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 379) is returned, then the aim must be a Funding model 35 or 10, the source of funding must be Adult funded and the programme type must not be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 379 and (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> 35 or 10) or (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 <> 105) or (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 is returned))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_107
ErrorMessage: LDM code 320, 321 and 381 are only used for funding model 25 and 82
Intent: To ensure that the LDM codes are used within the correct date range To ensure that the correct Funding model is used in conjunction with LDM code 320, 321 or 381
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim record has LDM 320, 321 or 381 recorded, the Funding model is 25 or 82
Description: If LDM 320, 321 or 381 are recorded then the Funding model must be 25 or 82
DetailedDescription:
If LDM 320, 321 or 381 are recorded then the Funding model must be 25 or 82

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 320, 321 or 381 and  

LearningDelivery.FundMode


l <> 25 or 82)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_104
ErrorMessage: The FAM type and code is not valid for this Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that the LDM codes are used within the correct date range
Guidance: Ensure that, the Learning start date is not before the 'EffectiveFrom' date for the Learning delivery monitoring code in the ILR Lookup SubCategory table
Description: The Learning start date must not be before the 'EffectiveFrom' date for the Learning delivery monitoring code in the ILR Lookup SubCategory table
DetailedDescription:
The Learning start date must not be before the 'EffectiveFrom' date for the Learning delivery monitoring code in the ILR Lookup SubCategory table

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < LookupSubCategory.EffectiveFrom where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LookupSubCategory.Name = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = LookupSubCategory.Code where the LookupSubCategory.EffectiveFrom is not null)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered where LDM = 368 or 369 (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 368 or 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 369)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FUNDCOMP_01
ErrorMessage: The Completion of year of instance is not valid
Intent: This rule ensures that the Completion in year instance is a valid lookup in the ILR specification if returned.
Guidance: Ensure that, if the FUNDCOMP code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If returned the Completion of year of instance must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDCOMP


 is returned) then the Completion of year of instance must be a valid lookup

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDCOMP


 <> valid lookup in ILR_FundComp)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered where:
OfSProviders.HEFundingFieldsRequired = 0
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FUNDLEV_04
ErrorMessage: The Level applicable to Funding Council HESES is not valid for this type of learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that the FUNDLEV is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, if the FUNDLEV code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2024, then Level Applicable to Funding Council HESES must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


>= 2024-08-01), then Level Applicable to Funding Council HESES must be returned

(error where
Learning Delivery HE data set is returned
and


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01
and
LearningDeliveryHE.Level Applicable to Funding Council HESES is null or not returned
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered where:
OfSProviders.HEFundingFieldsRequired = 0
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FUNDLEV_03
ErrorMessage: The Level applicable to Funding Council HESES is not valid for this type of learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that the FUNDLEV is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, if the FUNDLEV code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 and the learning aim type in the LARS database is an Postgraduate learning aim then the Level applicable to Funding Council HESES field should be 'Postgraduate' or 'Not in HESES population'
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


=> 2009-08-01), and the learning aim type in the LARS database is a postgraduate learning aim (LARS_LearnAimRefType = (0393, 1410, 2001, 9100, 9101, 9109, E008, 1411, 1412 or 9103) where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef), then the Level applicable to funding council HESES should be 'postgraduate' or 'Not in HESES population'

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDLEV


 <> 20, 21, 30, 31 or 99)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FUNDLEV_02
ErrorMessage: The Level applicable to Funding Council HESES is not valid for this type of learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that the FUNDLEV is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, if the FUNDLEV code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 and the learning aim type in the LARS database is an undergraduate learning aim then the Level applicable to Funding Council HESES field should be 'undergraduate' or 'Not in HESES population'
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


=> 2009-08-01), and the learning aim type in the LARS database is an undergraduate learning aim (LARS_LearnAimRefType = (0394, 1406, 1407, 1408, 9000, 9002, 9107, E007, 9112, 9111, 9110 or 9113) where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef 


= LARS_LearnAimRef), then the Level applicable to Funding Council HESES field should be 'undergraduate' or 'Not in HESES population' (error where

 LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDLEV 


<> 10, 11 or 99)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FUNDLEV_01
ErrorMessage: The Level applicable to Funding Council HESES is not a valid code
Intent: This rule ensures that the FUNDLEV is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, if the FUNDLEV code is recorded correctly and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If returned then the Level applicable to Funding Council HESES must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDLEV 


is returned) then the Level applicable to Funding Council HESES must be a valid lookup (error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDLEV 


<> valid lookup in ILR_FundLev)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_100
ErrorMessage: LDM378 can only be returned on aims starting on or after 1st April 2021
Intent: To ensure that the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' LDM code is used in the correct context
Guidance: Ensure that, where Learning Delivery Monitoring code for 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' is returned,  the aim Start date must be on or after 01 April 2021
Description: If Learning Delivery Monitoring code for Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs is returned, then Learning Aim Start Date must be on or after 1st April 2021
DetailedDescription:
If Learning Delivery Monitoring code for Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378) is returned, then Learning Aim Start Date must be on or after 1st April 2021

(error where error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < 2021-04-01)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: MODESTUD_03
ErrorMessage: The Mode of study is not valid for this Special fee indicator
Intent: This rule ensures that the mode of study is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, if the SPECFEE code is recorded as 4 or 5 then the MODESTUD must be recorded as code 3
Description: If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009, and the Special fee indicator field is 'final year of a full-time course lasting less than 24 weeks' then the Mode of study field must be 'part-time'
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2009-08-01), and the Special fee indicator field is 'final year of a full-time course lasting less than 24 weeks' (

LearningDeliveryHE.SPECFEE


 = 4 or 5), then the Mode of study field must be 'part-time'

(error where

 LearningDeliveryHE.MODESTUD


 <> 3
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: MODESTUD_01
ErrorMessage: The Mode of study is not a valid code
Intent: This rule ensures that the mode of study is valid in the ILR specification
Guidance: Ensure that, the code used in the mode of study field is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned, then the Mode of study must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), then the Mode of study must be a valid lookup (error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.MODESTUD


 <> valid lookup ILR_ModeStud)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_99
ErrorMessage: A valid LDM code must be returned for this LARS category code
Intent: To ensure that the 'Adult Level 3 Offer' learning delivery monitoring code is returned for valid aims only
Guidance: Ensure that,  if the aim has LARS category code 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer only' and is Adult skills funded, for starts on or prior to 31 July 2024, the aim must have the 'Adult Level 3 Offer' learning delivery monitoring code
Description: For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 and if the aim in Adult skills funded and the aim has LARS category code 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer only', the aim must have the  'Adult Level 3 Offer' learning delivery monitoring code
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31) and if the aim in Adult skills funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35) and the aim has LARS category code 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer only', the aim must have the  'Adult Level 3 Offer' learning delivery monitoring code

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_CategoryRef  = 48 and no Learning Delivery Funding and Monitoring (FAM) record exists where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378)
Exclusions: This rule is not triggered by Combined authorities DD35=Y
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: TYPEYR_02
ErrorMessage: The Type of instance year is not valid for this Completion of year of instance
Intent: This rule ensures that type of instance is recorded correctly if the learning actual end date has been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, the type of instance is recorded as 1 if the actual end date is in the same academic year as the learning start date and the completion of year of instance is recorded as code 1
Description: If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 the Learning start date and Learning actual end date are in the same academic year  and the Completion of year of instance is code 1, then the Type of instance year must be code 1
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2009 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


=> 2009-08-01), the Learning start date and Learning actual end date are in the same academic year (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


AND 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 = same academic year), and the Completion of year of instance is code 1 (

LearningDeliveryHE.FUNDCOMP


 = 1), then the Type of instance year must be code 1

(error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.TYPEYR


 <> 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_98
ErrorMessage: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' aims are returned correctly
Guidance: Ensure that,  if the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim is Adult skills funded, and the aim start is on or prior to 31 July 2024, the aim must have LARS category code 45, 46, 49 or 56
Description: For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 and if the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim is Adult skills funded, the aim must have LARS category codes 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 1', 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 2', 'National Skills Funding Level 3 Offer - short qualification or 'Free Courses for Jobs  MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications'
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31) and if the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned and the aim is Adult skills funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35) the aim must have LARS category codes 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 1', 'National Skills Fund Level 3 Adult Offer rate 2', 'National Skills Funding Level 3 Offer - short qualification or 'Free Courses for Jobs  MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications'

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_CategoryRef  <> 45, 46, 49 or 56)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and CategoryRef = 48
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_97
ErrorMessage: This source of funding indicator and funding model is not valid for this DAM code
Intent: To ensure that the Procured Devolved Adult Education area monitoring code is used in the correct context
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Procured Devolved Adult Education area monitoring code is returned, the Funding model cannot be Adult skills where the Source of funding record is Adult, on the same learning aim
Description: If Procured Devolved Adult Education Devolved area monitoring code is returned then the Funding model must not be Adult skills and the Source of funding record must not be Adult on the same learning aim
DetailedDescription:
If Procured Devolved Adult Education Devolved area monitoring code (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 002) is returned then the Funding model must not be Adult skills and the Source of funding record must not be Adult on the same learning aim

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 002 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 and  

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 105 on the same learning aim)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: TYPEYR_01
ErrorMessage: The Type of instance year is not a valid code
Intent: This rule ensures that type of instance is a valid look up in the ILR specification
Guidance: Ensure that, the type of instance is a valid look up in the ILR specification
Description: If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned, then the Type of instance year must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE is known), then the Type of instance year must be a valid lookup (error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.TYPEYR 


<> valid lookup in ILR_TypeYr)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_92
ErrorMessage: An ACT 2 record must not be returned on programme aims
Intent: To ensure that code ACT 2 is not used for programme starts on or after 1 April 2021
Guidance: Ensure that, for starts on or after 1 April 2021, only ACT 1 is used. ACT 2 must not be returned on programme aims
Description: For starts on or after 1 April 2021, an ACT 2 record must not be returned on programme aims
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 April 2021 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2021-04-01), an ACT 2 record must not be returned on programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1)

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2021-04-01 and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 and there is a record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 2)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_91
ErrorMessage: The source of funding must not be returned when the Advanced Learner Loans indicator has been recorded
Intent: To ensure that Advanced Learner Loans aims do not have a Source of funding indicator returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Advanced Learner Loans indicator has been returned and the learning aim is non-funded, the Source of funding indicator cannot be returned
Description: If the Advanced Learner Loans indicator has been returned and the learning aim is non-funded then the Source of funding indicator must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Advanced Learner Loans indicator has been returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ADL) and the learning aim is non-funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


= 99) then the Source of funding indicator must not be returned


(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ADL and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99 and there is a record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: QUALENT3_03
ErrorMessage: The Qualification on entry is not a valid code for this Learning start date
Intent: This rule ensures that Qualification on entry is valid in the ILR specification and the code does not have an end date
Guidance: Ensure that, the qualification on entry is returned for this HE learning aim and is valid and not passed the valid to date in the ILR specification
Description: If returned, the Learning start date must not be after the 'Valid to' date in the Qualification on entry lookup table
DetailedDescription:
If returned (LearningDeliveryHE.QUALENT3 is known), the Learning start date must not be after the 'Valid to' date in the Qualification on entry lookup table 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > 'Valid_To' date in ILR_QualEnt3 for this LearningDeliveryHE.QUALENT3)
Exclusions: This rule is not triggered by restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: QUALENT3_02
ErrorMessage: The Qualification on entry is not a valid code
Intent: This rule ensures that Qualification on entry is valid in the ILR specification
Guidance: Ensure that, the qualification on entry is returned for this HE learning aim and is valid in the ILR specification
Description: If returned, the Qualification on entry, must be a valid lookup
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Qualification on entry (

LearningDeliveryHE.QUALENT3


 is known), must be a valid lookup (error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.QUALENT3


 <> valid lookup in ILR_QualEnt3
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: QUALENT3_01
ErrorMessage: The Qualification on entry must be returned for this learning aim
Intent: This rule ensures that Qualification on entry is returned for this HE learning aim
Guidance: Ensure that, the qualification on entry is returned for this HE learning aim
Description: If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned, and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2010 then the Qualification on entry must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery HE data set is returned (

LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryHE


 is known), and the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2010 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2010-08-01), then the Qualification on entry must be returned (error where LearningDeliveryHE.QUALENT3 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: SSN_03
ErrorMessage: As the Student Support Number has not been recorded then the Net Tuition Fee and Gross Tuition Fee should be returned
Intent: This rule ensures that GROSSFEE and NETFEE fields are populated if the SSN number has been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, the GROSSFEE and NETFEE fields are populated as the SSN number has been returned
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2021, if the Student Support Number is not returned then the Net Tuition Fee and the Gross Tuition Fee should be returned.
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2021 

(LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2021-08-01), if the Student Support Number is not returned then the Net Tuition Fee and the Gross Tuition Fee should be returned. Error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2021-08-01 and

 LearningDeliveryHE.SSN 


is not returned and (

LearningDeliveryHE.NETFEE


 is not returned or 

LearningDeliveryHE.GROSSFEE


 is not returned)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: SSN_02
ErrorMessage: The Student support number does not pass the checksum calculation
Intent: This rule ensures that the SSN number is recorded correctly
Guidance: Check the SSN number recorded in the ILR is correct and matches the validation specified in the ILR specification
Description: If returned, the Student support number must pass the checksum calculation
DetailedDescription:
If returned (

LearningDeliveryHE.SSN


 is known), the Student support number must pass the checksum calculation (error where 

LearningDeliveryHE.SSN


 must pass the checksum as detailed at https://www.hesa.ac.uk/collection/c17051/a/ssn)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: DD39
ErrorMessage: N/A
Intent: This shows the Derived data criteria to match a learning aim to the previous year
Description: Matching a learning aim to the latest return of the previous year
DetailedDescription:
Using a combination of:
LearningProvider.UKPRN
                Learner.PrevUKPRN
                Learner.PMUKPRN

Find the corresponding learner using a combination of:
                Learner.LearnRefNumer
                Learner.PrevLearnRefNumber

Where the following characteristics match:
Learner.ULN      
LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate
LearningDelivery.FundModel
LearningDelivery.ProgType (if known)
LearningDelivery.FWorkCode (if known)
LearningDelivery.PWayCode (if known)
LearningDelivery.StdCode (if known)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - This rule has been deleted

Name: Outcome_12
ErrorMessage: If the Learning Actual End Date has been returned then the Outcome must be returned
Intent: This rule ensures that an outcome is recorded when a learners actual end date is reported in the ILR
Guidance: If the learners actual end date is recorded in the ILR an outcome must be recorded, if the outcome is not yet known code 8 should be recorded.
Description: If the Learning Actual End Date has been returned then the Outcome must be returned.
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Actual End Date has been returned then the Outcome must be returned. 


(error where: there is a record of 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 and there is no record of 

LearningDelivery.Outcome


)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - New rule at version 3

Name: LearnAimRef_145
ErrorMessage: The Learning aim reference is not valid in the LARS database for this Funding model and this Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that only aims valid for Adult Skills Fund - Free Courses for Jobs provision are recorded
Guidance: Ensure that, for new starts on or after 1 August 2024, that are not restarts) and are Free Courses for Jobs provision, the learning aim start date must not be before the validity start date or be after the last date for new starts for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database, as shown through the FALA service
Description: For new starts on or after 1 August 2024 and are Free Courses for Jobs provision, then the learning aim start date must not be before the validity start date or be after the last date for new starts (unless the restart indicator is present) for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database
DetailedDescription:
For new starts on or after 1 August 2024 and are Free Courses for Jobs provision, then the learning aim start date must not be before the validity start date or be after the last date for new starts (unless the restart indicator is present) for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database.

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


  = 378 and (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < LARS_StartDate in the LARS Validity table or 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > LARS_LastNewStartDate in the LARS_Validity table and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES does not exist) where (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = FCFJ_ADULT_SKILLS))
Exclusions: Free Courses for Jobs MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications  (LARS_CategoryRef = 56)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - An exclusion has been added to this rule to not trigger on Free Courses for Jobs MCA and GLA only flexible delivery qualifications

Name: LearnAimRef_99
ErrorMessage: The Learning aim reference is not valid in the LARS database for this Funding model for this teaching year
Intent: To ensure that Apprenticeship component learning aims are returned for the correct valid dates in the LARS service
Guidance: Ensure that, for learning aims ending on or after 1 August 2020 that are Apprenticeship funded component aims, the Learning Actual end date of the aim must be before the validity end date for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database, shown through the FALA service
Description: For learning aims ending on or after 1 August 2020 and are Apprenticeship funded component aims then the Learning Actual End Date of the aim must be before the validity end date for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database
DetailedDescription:
For learning aims ending on or after 1 August 2020 and are Apprenticeship funded component aims then the Learning Actual End Date of the aim must be before the validity end date for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database. 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 >= 2020-08-01 and DD07 = Y and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3
and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 or 36 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 >  LARS_EndDate in the LARS_Validity table where (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = APPRENTICESHIPS))
Exclusions:
This rule excludes Apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.Progtype


 = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - This rule has been deleted at version 3

Name: LearnAimRef_98
ErrorMessage: The Learning aim reference is not valid in the LARS database for this Funding model and this Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that Apprenticeship component learning aims are returned for the correct valid dates in the LARS service
Guidance: Ensure that, for learning aims ending on or after 1 August 2020 that are Apprenticeship funded component aims, the Learning start date of the aim is between the validity dates in the Validity table in the LARS database, shown through the FALA service
Description: For learning aims ending on or after 1 August 2020, that are Apprenticeship funded component aims, the Learning start date of the aim must be between the validity start date and end date for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database
DetailedDescription:
For learning aims ending on or after 1 August 2020 and are Apprenticeship funded component aims, then the Learning start date of the aim must be between the validity start date and end date for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database.

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 >= 2020-08-01 and DD07 = Y and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3
and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 or 36 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < LARS_StartDate or >  LARS_EndDate in the LARS_Validity table where (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = APPRENTICESHIPS))
Exclusions:
This rule excludes Apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.Progtype


 = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - This rule has been deleted at version 3

Name: LearnDelFAMType_83
ErrorMessage: This LDM code is not valid for this UKPRN
Intent: To ensure that LDM codes are valid for the relevant UKPRN
Guidance: Ensure that, where a Short Funding Initiative Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned for the UKPRN, the Learning Start Date is between the Effective From date and Effective To date in the Short Term Initiative table
Description: Where a Short Funding Initiative Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned for this UKPRN, the Learning Start Date must be between the Effective From date and Effective To date in the Short Term Initiative table
DetailedDescription:
Where a Short Funding Initiative Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned for this UKPRN, the Learning Start Date must be between the Effective From date and Effective To date in the Short Term Initiative table

(error where a record exists where (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM) = ShortTermFundingInitiative.LDMCode and there is no matching record where 

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = ShortTermFundingInitiative.UKPRN and (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM) = ShortTermFundingInitiative.LDMCode and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= ShortTermFundingInitiative.EffectiveFrom and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= ShortTermFundingInitiative.EffectiveTo where the ShortTermFundingInitiative.EffectiveTo is not null)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_81
ErrorMessage: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that the Full funding indicator is only used for valid learning situations
Guidance: Ensure that, under the following circumstances full funding is not claimed; where the learner is adult skills funded,  aged 24 or over at the start of the aim, the aim start is after 31 July 2020 and on or prior to 31 July 2024, and is a level 2 or below aim
Description: For starts after 31 July 2020 and on or prior to 31 July 2024 and are adult skills funded, for learners aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim, and is a level 2 or below learning aim, full funding cannot be claimed
DetailedDescription:
For starts after 31 July 2020 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > 2020-07-31) and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31)  and are adult skills funded  (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35), for learners aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim ((

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


) >= 24 years), and is a level 2 or below learning aim (LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = E, 1, or 2 where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef), full funding cannot be claimed

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by - apprenticeships (DD07 = Y)


Traineeship non work prep/experience (DD29 = Y)


OLASS learners (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 034)


RoTL (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 328)


Learners on active benefits (DD38 = Y)


Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)


English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))


Learners in receipt of low wages (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 363) 


Full funding for learners in devolved areas (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 023)


Essential Digital Skill (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 43 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))


Digital Functional Skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 44 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_79
ErrorMessage: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that the Full funding indicator is only used for valid learning situations
Guidance: Ensure that, under the following circumstances full funding is not claimed; where the learner is adult skills funded,  aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim, the aim start is after 31 July 2020 and on or prior to 31 July 2024, and is a level 2 aim
Description: For starts after 31 July 2020 and on or prior to 31 July 2024 and are adult skills funded, for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim, for aims that are level 2, full funding cannot be claimed
DetailedDescription:
For starts after 31 July 2020 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > 2020-07-31) and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31) and are adult skills funded  (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35), for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim ((

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


) >= 19 years and <=23 years), for aims that are level 2 (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = 2) and not in the entitlement category (LARS_CategoryRef  <> 37), full funding cannot be claimed

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by - apprenticeships (DD07 = Y)


Traineeship non work prep/experience (DD29 = Y)


OLASS learners (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 034)


RoTL (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 328)


Unemployed learners on other state benefits (DD21 = Y)


Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)

Name: LearnDelFAMType_78
ErrorMessage: This funding model is not valid for this Devolved area monitoring code (DAM)
Intent: To ensure that DAM codes are only used with the correct Funding models
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Learning delivery FAM code is DAM, the funding model must be Adult skills, Adult Skills Fund, Tailored Learning or Community Learning
Description: If the FAM type is DAM, then the funding model must be Adult skills, Adult Skills Fund, Tailored Learning or Community Learning
DetailedDescription:
If the FAM type is DAM, then the funding model must be Adult skills, Adult Skills Fund, Tailored Learning or Community Learning

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and 

LearningDelivery.Fundmodel


 <> 35, 38, 11 or 10)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_77
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than six occurrences for the FAM type DAM
Intent: To ensure that there is not overuse of DAM codes in the aim record
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Learning delivery FAM code is DAM, there are no more than six occurrences
Description: If the FAM type is DAM, there must be no more than six occurrences
DetailedDescription:
If the FAM type is DAM, there must be no more than six occurrences

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and occurrences > 6)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_76
ErrorMessage: The Learning delivery monitoring code is not valid for the Source of funding returned
Intent: To ensure that the correct LDM and SOF codes are used to return OLASS learners
Guidance: Ensure that, where learning is for OLASS  Offenders in custody and the Learning delivery monitoring code has been returned, the Source of funding is Adult skills
Description: If OLASS  Offenders in custody Learning delivery monitoring code has been returned then the Source of funding must be Adult skills
DetailedDescription:
If OLASS  Offenders in custody Learning delivery monitoring code has been returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 034) then the Source of funding must be Adult skills


(error where

 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 <>105)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_75

Guidance: Ensure that, where learning is Combined Authority funded, the Learning Delivery monitoring codes, OLASS  Offenders in custody, Procured Adult Education Budget (AEB) or Learners in receipt of low wages are not used
Description: If Combined Authority Source of funding has been returned then the Learning Delivery monitoring codes, OLASS  Offenders in custody, Procured Adult Education Budget (AEB) or Learners in receipt of low wages must not be used
DetailedDescription:
If Combined Authority Source of funding has been returned (DD35 = Y) then the Learning Delivery monitoring codes, OLASS  Offenders in custody, Procured Adult Education Budget (AEB) or Learners in receipt of low wages must not be used

Name: LearnDelFAMType_69
