Name: LearnDelFAMType_57
ErrorMessage: The Full funding indicator is not valid for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that the Full funding indicator is only used for valid learning situations
Guidance: Ensure that, under the following circumstances full funding is not claimed; where the learner is adult skills funded, aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim, the aim start is prior to 1 August 2016 and the aim is level 2 or below
Description: For starts prior to 1 August 2016, adult skills funded learners, aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim, which are level 2 or below, full funding cannot be claimed
DetailedDescription:
For starts prior to 1 August 2016 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < 2016-08-01), adult skills funded learners (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35), aged 24 or over at the start of the learning aim (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


) >= 24 years), which are level 2 or below (LARS_NotionalNVQLevelv2 = E, 1, or 2 where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef), full funding cannot be claimed

(error where (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by - apprenticeships (DD07 = Y),


OLASS learners (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 034)


RoTL (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 328)


Learners on active benefits (DD12 = Y)


Unemployed learners on other state benefits (DD21 = Y)


Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)


English and maths basic skills (LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))


Trade union aims (LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory.CategoryRef = 19)


Providers with an organisation type of Specialist Designated College (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = Org_Details.UKPRN and LegalOrgType = USDC)


Steel Industries Redundancy Training (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 347)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_54
ErrorMessage: The combination of EEF and FFI codes is not valid
Intent: To ensure that the FAM Type and Funding model are compatible and valid
Guidance: Ensure that, where 'Entitlement to 16-18 apprenticeship funding' is returned, the learning aim must be fully funded
Description: If 'Entitlement to 16-18 apprenticeship funding' is returned, then the learning aim must be fully funded
DetailedDescription:
If 'Entitlement to 16-18 apprenticeship funding' is returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = EEF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 2) then the learning aim must be fully funded

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 2)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25) or (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_53
ErrorMessage: Learning delivery FAM type' is wrong. The Advanced Learner Bursary rate 1 or 3 can't be used when the aim is grant funded. Check 'FAM type' is correct
Intent: To ensure that Advanced Learner Loan Bursary rates 1 and 3 are returned for funded providers only
Guidance: Ensure that, where the returned Advanced Learner Loan Bursary rate is code 1 or 3, the provider must be a contract funded provider
Description: If Advanced Learner Loan Bursary rate 1 or 3 are recorded, then the provider must be a contract funded provider
DetailedDescription:
If Advanced Learner Loan Bursary rate 1 or 3 are recorded (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ALB and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 1) or  (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ALB and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 3), then the provider must be a contract funded provider

(error where FCT for this 

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 where ContractAllocation.FundingStreamPeriodCode = ALLBC2526)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Funding stream period code updated

Name: LearnDelFAMType_50
ErrorMessage: Learning Support Funding must not be returned for this Funding model
Intent: To ensure that the FAM Type and Funding model are compatible and valid
Guidance: Ensure that, for 16-19, Community learning and Non-funded aims, the FAM code for Learning support funding is not returned
Description: The FAM type of Learning Support Funding must not be returned for 16-19, Community learning and Non-funded aims
DetailedDescription:
The FAM type of Learning Support Funding must not be returned for 16-19, Community learning and Non-funded aims (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 25, 82, 10, or 99)

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LSF)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_46
ErrorMessage: The Funding model must be Adult skills or Adult Skills Fund
Intent: To ensure that the FAM Type and Funding model are compatible and valid
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Learning Delivery FAM Type is Family English, Maths or Language, the funding model is Adult skills or Adult Skills Fund
Description: If the Learning Delivery FAM Type is Family English, Maths or Language, then the funding model must be Adult skills or Adult Skills Fund
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning Delivery FAM Type is Family English, Maths or Language (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FLN), then the funding model must be Adult skills or Adult Skills Fund

(error where 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> 35 or 38)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_40
ErrorMessage: The Advanced Learner Loans indicator must not be returned for apprenticeships
Intent: To ensure that the Advanced Learner Loans indicator is not applied to apprenticeship programmes
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim is part of an apprenticeship programme, the Advanced Learner Loans indicator is not returned
Description: If the learning aim is part of an apprenticeship programme, then the Advanced Learner Loans indicator must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is part of an apprenticeship programme (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99 and DD07 = Y), then the Advanced Learner Loans indicator must not be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ADL)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_39
ErrorMessage: The FAM type LDM should be returned for this Funding model
Intent: To ensure that Learning delivery monitoring codes are applied to correct funding models
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim is not an apprenticeship standard and started on or after 1 August 2013 and the funding model is FM = 81 or 82, there is a Learning delivery monitoring code returned
Description: If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 for this funding model, then there should be a Learning delivery monitoring code
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim started on or after 1 August 2013 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2013-08-01) for this funding model (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 81 or 82), then there should be a Learning delivery monitoring code

(error where there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_38
ErrorMessage: The Advanced Learner Loans Bursary fund indicator is not required for this Funding model
Intent: To ensure that the Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding indicator is used in the correct circumstances
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim is not funded by Funding model 99, the Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding indicator is not returned
Description: If the learning aim is not funded by Funding model 99, then the Advanced Learner Loans Bursary fund indicator must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is not funded by Funding model 99 (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> 99), then the Advanced Learner Loans Bursary fund indicator must not be returned 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ALB)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_35
ErrorMessage: The Advanced Learner Loans indicator must not be returned for this Funding model
Intent: To ensure that FAM codes are only used in the correct circumstances
Guidance: Ensure that the Advanced Learner Loans indicator is not returned where the aim is not funded by Funding model 99
Description: If the learning aim is not funded by Funding model 99, then the Advanced Learner Loans indicator must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is not funded by Funding model 99 (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> 99), then the Advanced Learner Loans indicator must not be returned 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ADL)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_36
ErrorMessage: The Advanced Learner Loans indicator must be completed where the Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding indicator has been returned
Intent: To ensure that the Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding indicator is used in the correct circumstances
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding indicator has been returned, there is an Advanced Learner Loans indicator also returned
Description: If the Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding indicator has been returned, then there must be a Advanced Learner Loans indicator
DetailedDescription:
If the Advanced Learner Loans Bursary funding indicator has been returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ALB), then there must be a Advanced Learner Loans indicator

(error where there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = ADL)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_31
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than six occurrences for the FAM type LDM
Intent: To ensure that FAM codes are only used in the correct circumstances
Guidance: Ensure that, where an aim FAM type is LDM, there are no more than six occurrences of this code in the aim record
Description: If the FAM type is LDM, there must be no more than six occurrences
DetailedDescription:
If the FAM type is LDM, there must be no more than six occurrences

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and occurrences > 6)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_22
ErrorMessage: The Full or co-funding indicator must not be returned for this Funding model
Intent: To ensure that the Full or co-funding indicator is only used in the correct circumstances
Guidance: Ensure that, where an aim is not funded through Adult skills, Adult Skills Fund, Skills Bootcamps, Tailored Learning or Community learning, the Full or co-funding indicator is not returned
Description: If the learning aim is not funded through Adult skills, Adult Skills Fund, Skills Bootcamps, Tailored Learning or Community learning, then the Full or co-funding indicator must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is not funded through Adult skills, Adult Skills Fund, Skills Bootcamps, Tailored Learning or Community learning  (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> (35, 37, 38, 81, 11 or 10), then the Full or co-funding indicator must not be returned 

(error where there is record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_18
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than one record with a FAM type of SOF, FFI,  EEF, RES, ADL, ACL, AFL, ASL or FLN
Intent: To ensure that FAM codes are only used in the correct circumstances
Guidance: Ensure that, where a FAM type is SOF, FFI, EEF, RES, ADL, ACL, AFL, ASL or FLN, there is only one occurrence of the code in the aim record
Description: If the FAM type is SOF, FFI, EEF, RES, ADL, ACL, AFL, ASL or FLN then there must be only one occurrence
DetailedDescription:
If the FAM type is SOF, FFI, EEF, RES, ADL, ACL, AFL, ASL or FLN then there must be only one occurrence

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF, FFI, EEF, RES, ADL, ACL, AFL, ASL or FLN and occurrence > 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_16
ErrorMessage: This Learning delivery monitoring code is not valid for this return
Intent: To ensure that FAM codes are only used in the correct circumstances
Guidance: Ensure that, where the return number is R12, R13 or R14, the Learning delivery monitoring code for 'Proxy learning aim' is not used
Description: If the return number is R12, R13 or R14 then the Learning delivery monitoring code for 'Proxy learning aim' must not be used
DetailedDescription:
If the return number is R12, R13 or R14 then the Learning delivery monitoring code for 'Proxy learning aim' must not be used.

(error where the return number = R12, R13 or R14 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 118 has been used)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_15
ErrorMessage: This Learning delivery monitoring code must not be returned where the Learning actual end date is completed
Intent: To ensure that FAM codes are only used in the correct circumstances
Guidance: Ensure that, where an aim learning actual end date is returned, the Learning delivery monitoring code for 'Proxy learning aim' is not used
Description: The Learning delivery monitoring code for 'Proxy learning aim' must not be used if the learning aim has ended
DetailedDescription:
The Learning delivery monitoring code for 'Proxy learning aim' (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 118) must not be used if the learning aim has ended

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_14
ErrorMessage: The Eligibility for enhanced apprenticeship funding is only valid for apprenticeship aims
Intent: To ensure that FAM codes are only used in the correct circumstances
Guidance: Ensure that, for aims that are not funded apprenticeships, the Eligibility for enhanced apprenticeship funding is not returned
Description: If the learning aim is not part of a funded apprenticeship programme, then the Eligibility for enhanced apprenticeship funding must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is not part of a funded apprenticeship programme, then the Eligibility for enhanced apprenticeship funding must not be returned 

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = EEF)
Exclusions:
This rule is not trigged for funded apprenticeships (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35, 36 or 81 and DD07 = Y)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_09
ErrorMessage: The Source of funding is not valid for this Funding model
Intent: To ensure that FAM codes are valid for Adult funded aims
Guidance: Ensure that, for apprenticeships, adult, Adult Skills Fund, Community Learning and Tailored Learning, the Source of funding record must be Adult funded (SoF = 105)
Description: For apprenticeships, adult, Adult Skills Fund, Community Learning and Tailored Learning, the Source of funding record must be Adult
DetailedDescription:
For apprenticeships, adult, Adult Skills Fund, Community Learning and Tailored Learning (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35, 38, 36, 81, 10 and 11), the Source of funding record (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF) must be Adult

(error where  there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 105)
Exclusions: This rule is not triggered where the Source of Funding is a Combined authority (DD35 = Y)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_08
ErrorMessage: The Source of funding is not valid for this Funding model
Intent: To ensure that FAM codes are valid for non-funded learners
Guidance: Ensure that, for non-funded learners (FM = 99), the Source of funding record is not Adult or 16-19 funded (SoF = 105 or 107)
Description: For non-funded provision, the Source of funding record must not be Adult or 16-19
DetailedDescription:
For non-funded provision (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99), the Source of funding record must not be Adult or 16-19  

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 105 or 107)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_07
ErrorMessage: The Source of funding is not valid for this Funding model
Intent: To ensure that FAM codes are valid for 16-19 funded learners
Guidance: Ensure that, for 16-19 funding (non apprenticeships) (FM = 25 or 82), the Source of funding record is Adult or 16-19 funded (SoF = 105 or 107)
Description: For 16-19 funding (non apprenticeships), the Source of funding record must be Adult or 16-19
DetailedDescription:
For 16-19 funding (non apprenticeships) (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 25 or 82), the Source of funding record must be Adult or 16-19

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 105 or 107)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_06
ErrorMessage: The FAM type and code is not valid for this Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that FAM codes are valid at the aim start date
Guidance: Ensure that, where a FAM type is returned, the Learning start date is before the 'valid to' date in the FAM Code table
Description: The Learning start date must not be after the 'valid to' date in the FAM Code table
DetailedDescription:
The Learning start date must not be after the 'valid to' date in the FAM Code table

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > 'Valid _To' in ILR_LearnDelFAMTypeFAMCode)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_04
ErrorMessage: The FAM type and code is not valid
Intent: To ensure that FAM types and codes are valid
Guidance: Ensure that, where a FAM type is returned, the FAM code must be a valid lookup for that FAM type
Description: If a FAM type is returned, the FAM code must be a valid lookup for that FAM type
DetailedDescription:
If a FAM type is returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 is returned), the FAM code must be a valid lookup for that FAM type

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 <> valid lookup on ILR_LearnDelFAMTypeFAMCode)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_01
ErrorMessage: The Source of funding must be returned
Intent: To ensure that a Funding model and Source of Funding combination are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, for all funding models, the Source of funding is also returned
Description: The Source of funding must be returned for all funding models
DetailedDescription:
The Source of funding must be returned for all funding models (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 25, 82, 35, 36, 37, 81, 10, 11, 38) 

(error where there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LearnDelFAMType_02
ErrorMessage: The Full or co-funding indicator must be returned for this Funding model
Intent: To ensure that Adult skills funded aims have the Full or co-funded indicator returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learning aim is Adult skills or Adult Skills Fund funded (FM = 35 or 38), the full or co-funding indicator is also returned
Description: If the learning aim is Adult skills or Adult Skills Fund funded, the full or co-funding indicator must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is Adult skills or Adult Skills Fund funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 or 38, the full or co-funding indicator must be returned

(error where there is no record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = FFI)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AchDate_13
ErrorMessage: The Achievement date can't be later than six months after the Learning actual end date for Skills Bootcamp programmes
Intent: To ensure that the Achievement date is recorded correctly for Skills Bootcamps programme aims
Guidance: Ensure that, for Skills Bootcamps programme aims, the Achievement date can't be later than six months after the Learning actual end date
Description: For programme aims that are funded via Skills Bootcamps, the Achievement date can't be later than six months after the Learning actual end date
DetailedDescription:
For programme aims that are funded via Skills Bootcamps, the Achievement date can't be later than six months after the Learning actual end date.


(error where 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType 


= 32 and (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


) >  6 months)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AchDate_12
ErrorMessage: The Achievement date must be returned
Intent: To ensure that the Achievement date is recorded where apprenticeship standard programmes Completion status is 'Completed'
Guidance: Ensure that, for Apprenticeship standard programme aims that ended on or after 1 August 2021, where Completion status is 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim' the Achievement date is also returned
Description: For programme aims that are funded via apprenticeship standards that ended on or after 1 August 2021, where Completion status is 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim' the Achievement date must be returned
DetailedDescription:
For programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) that are funded via apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType 


= 25) that ended on or after 1 August 2021 (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 >= 2021-08-01), where Completion status is 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim' (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2) the Achievement date must be returned (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


) 
 
(error where 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType 


= 25 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 >= 2021-08-01 and 

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not returned)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AchDate_11
ErrorMessage: The Achievement date must be 7 days after the Learning actual end date
Intent: To ensure that the Achievement date is recorded correctly for apprenticeship standard programmes
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Achievement date is returned for an apprenticeship standard programme that ended on or after 1 August 2019, the Achievement date is at least 7 days after the Learning actual end date
Description: For programme aims that are funded via apprenticeship standards that ended on or after 1 August 2019, the Achievement date must be at least 7 days after the Learning actual end date
DetailedDescription:
For programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) that are funded via apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType 


= 25) that ended on or after 1 August 2019 (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 => 2019-08-01), the Achievement date (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


) must be at least 7 days after the Learning actual end date

(error where the 

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 < 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 +7 days)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AchDate_09
ErrorMessage: The Achievement date must not be completed for aims that are not apprenticeship standard programme aims
Intent: To ensure that the Achievement date is returned for appropriate aims only
Guidance: Ensure that, for learning aims that started after 31 July 2015 and are not apprenticeship standard programmes, the Achievement date is not completed
Description: For learning aims that started after 31 July 2015, the Achievement date must not be completed
DetailedDescription:
For learning aims that started after 31 July 2015 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > 2015-07-31), the Achievement date must not be completed 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is known)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by: trailblazer apprenticeship standard programme aims (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 81 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25) or (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25) 


Skills Bootcamps  (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 37 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AchDate_08
ErrorMessage: The Achievement date must be completed for apprenticeship standards and traineeship programmes with a status of achieved
Intent: To ensure that the Achievement date is returned where the aim outcome is achieved for trailblazer apprenticeship programmes
Guidance: Ensure that, for trailblazer apprenticeship standard programme aims, that have an outcome of achieved, the achievement date is also returned
Description: For programme aims, that are funded via trailblazer apprenticeship standards that have an outcome of achieved, the achievement date must be returned
DetailedDescription:
For programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), that are funded via trailblazer apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 81 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25) that have an outcome of achieved (

LearningDelivery.Outcome


 = 1), the achievement date must be returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AchDate_07
ErrorMessage: The Achievement date must be before the file preparation date
Intent: To ensure that the Achievement date is not before the file preparation date
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Achievement date is returned, it is before the file preparation date
Description: If returned, the Achievement date must not be after the file preparation date
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Achievement date (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is known) must not be after the file preparation date

(error where 

LearningDelivery.AchDate


  > file preparation date)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AchDate_05
ErrorMessage: The Achievement date must be after the Learning actual end date
Intent: To ensure that the Achievement date is on or after the Learning actual end date
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Achievement date is returned and the aim is not part of a Skills bootcamp programme, the date is on or after the Learning actual end date
Description: If returned, the Achievement date must be on or after the Learning actual end date
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Achievement date (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is known) must be on or after the Learning actual end date

(error where 

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 < 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by: Skills bootcamps (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 37 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AchDate_04
ErrorMessage: The Learning actual end date must be returned for this Achievement date
Intent: To ensure that the Achievement date is not before the Learning start date
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Achievement date is returned and the aim is not part of a Skills bootcamp programme, the Learning actual end date is also returned
Description: If the Achievement date is returned, the Learning actual end date must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Achievement date (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is known) is returned, the Learning actual end date must be returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is unknown)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by: Skills bootcamps (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 37 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AchDate_03
ErrorMessage: The Achievement date must not be before the Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that the Achievement date is not before the Learning start date
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Achievement date is returned and the aim is not part of a Skills bootcamp programme, the date cannot be before the Learning start date
Description: If returned, the Achievement date must not be before the Learning start date
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Achievement date (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is known) must not be before the Learning start date

)

 = 37 and

 = 32)

Name: AchDate_02

 > current teaching year end date)

Excluding: Skills Bootcamps  (

 = 3 and

 = 1)

Intent: To ensure that a valid Outcome and Completion code is used where the learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim Outcome is 'Learning activities are complete but the outcome is not yet known'  (Outcome code = 8), the Completion status must be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim', the Outcome is 'Achieved' (Completion code = 2)

DetailedDescription:
If the Outcome is 'Learning activities are complete but the outcome is not yet known' (

Name: Outcome_04

Guidance: Ensure that if an aim Achievement date is returned, the Outcome is 'Achieved' (Outcome = 1)

Name: WithdrawReason_06
ErrorMessage: The Withdrawal reason is only valid for Industrial placements
Intent: To ensure that Withdrawal reason 48 is only used for industry placement aims
Guidance: Ensure that if the 'Industry placement learner withdrawn' code (Withdrawal reason = 48) is returned, the aim reference is an industry placement (ZWRKX002)
Description: If withdrawal reason 'Industry placement learner withdrawn' is returned, the aim reference must be an industry placement
DetailedDescription:
If withdrawal reason 'Industry placement learner withdrawn' is returned (

(error where

 <> ZWRKX002)

ErrorMessage: The Withdrawal reason is only valid for OLASS - Offenders in custody
Intent: To ensure that Withdrawal reason 28 is only used for OLASS - Offenders in custody
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim Completion status is not 'Withdrawn', the Withdrawal reason is not returned
Description: The 'OLASS learner withdrawn' code 28 must only be used for OLASS funded learning aims
DetailedDescription:
The 'OLASS learner withdrawn' code (

LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason


 = 28) must only be used for OLASS funded learning aims (

  = 034)

 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


  = 034)

Name: WithdrawReason_04
ErrorMessage: The Withdrawal reason must not be returned for this Completion status
Intent: To ensure that where the Completion status is not 'Withdrawn', a Withdrawal reason is not returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim Completion status is not 'Withdrawn', the Withdrawal reason is not returned
Description: If the Completion status is 'the learner is 'continuing', 'the learner has completed' or 'the learner has temporarily withdrawn due to an agreed break in learning', the Withdrawal reason must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Completion status is 'the learner is 'continuing', 'the learner has completed' or 'the learner has temporarily withdrawn due to an agreed break in learning' (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 1, 2 or 6), the Withdrawal reason must not be returned 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason


 is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: WithdrawReason_03

Guidance: Ensure that, if the Completion status is 'Withdrawn', a Withdrawal reason is also returned

If the Completion status is 'Withdrawn' (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 3), then the Withdrawal reason must be returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.WithdrawReason


 is unknown)

 is known), it must be a valid lookup

 <> valid lookup on ILR_WithdrawReason)

)

Name: CompStatus_09

Guidance: Ensure that, where a Skills Bootcamp event aims has been returned, the completion status should be code 2 (The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim)
Description: If one of the Skills Bootcamp event aims has been returned, then the completion status should be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim'
DetailedDescription:
If one of the Skills Bootcamp event aims (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749) has been returned, then the completion status should be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim'

(error where

 = Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749 and

 <> 2)

Name: CompStatus_08

Guidance: Ensure that, Skills bootcamps where the Achievement date is returned, the completion status is code 2 (The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim)
Description: For programme aims that are funded via Skills bootcamps and the Achievement date is returned then the completion status must be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim'
DetailedDescription:
For programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) that are funded via Skills Bootcamps (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 37 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32) and the Achievement date is returned (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is known) then the completion status must be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim' (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2)

(error where 

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 <>2)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: CompStatus_07
ErrorMessage: The completion status has not been returned
Intent: To ensure that, the correct completion status is returned where an Apprenticeship standard programme aim ended on or after 1 August 2019 and the Achievement date is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, Apprenticeship standard programme aims that ended on or after 1 August 2019 and the Achievement date is returned, the completion status is code 2 (The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim)
Description: For programme aims that are funded via apprenticeship standards that ended on or after 1 August 2019 and the Achievement date is returned then the completion status must be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim'
DetailedDescription:
For programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) that are funded via apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25) that ended on or after 1 August 2019 (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 => 2019-08-01) and the Achievement date is returned (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is known) then the completion status must be 'The learner has completed the learning activities leading to the learning aim' (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2)

(error where 

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 <>2)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: CompStatus_06
ErrorMessage: The Completion status is not valid for this Outcome
Intent: To ensure that, an Outcome has not been returned where the Completion status is code 3 or 6, unless the aim is a Skills bootcamp programme
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Completion status is 'withdrawn' or 'break in learning', and the aim is not a Skills bootcamp programme, the Outcome is not 'Achieved' or 'Learning activities are complete but outcome is not yet known'
Description: If the Completion status is 'withdrawn' or 'break in learning', then the Outcome must not be 'Achieved' or 'Learning activities are complete but outcome is not yet known', unless the aim is a Skills bootcamp programme
DetailedDescription:
If the Completion status is 'withdrawn' or 'break in learning' (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 3 or 6), then the Outcome must not be 'Achieved' or 'Learning activities are complete but outcome is not yet known'

(error where 

LearningDelivery.Outcome


 = 1 or 8)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by skills bootcamps (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 37 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Description: If the Completion status is 'the learner is continuing or intending to continue the learning activities leading to the learning aim', and the aim is not part of an Apprenticeship standard or Skills bootcamp, then the Outcome must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Completion status is 'the learner is continuing or intending to continue the learning activities leading to the learning aim' (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 1) , then the Outcome must not be returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.Outcome


 is returned)

This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 or 99 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25) or skills bootcamps (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 37 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32)

Name: LearnAimRef_128
ErrorMessage: The aim must have APPRENTICESHIPS Validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database
Intent: To ensure that Apprenticeship component aims are returned with the correct LARS category
Guidance: Ensure that, for new starts on or after 1 August 2023, that are Apprenticeship components, the aims must have APPRENTICESHIPS Validity Category in the Validity table in the LARS database
Description: For new starts on or after 1 August 2023 and are Apprenticeship funded component aims, then the aims must have APPRENTICESHIPS Validity Category in the Validity table in the LARS database
DetailedDescription:
For new starts on or after 1 August 2023 and are Apprenticeship funded component aims, then the aims must have APPRENTICESHIPS Validity Category in the Validity table in the LARS database. 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2023-08-01 and DD07 = Y and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3 and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 or 36 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory <> APPRENTICESHIPS)
Exclusions:
Rule excludes: Apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.Progtype


 = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: LearnAimRef_100
ErrorMessage: The Learning aim reference is not valid in the LARS database for this Funding model and this Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that Apprenticeship component learning aims are returned for the correct valid dates in the LARS service
Guidance: Ensure that, for new aim starts on or after 1 August 2021 that are Apprenticeship funded component aims, the aim start date must not be before the validity start date or be after the last date for new starts (unless the restart indicator is present) for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database, shown through the FALA service
Description: For new starts on or after 1 August 2021 and are Apprenticeship funded component aims then the learning aim start date must not be before the validity start date or be after the last date for new starts (unless the restart indicator is present) for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database
DetailedDescription:
For new starts on or after 1 August 2021 and are Apprenticeship funded component aims then the learning aim start date must not be before the validity start date or be after the last date for new starts (unless the restart indicator is present) for the corresponding validity category in the Validity table in the LARS database.

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2021-08-01 and DD07 = Y and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3
and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 or 36 and (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < LARS_StartDate in the LARS Validity table or  (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > LARS_LastNewStartDate in the LARS_Validity table
and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType


 = RES does not exist)) where (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_ValidityCategory = APPRENTICESHIPS))
Exclusions:
This rule excludes Apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.Progtype


 = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: LearnAimRef_86
ErrorMessage: The Learning aim reference is not valid for this funding model where the learning aim is not part of a traineeship
Intent: To ensure that non-traineeship Adult skills funded learners do not use the Work experience/placement aim codes
Guidance: Ensure that where learning is Adult skills funded and is not part of a traineeship, Work experience/placement codes (ZWRKX001 or ZWRKX002 or ZWRKX003) are not used in the aim record
Description: If a learning aim is Adult skills funded and is not part of a traineeship, then Work experience/placement learning aim reference codes (ZWRKX001 or ZWRKX002 or ZWRKX003) must not be used
DetailedDescription:
If a learning aim is Adult skills funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35) and is not part of a traineeship (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 <> 24), then Work experience/placement learning aim reference codes must not be used

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = ZWRKX001 or ZWRKX002 or ZWRKX003)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

DetailedDescription:
if the aim is a framework apprenticeship (DD07 = Y), then the the Pathway code must be returned

(error where

 LearningDelivery.PwayCode

Name: FundModel_08
ErrorMessage: The funding model is not valid for this apprenticeship programme
Intent: This rule ensures that apprenticeship frameworks are recorded as funding model 35
Guidance: If the learner is recorded on an apprenticeship framework then the funding model must be 35 unless the apprenticeship is non-funded.
Description: The funding model for funded apprenticeship framework, programmes, that started before 1 May 2017 must be Funding model 35
DetailedDescription:
The funding model for funded apprenticeship framework (DD07 = Y), programmes (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), that started before 1 May 2017 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < 2017-05-01), must be Funding model 35


(error when 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 <> 35)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by non-funded or other funded apprenticeships (DD07 = Y and 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99, 81) 


Apprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: LearnStartDate_06
ErrorMessage: The Learning start date of the apprenticeship programme must not be after the Effective to date of this pathway
Intent: This rule ensures that the framework the learner is enrolled in is valid and fundable on the learners start date
Guidance: Check the framework on LARS to ensure that it is valid and update accordingly
Description: For apprenticeship frameworks the start date must not be after the effective to date in the framework tables in LARS
DetailedDescription:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship (DD07 = Y) framework programme (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), then the Learning start date of the programme must not be after the 'Effective to' date for this framework in the Framework table in LARS 


(error where LARS_EffectiveTo is known and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > LARS_EffectiveTo in the LARS_Framework table) where (LARS_ProgType = 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 and LARS_FWorkCode = 

LearningDelivery.FworkCode


 and LARS_PwayCode = 

LearningDelivery.PwayCode


)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by: Restarts (RES)


or Apprenticeship Frameworks (progType 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Description: The number of digits for Contact preference code must be 1
DetailedDescription: ContactPreference.ContPrefCode <> null and number of characters > 1
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: FD_ContactPreference_EO
ErrorMessage: The number of occurrences for ContactPreference has occurred more than the maximum allowed
Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for Contact preference
Description: The maximum occurrences for ContactPreference is one
DetailedDescription: ContactPreference <> null and number of occurrences > 1
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: R_64
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have more than one competency aim with the same Programme type, Framework code and Pathway where an earlier competency aim has been achieved
Intent: This rule ensures that the there is not more than one competency learning aim recorded if the learner has already achieved a competency aim
Guidance: Check the ILR data to ensure a duplicate competency aim has not been incorrectly added to the ILR if the learner has already achieved
Description: If there is a component aim there must be a matching programme aim with the same value of programme type and standard code
DetailedDescription:
A learner cannot achieve more than one funded  (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 or 36) competency aim for any apprenticeship framework programme. 

(error where there is more than one occurrence of a funded (each funding stream is treated separately) component aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3) 
competency aim (LARS_FrameworkAims.LARS_FrameworkComponentType = 1 or 3, where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef) that has achieved (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2 and 

LearningDelivery.Outcome 


= 1)
with the same 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


, LearningDelivery.FworkCode, LearningDelivery.PwayCode and 

LearningDelivery.Fundmodel


)
Exclusions: This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship standards (ProgType = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: R_20
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have more than one competency aim at the same time
Intent: This rule ensures that only one competency aim is recorded for the apprenticeship framework
Guidance: Check the learning aim which has been recorded is not another competency learning aim, only one must be recorded per framework
Description: For an apprenticeship frameworks there cannot be more than one occurrence of a competency aim and they must not overlap
DetailedDescription:
For an apprenticeship (DD07 = Y) component aim 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3), if there is more than one occurance of a competency aim (LARS_FrameworkAims.LARS_FrameworkComponentType = 1 or 3, where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef) they must not overlap

(error where there are overlapping competency aims based upon LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate and LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate)

(This rule is not triggered by aprenticeship standards (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25))
Exclusions: This rule is not triggered by apprenticeship standards
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: DateOfBirth_36
ErrorMessage: The learner is 19 or over and the planned duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration of an apprenticeship
Intent: To ensure that learners who started a funding model FM = 35 or 81 apprenticeship, where the learner was over 19 at the start, are on programme for more than 6 months
Guidance: Ensure that, for learners who started a funding model FM = 35 or 81 apprenticeship, where the learner was over 19 at the start, the minimum duration of the apprenticeship programme must not be less than 6 months
Description: For aims starting on or after 1 August 2014, where the funding model is FM = 35 or 81 and an apprenticeship programme, and if the learner is over 19, then the minimum duration of the apprenticeship not be less than 6 months
DetailedDescription:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2014 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2014-08-01), that are an apprenticeship (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 or 81 and  DD07 = Y), and a programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), and if the learner is 19 or over (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 >= 19 year), then the minimum duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 6 months

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


 < 6 months)
Exclusions:
This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES) or part of an apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: DateOfBirth_35
ErrorMessage: The learner is under 19 and the planned duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration of an apprenticeship
Intent: To ensure that learners who started a Framework or Trailblazer apprenticeship, where the learner was under 19 at the start, are on programme for 365 days or more
Guidance: Ensure that, for learners who started a Framework or Trailblazer apprenticeship, where the learner was under 19 at the start, the minimum duration of the apprenticeship programme aim is 365 days or more
Description: For aims starting on or after 1 August 2014, where the funding model is FM = 35 or 81 and an apprenticeship programme, and if the learner is under 19, then the minimum duration of the apprenticeship not be less than 365 days
DetailedDescription:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2014 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2014-08-01), that are an apprenticeship (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35 or 81 and  DD07 = Y), and a programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), and if the learner is under 19 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 < 19 year), then the minimum duration of the apprenticeship not be less than 365 days

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


 < 365 days)
Exclusions:
This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES) or part of an apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: ContPrefType_07
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than three records with a Contact preference type of PMC
Intent: To ensure that, there are not more than three records with a Contact preference type PMC
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, there are not more than three records with a Contact preference type PMC in the learner record
Description: If the contact preference type is Preferred method of contact, then there must be only three occurrences
DetailedDescription:
If the contact preference type is Preferred method of contact, then there must be only three occurrences

(error where LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefType = PMC and occurrence > 3)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: ContPrefType_06
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than two records with a Contact preference type of RUI
Intent: To ensure that, there are not more than two records with a Contact preference type RUI
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, there are not more than two records with a Contact preference type RUI in the learner record
Description: If the contact preference type is Restricted use indicator, then there must be only two occurrences
DetailedDescription:
If the contact preference type is Restricted use indicator, then there must be only two occurrences

(error where LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefType = RUI and occurrence > 2)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: ContPrefType_05
ErrorMessage: These contact preference types cannot all be used at the same time
Intent: To ensure that, Preferred method of contact 1, 2 or 3 is not used together with Preferred method of contact 4, 5 or 6
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, Preferred method of contact code 1, 2 or 3 is not returned together with Preferred method of contact code 4, 5 or 6
Description: If the contact preference type is Preferred method of contact, then Contact preference codes 1, 2 or 3 cannot be used at the same time as contact preference codes 4, 5 or 6
DetailedDescription:
If the contact preference type is Preferred method of contact (LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefType = PMC), then Contact preference codes 1, 2 or 3 cannot be used at the same time as contact preference codes 4, 5 or 6

(error where there is a record of LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefCode  = 1, 2 or 3 and there is a record LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefCode = 4, 5 or 6)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: ContPrefType_04
ErrorMessage: These contact preference types cannot all be used at the same time
Intent: To ensure that, Contact preference types 1 and 2 are not used with Contact preference types 6 and 7
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, Contact preference types 1 and 2 are not used with Contact preference types 6 and 7 against the same learner record
Description: If the contact preference type is Restricted use indicator, then Contact preference codes 1 or 2 cannot be used at the same time as Contact preference codes 6 or 7
DetailedDescription:
If the contact preference type is Restricted use indicator (LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefType = RUI), then Contact preference codes 1 or 2 cannot be used at the same time as Contact preference codes 6 or 7

(error where there is a record of LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefCode  = 1 or 2 and there is a record of LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefCode  = 6 or 7)

Name: ContPrefType_03
ErrorMessage: The Contact preference type and code is not valid for this Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that, learning aim start dates are on or before the 'Valid to' date for the Contact preference type and code
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the earliest Learning start date must be on or before the 'Valid to' date for the Contact preference type and coded
Description: The earliest Learning start date must not be after the 'Valid to' date for the Contact preference type and code
DetailedDescription:
The earliest Learning start date must not be after the 'Valid to' date for the Contact preference type and code

(error where DD06 > 'Valid to' in ILR_ContPrefTypeCode)

Name: ContPrefType_02
ErrorMessage: The combination of Contact preference type and code is not valid, this learner is not to be contacted
Intent: To ensure that, when the Restricted use indicator is used 'Learner is not to be contacted', there are no other Restricted use indicators used
Guidance: Ensure that where the Restricted use indicator is 'Learner is not to be contacted' there must not be any other Restricted use indicator codes or Preferred method of contacts returned
Description: If the Restricted use indicator is 'Learner is not to be contacted' there must not be any other Restricted use indicator codes or Preferred method of contacts returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Restricted use indicator is 'Learner is not to be contacted' (LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefType = RUI and LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefCode = 3, 4 or 5) there must not be any other Restricted use indicator codes or Preferred method of contacts returned

(error whereearnerContactPreference.ContPrefType = RUI  and LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefCode = 1, 2, 6 or 7) or (LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefType = PMC and LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefCode = 1,2,3,4,5,6)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: ContPrefType_01
ErrorMessage: The Contact preference type and code is not valid
Intent: To ensure that, where returned, valid Contact preference codes are used
Guidance: Ensure that the Contact preference type returned has a valid Contact preference code also returned
Description: If a Contact preference type is returned, the Contact preference code must be a valid lookup for that Contact preference type
DetailedDescription:
If a Contact preference type is returned (LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefType is known), the Contact preference code must be a valid lookup for that Contact preference type

(error where LearnerContactPreference.ContPrefCode <> valid lookup on ILR_ContPrefTypeCode)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: DateOfBirth_53
ErrorMessage: The programme does not reach the required minimum duration of an apprenticeship
Intent: To ensure that learners who started an FM = 36 apprenticeship standard have an actual duration of not less than 365 days
Guidance: Ensure that, for apprenticeships starting on or after 1 May 2017 and has completed all aims, the actual duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 365 days
Description: If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship starting on or after 1 May 2017, and has completed all aims, then the actual duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 365 days
DetailedDescription:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship starting on or after 1 May 2017 (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2017-05-01 and DD07 = Y and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), and has completed (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2), then the actual duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 365 days.

(Error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 < 365 days)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by aims that are a restart (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES) or part of an apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: DateOfBirth_52
ErrorMessage: The programme does not reach the required minimum duration of an apprenticeship
Intent: To ensure that learners who started an FM = 36 apprenticeship have a planned minimum duration of not less than 365 days
Guidance: Ensure that, for apprenticeships starting on or after 1 May 2017, the planned minimum duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 365 days
Description: If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship starting on or after 1 May 2017, then the planned minimum duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 365 days
DetailedDescription:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship starting on or after 1 May 2017 (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2017-05-01 and DD07 = Y and 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), then the planned minimum duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 365 days.

(Error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


 < 365 days)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by aims that are a restart (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES) or part of an apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: R_154
ErrorMessage: Skills Bootcamp event aims must not be used on or after 1 August 2025
Intent: This rule ensures that the Skills bootcamp event aims are not used after the 1st of August 2025 and event indicators are used on any new Skills Bootcamps
Guidance: If the learner enrolled onto a skills bootcamp after the 1st of August 2025 they cannot use an event aim, to clear the error the learner will need to be coded with an applicable event indicator code (EVI).
Description: For a Skills Bootcamps learner, if the earliest learning start date of any programme aims with the same Contract Reference Number is on or after 1 August 2025, the Skills Bootcamps event aims must not be returned.
DetailedDescription:
For a Skills Bootcamps learner, if the earliest learning start date of any programme aims with the same Contract Reference Number is on or after 1 August 2025, the Skills Bootcamps event aims must not be returned.  

error where


LearningDelivery.ProgType


=32 
and 


LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 
and the earliest

 LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 1 August 2025  with the same Contract Reference Number (

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


) 
and 
there is a record of 


LearningDelivery.AimType


= 3 
and


LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef 


=  Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749, Z0060439, Z0009541,Z0060440, Z0060441, Z0060442, Z0060443
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - Clarification added to the error condition to show aimtype 3 (highlighted)

Name: CompStatus_01
ErrorMessage: The Completion status is not a valid code
Intent: To ensure that, where a Completion status is returned, it is a valid code
Guidance: Ensure that, where a Completion status is returned, it is a valid lookup in the ILR CompStatus table
Description: The Completion status must be a valid lookup on ILR_CompStatus
DetailedDescription:
The Completion status must be a valid lookup (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 is a valid lookup on ILR_CompStatus)

(error where 

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 <> valid lookup on ILR_CompStatus)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_138
ErrorMessage: The achievement date or an event learning aim for Skills Bootcamps (Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749) needs to be present in the learning delivery record
Intent: This rule ensures a skills bootcamp is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that a completed skills bootcamp programme aim is recorded with the achievement date or at least one of the Skills Bootcamp event aims are present in the ILR file.
Description: For completed Skills Bootcamp programmes, the Achievement Date must be returned on the latest programme aim or at least one of the Skills Bootcamp event aims must be present in the Learning Delivery record.
DetailedDescription:
For completed Skills Bootcamp programmes starting on or prior to 31 July 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31) , the Achievement Date must be returned on the latest programme aim or at least one of the Skills Bootcamp event aims must be present in the Learning Delivery record.

error where
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32
And 


LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1 
And


LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2
And 


LearningDelivery.AchDate


 for the latest programme aim is not returned or NULL
And 
there is no Learning Delivery record exists where at least one aim is 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by:
Completed programme aims where the file preparation date is six months after the Learning Actual End Date
(LearningDelivery.AimType = 1
and
LearningDelivery.CompStatus = 2 
and 
file preparation date > 6 months after LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - A change to the rule has been made to trigger on learners starting on or prior to the 31st of July 2025

Name: DateofBirth_60
ErrorMessage: The learner is not able to be funded for a level 7 apprenticeship because they are either over 21 or are under 25 and are not an apprentice care leaver or have an EHC plan.
Intent: To ensure that a learner does not start on a funded level 7 apprenticeship if they do not meet the eligibility criteria
Guidance: Ensure that, the learners date of birth is recoded correctly, if they are under the age of 25 but over 21 they require an EHCP or a care leaver to be eligible. If the learner does not fit the eligibility criteria they are not valid for funding and the error is triggering correctly and the learner should be removed.
Description: For level 7 apprenticeship standard programmes starting on or after 1 January 2026, then the learner must be 16-21 at the start of the aim or be an apprentice care leaver and be under 25 years old at the start of the aim or have an 'Education health care plan' and be under 25 years old at the start of the aim.
DetailedDescription:
For level 7 apprenticeship standard programmes starting on or after 1 January 2026, then the learner must be 16-21 at the start of the aim or be an apprentice care leaver and be under 25 years old at the start of the aim or have an 'Education health care plan' and be under 25 years old at the start of the aim.

error where


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2026-01-01
and


LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36
and


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25
and


LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1
and


LearningDelivery.StdCode


 = LARS_StandardCode
and
LARS_NotionalEndLevel = 7 
and
NOT (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


- 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 is between 16 and 21)
and
NOT (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode 


= 362 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


- 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 < 25 years)
and
NOT (

LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType 


= EHC and

 LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 < 25 years)
Exclusions:
This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 3 - New rule for version 3

Name: DD04
ErrorMessage: N/A
Intent: This shows the Derived data criteria for the programme start date
Guidance:
Validation rules that use this Derived data:


DateOfBirth_48
LearnStartDate_07
ProgType_12
Description: Programme start date (held at aim level, calculated from matching programme aims)
DetailedDescription:
LearningDelivery.ProgType


 <> null and the earliest value of

 LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 for all programme aims with 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 and the same value of 

Learner.LearnRefNumber


, 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


, . Set to NULL if there are no such programme aims
ChangeSummary: Version 2 - Framework and pathway has been removed from the rule

Name: DD35
ErrorMessage: N/A
Intent: This shows the Derived data criteria for Devolved authorities
Guidance:
Validation rules that use this Derived data:


UKPRN_06, UKPRN_29, FundModel_10, FundModel_18, ProgType_22, LSDPostcode_02, LSDPostcode_04, LearnDelFAMType_09, LearnDelFamType_75, LearnDelFamType_82, LearnDelFamType_99, LearnDelFamType_109, LearnDelFamType_110, LearnDelFamType_114, LearnDelFamType_123, LearnAimRef_94, LearnAimRef_95, LearnAimRef_96, LearnAimRef_97, LearnAimRef_118, LearnAimRef_119, LearnAimRef_120, LearnAimRef_121, LearnAimRef_127, LearnAimRef_133, LearnAimRef_138, LearnAimRef_139, LearnAimRef_140, LearnAimRef_141, LearnAimRef_142, Table 1
Description: Devolved authorities
DetailedDescription:
If 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 110, 111, 112, 113, 114, 115, 116, 117, 118, 119, 120 set to Y, otherwise set to N

Name: DD07
ErrorMessage: N/A
Intent: This shows the Derived data criteria for the Apprenticeship programme
Guidance:
Validation rules that use this Derived data:


UKPRN_06, UKPRN_09, DateOfBirth_25, DateOfBirth_30, DateOfBirth_32, DateOfBirth_35, DateOfBirth_36, DateOfBirth_38, DateOfBirth_39, DateOfBirth_41, DateOfBirth_48, DateOfBirth_49,DateOfBirth_52, DateOfBirth_53, DateofBirth_55, PlanLearnHours_01, PlanEEPHours_01, EmpStat_01, EmpStat_02, EmpStat_08, EmpStat_09, EmpStat_12, EmpStat_15, EmpId_10, EmpId_13, ESMType_09, LearnAimRef_78, LearnAimRef_79, LearnAimRef_80,  LearnAimRef_84, LearnAimRef_85,  LearnAimRef_94, LearnAimRef_95, LearnAimRef_96, LearnAimRef_97,  LearnAimRef_98, LearnAimRef_99, LearnAimRef_100, LearnAimRef_117, LearnAimRef_127, LearnAimRef_128, LearnStartDate_03, LearnStartDate_06, LearnStartDate_07, LearnStartDate_12, OrigLearnStartDate_05, OrigLearnStartDate_06, FundModel_04, FundModel_06, FundModel_07, FundModel_08, FundModel_09, FworkCode_01, FworkCode_05, PwayCode_02, PwayCode_03, LSDPotcode_01, EmpOutcome_03, LearnDelFAMType_14, LearnDelFAMType_40, LearnDelFAMType_57, LearnDelFAMType_58, LearnDelFAMType_59, LearnDelFAMType_60, LearnDelFAMType_61, LearnDelFAMType_65, LearnDelFamType_66, LearnDelFamType_79, LearnDelFamType_80,  LearnDelFamType_81,  LearningDeliveryHE_03, LearningDeliveryHE_07, R20, Table 1
Description: Apprenticeship programme
DetailedDescription:
If 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 =  25 set to Y, otherwise set to N
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Removal of framework programme types from the rule

Name: R_150
ErrorMessage: The learning start date of this aim cannot before the learning start date of the programme aim
Intent: This rule ensures that the Skills Bootcamp programme is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that the start date of the event learning aim is not before the start date of any associated programme aim
Description: For a Skills Bootcamp learner starting a programme on or after 1 August 2024, the learning start date of the event aim must not be before the earliest start date of any programme aims with the same contract reference number.
DetailedDescription:
For a Skills Bootcamp learner starting a programme on or after 1 August 2024 
and on or prior to 31 July 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31) , if returned, the learning start date of the event aims must not be before the earliest start date of any programme aims with the same contract reference number.

error where


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


>= 2024-08-01
and


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


<= 2025-07-31
and


LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1
and


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32
and


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 of event aims (

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef 


=  Z0059747, Z0059748, Z0059749, Z0060439, Z0009541,Z0060440, Z0060441, Z0060442, Z0060443 ) < the earliest LearnStartDate of any programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) with the same contract reference number (

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Amendment to the rule to add LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31

Name: R_90
ErrorMessage: The Learning actual end date of the component aims must be returned for this programme
Intent: This rule ensures that the component aims are not left open when the programme aim is closed, this is not triggered for English and Maths aims
Guidance: Check that the actual end date has not been added in error on the component aims, if the learner has completed the actual end date will need to be added onto the programme aim ensuring it is not left open. This does not trigger on English and Maths aims..
Description: A learner must not have open component aims where the corresponding programme aim has been closed
DetailedDescription:
A learner must not have open component aims where the corresponding programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1)  has been closed (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is known)

(error where there is a component aim (

LearningDelivery.AimTyp


e = 3) where 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is unknown or null, with the same combination of (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 and 

LearningDelivery.StdCode


)
Exclusions:
(This rule is not triggered for English and maths component aims (
AimType = 3 and  (LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef, and LARS_BasicSkillsType = 01, 11, 13, 20, 23, 24, 29, 31, 02, 12, 14, 19, 21, 25, 30, 32, 33, 34, 35)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Framework and Pathway code has been removed

Name: R_68
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have more than one Apprenticeship Financial Record with the same Apprenticeship financial type, code and date
Intent: This rule ensures that duplicate Apps financial records are not returned
Guidance: Check that there is not more than one financial record returned for the learner with the same code and date, if there are two records of PMR for payments received from an employer, combine them into one record.
Description: For funding model 36 aims there must not be more than one Apprenticeship Financial Record with the same combination of Apprenticeship financial type, Apprenticeship financial code and Apprenticeship financial date across all apprenticeship  programme aims
DetailedDescription:
For funding model 36 aims (

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


=36), there must not be more than one Apprenticeship Financial Record with the same combination of Apprenticeship financial type, Apprenticeship financial code and Apprenticeship financial date across all apprenticeship  programme aims (

Learning.Delivery.AimType


 = 1 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 =  25) for a given apprenticeship matching on standard code (

LearningDelivery.StdCode


)


(error where there is more than one financial record with the same combination of AFinType, AFinCode and AFinDate)
ChangeSummary:
Version 1 - The framework programme types have been removed
Removal of Framework and Pathway code has been removed

Name: LearnFAMType_09
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than one record with a FAM type of HNS, EHC, DLA, SEN, MCF, ECF or FME
Intent: To ensure that, where returned, there is only one occurrence per learner of FAM type HNS, EHC, DLA, SEN, MCF, ECF or FME
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, FAM type HNS, EHC, DLA, SEN, MCF, ECF, FM, MMH or EMH  is only returned once per learner
Description: If the FAM type is HNS, EHC, DLA, SEN, MCF, ECF, FME MMH, or EMH    there must only be one occurrence of this in the learner record
DetailedDescription:
If the FAM type is HNS, EHC, DLA, SEN, MCF, ECF, FME or MMH, or EMH   there must only be one occurrence

(error where 

LearnerFAM.LearnFAMType


 = HNS, EHC, DLA, SEN, MCF, ECF or FME and occurrence > 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Error condition updated to include new FAM codes MMH and EMH

Name: DateOfBirth_47
ErrorMessage: The planned duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration for an apprenticeship standard
Intent: To ensure that learners who started a funding model FM = 81 or 36 apprenticeship, have an actual programme duration of 365 days or more
Guidance: Ensure that, for learners who started a funding model FM = 81 or 36 apprenticeship on or after 1 August 2016, where the learner has completed all learning activities, the minimum actual programme duration is 365 days or more
Description: For aims starting on or after 1 August 2016, that are apprenticeships where FM = 81 or 36 and a programme aim, and the learner has completed all learning activities, then the actual duration of the apprenticeship programme must not be less than 365 days
DetailedDescription:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2016 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2016-08-01)  and on or prior to 31 July 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31, that are an apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 81 or 36 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25), and a programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), and the learner has completed all learning activities (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2), then the minimum duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 365 days

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 < 365 days)
Exclusions:
This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The error condition has been updated to include "on or prior to 31 July 2025"

Name: DateOfBirth_46
ErrorMessage: The planned duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration for an apprenticeship standard
Intent: To ensure that learners who started a funding model FM = 81 or 36 apprenticeship, where the learner was over 16 at the start, have a planned programme duration of 365 days or more
Guidance: Ensure that, for learners who started a funding model FM = 81 or 36 apprenticeship on or after 1 August 2016, where the learner is 16 or over at the start, the minimum planned programme duration is 365 days or more
Description: For aims starting on or after 1 August 2016, that are apprenticeships where FM = 81 or 36 and a programme aim, and if the learner is 16 or over,  then the minimum duration of the apprenticeship must be 365 days or more
DetailedDescription:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2016 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2016-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2025 (LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate <= 2025-07-31, that are an apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 81 or 36 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25), and a programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), and if the learner is 16 or over (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 >= 16 year),  then the minimum duration of the apprenticeship must be 365 days or more

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

 LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


 < 365 days)
Exclusions:
This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Change to the error condition to conclude "prior to 31 July 2025"

R114

LearningDelivery.FundModel
