 LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate

DetailedDescription: A learner must not have more then one Learning Delivery record with the same Aim sequence number

A learner must not have more then one Learning Delivery record with the same Aim sequence number

Learner.LearnRefNumbe


r and

 LearningDelivery.AimSeqNumber


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_06
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than one Learner record with the same Learner reference number
Intent: This rule ensures that there is not more than one learner with the same ULN recorded in the ILR file
Guidance: Check the ILR file to ensure that there is not more than one learner recorded with the same ULN, if a duplicate learner is found this must be deleted. If the learner has progressed onto another course within the same academic year and the new aims have been added onto a new record this must be deleted and the aims recorded on the original record.
Description: Learner reference numbers must unique within the file
DetailedDescription:
Learner reference numbers must unique within the file

(error where there is more than one Learner record with the same Learner reference number)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ProgType_16
ErrorMessage: A valid T Level programme type must be used for this learning aim reference
Intent: This rule ensures that the Tlevel Programme type is returned when using the T level qualifications from the LARS database
Guidance: Check that the T level programme type has been recorded when selecting a T level qualification from the LARS database, if the learner is not studying a T level an alternative learning aim must be used
Description: If the learning aim is a T Level Technical qualification in the LARS database then the T Level programme type must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is a T Level Technical qualification in the LARS database (LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468) then the T Level programme type must be returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 <> 31 or not returned)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by the Adult T level pilot
(LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 384)
or
Non funded T Levels (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

(error where there is more than one record for the learner with the same 

ProviderSpecLearnerMonitoring.ProvSpecLearnMonOccur


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_50
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have more than one Learning Delivery Provider Specified Monitoring record with the same occurrence code
Intent: This rule ensures that there is not duplicate Learning Delivery Provider Specified Monitoring records are returned
Guidance: Check that the Learning Delivery Provider Specified Monitoring records is not recorded with the same contact occurrence code as the existing record
Description: There must not be more than one Learning Delivery Provider Specified Monitoring record with the same Occurrence code
DetailedDescription:
There must not be more than one Learning Delivery Provider Specified Monitoring record with the same Occurrence code

(error where there is more than one record for the learner with the same 

ProviderSpecLearnerMonitoring.ProvSpecLearnMonOccur


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_51
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have more than one Learner Funding and Monitoring record with the same FAM type and code
Intent: This rule ensures that there is not duplicate learner funding and monitoring records are recorded with the same FAM type and code
Guidance: Check that the learner FAM records and remove any duplicates
Description: There must not be more than one Learner Funding and Monitoring (FAM) record with the same Learner FAM type and Learner FAM code
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_52
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have more than one Learning Delivery Funding and Monitoring record with the same FAM type and code
Intent: This rule ensures that there is not duplicate Learning Delivery funding and monitoring records are recorded with the same FAM type and code
Guidance: Check that the Learning Delivery FAM records and remove any duplicates
Description: There must not be more than one Learning Delivery Funding and Monitoring (FAM) record with the same Learner FAM type and Learner FAM code
DetailedDescription:
For any given learning aim there must not be more than one LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryFAM with the same combination of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode




(error where there is more than one record for  LearningDelivery.LearningDeliveryFAM with the same combination of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by:


Learning Support Funding records (LearnDelFAMType = LSF)


Apprenticeship Contract Type records (LearnDelFAMType = ACT) 


Advanced Learner Loans Bursary records (LearnDelFAMType = ALB)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_58
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have more than one core aim at the same time
Intent: This rule ensures that only one core aim is open at the same time per learner
Guidance: Check the dates on the core aim records to ensure that there is no overlap
Description:
If there is more than one 

occurrence 

of a core aim they must not overlap
DetailedDescription:
If there is more than one 

occurrence 

of a core aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 5) they must not overlap

(error where there are overlapping core aims based upon 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_59
ErrorMessage: The ILR file should not have more than one record with the same ULN
Intent: This rule ensures that only ULN in the ILR file per learner and there are no duplicate records
Guidance: Check that there are no duplicate ULNs in the ILR file, if a learner has undertook a new episode of study within the same academic year, these learning aims should be added to the existing record under the original ULN and learner reference.
Description: There should not be more than one Learner record with the same ULN, except where the ULN is 9999999999
DetailedDescription:
There should not be more than one Learner record with the same ULN, except where the ULN is 9999999999

(error where 

Learner.ULN


 is not 9999999999 
and there is more than one occurance in the file with the same ULN)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_61
ErrorMessage: The learning aim must not have more than one Learning Support Funding record at the same time
Intent: This rule ensures there is no duplication of Learning Support funding or Advanced learner loans bursary funding
Guidance: Check that there are no duplicate ULNs in the ILR file, if a learner has undertook a new episode of study within the same academic year, these learning aims should be added to the existing record under the original ULN and learner reference.
Description: A learning aim must not have Learning Delivery FAM records with overlapping dates of certain Learning Delivery FAM types (Learning Support Funding (LSF) or Advanced Learner Loans Bursary (ALB)). Each type is treated separately.
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_63
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have more than one core aim at the same time
Intent: This rule ensures that the learner is recorded with a core aim when returned as 16-19 funded
Guidance: Ensure that a core aim is recorded as aim type 5 for a 16-19 funded learner
Description: A 16-19 funded learner must have at least one core aim
DetailedDescription:
A 16-19 EFA funded learner (

FundModel = 25


)  must have at least one core aim (

AimType 


= 5).

(error where 

AimType 


<>5)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 105
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_67
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have more than one Learning Delivery Work Placement record with the same Work placement start date and Work placement employer identifier
Intent: This rule ensures that there is no overlapping work-placement records recorded for the learner
Guidance: Check there are no overlapping work-placement records in the ILR, the dates between the start and end date must not overlap with the same work-placement employment id
Description: There must not be more than one Learning Delivery Work Placement record with the same combination of Work placement start date and Work placement employer identifier
DetailedDescription:
There must not be more than one Learning Delivery Work Placement record with the same combination of Work placement start date (

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceStartDate


) and Work placement employer identifier (

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpd


)

(error where There is more than one record for this learning aim with the same combination of 

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceStartDate


 and 

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpd
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_72
ErrorMessage: The payment amounts must not exceed the employer contribution proportion of the total negotiated price
Intent: This rule ensures that there is no over payment of employer contributions for apprenticeship trailblazers.
Guidance: Check that the PMR record to ensure that the employer contribution does not exceed one third of the total negotiated price.
Description: For Apprenticeship trailblazer standards the employer contribution payments recorded for an apprenticeship standard must not exceed the employer contribution proportion of the total negotiated price for the programme.
DetailedDescription:
For Apprenticeship trailblazer standards (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 81 and

 LearningDelivery.ProgType 


= 25), for all programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) with the same combination of 

LearningDelivery.LearnRefNumber


, 

LearningDelivery.ProgType 


and 

LearningDelivery.StdCode


 and where 2/3 of the total negotiated price is less than or equal to the core government contribution cap for the standard (DD17 = N).  

The employer contribution payments recorded for an apprenticeship standard must not exceed the employer contribution proportion of the total negotiated price for the programme.

(error where (SUM( AFinAmount where AFinType = PMR and AFinCode = 1, 2 ) 
MINUS
SUM( AFinAmount where AFinType = PMR and AFinCode = 3 )) 
GREATER THAN
1/3 * (
(AFinAmount where AFinType = TNP and AFinCode = 1 and AFinDate is the most recent) 
PLUS 
(AFinAmount where AFinType = TNP and AFinCode = 2 and AFinDate is the most recent))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_73
ErrorMessage: The payment amounts must not exceed the employer contribution proportion of the total negotiated price
Intent: This rule ensures that there is no over payment of employer contributions for apprenticeship trailblazers.
Guidance: Check that the PMR record to ensure that the employer contribution does not exceed one third of the total negotiated price.
Description: For Apprenticeship trailblazer standards the employer contribution payments recorded for an apprenticeship standard must not exceed the employer contribution proportion of the total negotiated price for the programme.
DetailedDescription:
For Apprenticeship trailblazer standards (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 81 and

 LearningDelivery.ProgType 


= 25), for all programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) with the same combination of 

LearningDelivery.LearnRefNumber


, 

LearningDelivery.ProgType 


and 

LearningDelivery.StdCode


 and where 2/3 of the total negotiated price is less than or equal to the core government contribution cap for the standard (DD17 = N).  

The employer contribution payments recorded for an apprenticeship standard must not exceed the employer contribution proportion of the total negotiated price for the programme.

(error where (SUM( AFinAmount where AFinType = PMR and AFinCode = 1, 2 ) 
MINUS
SUM( AFinAmount where AFinType = PMR and AFinCode = 3 )) 
GREATER THAN
1/3 * (
(AFinAmount where AFinType = TNP and AFinCode = 1 and AFinDate is the most recent) 
PLUS 
(AFinAmount where AFinType = TNP and AFinCode = 2 and AFinDate is the most recent))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_96
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have more than one Learning Delivery Work Placement record with the same Work placement start date
Intent:
This rule ensures that there is no overlapping 

earning Delivery Work Placement record with the same Work placement start date
Guidance:
Check there are no overlapping work-placement records in the ILR w

ith the same Work placement start date and update the ILR accordingly
Description: A learner must not have more than one Work placement record with the same Work placement start date.
DetailedDescription:
A learner must not have more than one Work placement record with the same Work placement start date.

(Error where there is more than one record for the learner with the same 

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceStartDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_97
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have consecutive Learner Employment status records with the same Employment status, Employer identifier, Agreement Identifier and Employment Status Monitoring
Intent: This rule ensures that there is no duplicate employment status records in the ILR
Guidance: Check there are no overlapping employment status records with the same combination of Employer identifier, Agreement Identifier and Employment Status Monitoring
Description: A learner must not have consecutive Learner Employment Status records with the same Employment status, Employer ID (including where Employer ID is null) and Employment status monitoring types and codes.
DetailedDescription:
A learner must not have consecutive Learner Employment Status records with the same Employment status, Employer ID (including where Employer ID is null) and Employment status monitoring types and codes.

(error where there is more than one record consecutively (based on

 LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


) for the learner with the same combination of 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


, 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpId


, 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 and 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_100
ErrorMessage: There must be an assessment price recorded
Intent: This rule ensures that there is an assessment price recorded in the ILR for an apprenticeship standard learner who has been recorded as completed
Guidance: If an apprenticeship standard learner has been recorded as completed a TNP 2 record needs to be added onto the learner record which shows the assessment cost for the standard, this will clear the error once returned.
Description: A learner must not have more than one Work placement record with the same Work placement start date.
DetailedDescription:
There must be an assessment price recorded for completed (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2) apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25) programmes (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1)

(error where there is no record where (AFinType = TNP and AFinCode = 2 or 4)
Exclusions: (This rule is not triggered by non-funded apprenticeship standards (FundModel = 99 and ProgType = 25))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_101
ErrorMessage: The learning aim must not have more than one Apprenticeship contract type record at the same time
Intent: This rule ensures that there is no overlapping ACT code recorded in the ILR
Guidance: Check that there is not more than one open ACT code recorded for the learner in the ILR, there must not be multiple records active at one time.
Description: A learning aim must not have Learning Delivery FAM records with overlapping dates where the Learning Delivery FAM type is Apprenticeship contract type (ACT) If there is more than one ACT record the 'Date to' of the earlier record must be returned and before the 'date from' of the later record.
DetailedDescription:
A learning aim must not have Learning Delivery FAM records with overlapping dates where the Learning Delivery FAM type is Apprenticeship contract type (ACT) (

LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT).
If there is more than one ACT record (count (records where 

LearnDelFAMType 


= ACT) > 1), the 'Date to' of the earlier record must be returned and before the 'date from' of the later record.

(error where 

LearnDelFAMDateFrom 


of the ACT is earlier than the 

LearnDelFAMDateTo


 of the previous ACT or  

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 is not known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_102
ErrorMessage: The aim must have an Apprenticeship contract type in the first day
Intent: This rule ensures that there is an ACT record which starts from the beginning of the apprenticeship programme
Guidance: Check that there is not more than one open ACT code recorded for the learner in the ILR, there must not be multiple records active at one time.
Description: If the Apprenticeship contract type is returned, there must be an apprenticeship contract type that applies from the start of the aim
DetailedDescription:
If the Apprenticeship contract type is returned

 LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT), there must be an apprenticeship contract type that applies from the start of the aim

(error where there is no record where

 LearnDelFAMDateFrom


 = 

LearnStartDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_104
ErrorMessage: There must be an apprenticeship contract type for the full duration of the aim
Intent: This rule ensures that there is an ACT that covers the whole programme where multiple records are used, if one record ends a new one must start from the following day.
Guidance: Ensure that there is no gap between one ACT record ending and the new one starting, this must be the day after the original one ends.
Description: If there is more than one Apprenticeship contract type record for the learning aim, the Date from and Date to dates must be consecutive.
DetailedDescription:
If there is more than one Apprenticeship contract type record for the learning aim, the Date from and Date to dates must be consecutive.

(error where the 

LearnDelFAMDateFrom 


of the ACT record is not a day after the 

LearnDelFAMDateTo


 of the previous record (if one exists).
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_105
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have different Apprenticeship contract types recorded at the same time
Intent: This rule ensures that there is not different ACT records open at the same time with different code types, as a learner cannot be Levy and none levy funded a the same time.
Guidance: Ensure that there not two different ACT types open at the same time
Description: A learner must not have different Apprenticeship contract type (ACT) codes across all Learning Delivery Funding and Monitoring records at any point in time.
DetailedDescription:
A learner must not have different Apprenticeship contract type (ACT) codes across all Learning Delivery Funding and Monitoring records at any point in time.

(error where 

LearnDelFAMType


 = ACT and count (LearnDelFAMType = ACT) is greater than 1 and 


LearnDelFAMCode


 does not match across all records at any point in time.
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_106
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than one LSF record at the same time
Intent: This rule ensures that there is only one Learning Support fund record in the ILR
Guidance: Ensure that there are no additional Learning Support Funding records in the ILR for the same learner
Description: At any point in time, a learner must not have more than one Learning support funding record
DetailedDescription:
At any point in time, a learner must not have more than one Learning support funding record 

(error where (

LearnDelFAMDateFrom


 >= 2016-08-01) and at any point in time count (

LearnDelFAMType


 = LSF) is greater than 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_110
ErrorMessage: The employment status is not valid for this apprenticeship contract type
Intent: This rule ensures that there is an employment status record of employed for an apprentice who is funded via the levy
Guidance: Ensure that an employment status of 10 is added to the learners ILR file, if the apprentice is not employed then they are not valid for funding
Description: If an apprenticeship programme is funded through a contract for services with an employer the learner must have an employment status of 'Employed'
DetailedDescription:
If an apprenticeship programme is funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36) through a contract for services with an employer (LearnDelFAMType = ACT and LearnDelFAMCode = 1), the learner must have an employment status of 'Employed'

(error where if the 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 (applicable on 

LearnDelFAMDateFrom


) <> 10)
Exclusions:
Restarts (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = RES)
Learner has been made redundant (EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType = OET and EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode =  1) on the latest LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_112
ErrorMessage: There must be a Date applies to that matches the Learning actual end date for this aim.
Intent: This rule ensures that the ACT to date is added when an apprentice completes their programme of study
Guidance: Ensure that an employment status of 10 is added to the learners ILR file, if the apprentice is not employed then they are not valid for funding
Description: For apprenticeships frameworks if there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned and the Learning actual end date has been returned then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must be the same as the Learning actual end date
DetailedDescription:
For apprenticeships frameworks (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36), if there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 =ACT), and the Learning actual end date has been returned (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is known), then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must be the same as the Learning actual end date

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate 


<> 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 of the ACT record)
Exclusions: Excluding: Apprenticeship standards (FundModel =36, ProgType =25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: R_113
ErrorMessage: The Learning actual end date is not known, therefore the Date applies to record must not be returned.
Intent: This rule ensures that the ACT to date is not added when an apprentice is continuing their programme of study
Guidance: Ensure that the ACT to date is not entered when the learner is continuing
Description: For apprenticeships frameworks if there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned and the Learning actual end date has been returned then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must be the same as the Learning actual end date
DetailedDescription:
For apprenticeships frameworks (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36), if there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 =ACT), and the Learning actual end date has not been returned (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is unknown), then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must not be returned.

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 of the latest ACT record is known)
Exclusions: Excluding: Apprenticeship standards (FundModel =36, ProgType =25)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - This rule has been deleted

Name: R_114
ErrorMessage: The learner is currently apprenticeship funded and cannot start an Adult skills funded English/maths aim
Intent: This rule ensures that an adult skills funded English and Maths aim is not started if the learner is enrolled on an apprenticeship
Guidance: Remove the English and Maths aim which is funded through adult skills and replace it with a functional skills aim if applicable which is funded as part of the apprenticeship
Description: For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 an Adult skills funded English or maths aim cannot be started while a learner is on an apprenticeship funded programme
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or prior to 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31) an Adult skills funded English or maths aim (DD31 = Y) cannot be started while a learner is on an apprenticeship funded programme (DD32 = Y). 

(error where (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 DD31 = Y) >= (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 DD32 = Y))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_119
ErrorMessage: The apprenticeship financial record cannot be before the Learning start date when the total negotiated price has been returned
Intent: This rule ensures that the apprenticeship financial records are not added prior to the start of the apprenticeship
Guidance: Check the dates which have been added onto the initial financial records to ensure that they match the learner start date, if the learner start date is incorrect this will need to be updated to ensure both records match.
Description: For starts on or after 1st February 2019, if the Total negotiated price is returned then the Apprenticeship financial record date must not be before the Learning start date of the learner's learning aim
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1st February 2019 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2019-02-01), if the Total negotiated price is returned (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode


 is not null)  then the Apprenticeship financial record date must not be before the Learning start date of the learner's learning aim

(error where 

AppFinRecord.AFinDate


 < 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_121
ErrorMessage: There must be a Date applies to that matches the achievement date for this aim.
Intent: This rule ensures that the ACT to date matches the achievement date once it is entered into the ILR
Guidance: If the achievement date has been entered onto the apprenticeship standard then the ACT to date must be added which matches this date to clear the error.
Description: For apprenticeship standards, if there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned and the achievement date has been returned then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must be the same as the Achievement date
DetailedDescription:
For apprenticeship standards (FundModel = 36, ProgType = 25), if there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 =ACT), and the achievement date has been returned (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is known), then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must be the same as the Achievement date (LearningDelivery.AchDate)


(error where 

LearningDelivery.AchDate 


<> 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo 


of the ACT record)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_122
ErrorMessage: The achievement date is not known, therefore the Date applies to record must be the same as the Learning actual end date
Intent: This rule ensures that if the learner has been recorded as completed or withdrawn the latest ACT to date matches the actual end date if the achievement date has not been entered into the ILR
Guidance: If the achievement date has not been entered and the learner has withdrawn or been recorded as completed then the ACT to date must match the actual end date.
Description: For apprenticeship standards  if the Completion status is not continuing and there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned and the achievement date has not been returned then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must be the same as the Learning Actual End Date
DetailedDescription:
For apprenticeship standards (FundModel =36, ProgType = 25) if the Completion status <>1 (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 <> 1) and there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMTyp


e =ACT), and the achievement date has not been returned (

LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is unknown) then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must be the same as the Learning Actual End Date
  

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo 


of the latest ACT record <> 

LearningDelivery.LearnActualEndDate


 )
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_123
ErrorMessage: The learner is continuing or intending to continue, therefore do not return the 'Date applies to' for the latest ACT record
Intent: This rule ensures that if the learner is continuing the apprenticeship standard the ACT to date is not returned
Guidance: Ensure that the ACT to date is not returned where the learner is recorded as continuing, if the learner has completed the actual end date should be updated accordingly
Description: For apprenticeship standards  if the Completion status is not continuing and there is record of an Apprenticeship Contract Type that has been returned and the achievement date has not been returned then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must be the same as the Learning Actual End Date
DetailedDescription:
For apprenticeship standards (FundModel =36,

 ProgType


 = 25),if the 'learner is continuing or intending to continue the learning activities leading to the learning aim' (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 1) then the Date applies to for the latest ACT record must not be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateTo


 of the latest ACT record is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_124
ErrorMessage: The learner must not have overlapping programme aims
Intent: This rule ensures that there are no overlapping programme aims recorded for the apprenticeship
Guidance: Ensure that there is no overlap in dates on the programme aims, there must be at least one day difference between the end of one programme and the start of a new programme aim.
Description: A learner must not have overlapping Programme aims
DetailedDescription:
A learner must not have overlapping Programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) based upon the start date (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


) and the effective end date of the learning aim (DD36)

(error where LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate of any programme aim is between LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate and effective end date (DD36) of any other programme aim)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_125
ErrorMessage: T Level and T Level Foundation Year component or core aims must have a corresponding programme aim with the same combination of funding model and programme type
Intent: This rule ensures that a T level programme or T level foundation year programme is recorded correctly with the same programme type as the component aims
Guidance: Ensure that there a programme aim is added with a matching programme type as the component aims to ensure the T level or foundation year is recorded correctly
Description: T Level or T Level Foundation Year component aims or core aims, must have a programme aim with the same programme type and funding model
DetailedDescription:
T Level or T Level Foundation Year component aims or core aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3 or 5 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 =  31 or 30), must have a programme aim with the same programme type and funding model

error where there is 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3 or 5
and


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 31 or 30
and
there is no record of LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 with the same combination of 

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_126
ErrorMessage: T Level and T Level Foundation Year programme aims must have a corresponding component or core aim with the same combination of funding model and programme type
Intent: This rule ensures that a T level programme or T level foundation year programme is recorded correctly with the same programme type as the component aims
Guidance: Ensure that there a programme aim is added with a matching programme type as the component aims to ensure the T level or foundation year is recorded correctly
Description: T Level or T Level Foundation Year component aims or core aims, must have a programme aim with the same programme type and funding model
DetailedDescription:
T Level or T Level Foundation Year programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 31 or 30), must have a component aim or core aim with the same programme type and funding model

error where there is 

LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1
and


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 31 or 30
and
there is no record of 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3 or 5 with the same combination of 

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_129
ErrorMessage: The T Level Technical qualification must have a corresponding programme aim with the same Programme type, Framework code and Pathway (if returned)
Intent: This rule ensures that a T level programme Technical qualification has a corresponding programme aim
Guidance: Ensure that there a programme aim is added with a matching programme type as the component aims to ensure the T level or foundation year is recorded correctly
Description: If a T Level technical qualification has been returned there must be a matching programme aim
DetailedDescription:
If a T Level technical qualification has been returned (LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468), there must be a matching programme aim

(error where

 LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 5 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef 


= LARS_LearnAimRef and LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468 and and there is no programme aim (LearningDelivery.AimType = 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_130
ErrorMessage: For T Level programme learning aims, planned learning hours and Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours must not be returned
Intent: This rule ensures that the planned learning hours and Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours are not returned
Guidance: Ensure that there are no planned learning hours and Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours returned for T level learners, remove the hours field to clear validation
Description: Ensure that there are no planned learning hours and Planned employability, enrichment and pastoral hours returned for T level learners, remove the hours field to clear validation
DetailedDescription:
If all returned learning aims are for a T Level programme (

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


25 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 31), then both 

Learner.PlanLearnHours


 and 

Learner.PlanEEPHours


 must not be returned 

(error where Learner.PlanLearnHours and or Learner.PlanEEPHours is not null)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_131
ErrorMessage: There must be a prior attainment record matching the earliest learning aim start date for the learner
Intent: This rule ensures that the prior attainment is returned
Guidance: Ensure that a prior attainment record is added which matches the earliest learning start date
Description: For Apprenticeships, Adult skills, Skills Bootcamps, Adult Skills Fund, Non Funded or Other Adult funded learners a prior attainment record must exist on or before for the earliest learning aim start date for that provision
DetailedDescription:
For Apprenticeships, Adult skills, Skills Bootcamps, Adult Skills Fund, Non Funded or Other Adult funded learners a prior attainment record must exist on or before for the earliest learning aim start date for that provision

(Error were 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36, 35, 37, 38, 99, 81 has been returned and the prior attainment record date is not on or before the earliest learning aim start date 

PriorAttain.DateLevelApp 


> 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_132
ErrorMessage: Learner must be unemployed or return LDM 382 'Free Courses for Jobs (Level 3 Offer) for Low Wage Learners'
Intent: This rule ensures learners who have a prior attainment of full level 3 or above, who have the free courses for jobs LDM code recorded are unemployed or a low wage learner
Guidance: Ensure that if the LDM code 382 is returned for learners who have a full level 3 prior attainment and is studying an applicable programme, they are unemployed or valid for Low wage provision
Description: For starts on or after 1st April 2022 and on or prior to 31 July 2024 if the learner's Prior Attainment is full level 3 or above and the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned then the learner must be unemployed on benefits or be a Free Courses for Jobs (Level 3 Offer) Low Wage Learner using LDM 382
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1st April 2022 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2022-04-01), and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 =< 2024-07-31) if the learner's Prior Attainment is full level 3 or above (

PriorAttain.PriorLeve


l = 6,7,8,9,10, 97 or 98) and the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType 


= LDM and

 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378) then the learner must be unemployed on benefits or be a Free Courses for Jobs (Level 3 Offer) Low Wage Learner

error where 
LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >= 2022-04-01
and 
PriorAttain.PriorLevel = 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 97 or 98
and
LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 378
and
DD38 = N 
and 
there is no record where LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 382
Exclusions: This rule is not trigged for devolved authorities where the delivery exclusion is used (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_134
ErrorMessage: The programme type must be Skills Bootcamps for this Employment Status Monitoring Type
Intent: This rule ensures OET 2 is only used for Skills bootcamp learners
Guidance: Ensure that if OET 2 is returned the learner is studying a skills bootcamp learning aim, if they are not then this OET code must not be used.
Description: If the Other Employment Type is ' Small or Medium Employer' then there must be a Skills Bootcamps learning aim recorded
DetailedDescription:
If the Other Employment Type is ' Small or Medium Employer' then there must be a Skills Bootcamps learning aim recorded

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = OET and

 EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode 


=  2 
AND
There are no learning deliveries with 

ProgType


 = 32)
Exclusions: This rule is not trigged for devolved authorities where the delivery exclusion is used (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_135
ErrorMessage: Skills Bootcamp component aims must have a corresponding programme aim with the same combination of funding model, programme type and contract reference number
Intent: This rule ensures a skills bootcamp is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that a skills bootcamp programme aim is recorded with the same combination of contract reference, funding model number and programme type to match the component aims
Description: Skills Bootcamp component aims must have a programme aim with the same funding model, programme type and contract reference number error
DetailedDescription:
Skills Bootcamp component aims

 LearningDelivery,AimType


 = 3 and

 LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32), must have a programme aim with the same funding model, programme type and contract reference number error where there is 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32 and there is no record of 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 with the same combination of 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


, 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 and 

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_136
ErrorMessage: Skills Bootcamp component aims must have a corresponding programme aim with the same combination of funding model, programme type and contract reference number
Intent: This rule ensures a skills bootcamp is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that a skills bootcamp programme aim is recorded with the same combination of contract reference, funding model number and programme type to match the component aims
Description: Skills Bootcamp programme aims must have a component aim with the same funding model, programme type and contract reference number error
DetailedDescription:
Skills Bootcamp programme aims

 LearningDelivery,AimType


 = 1 and

 LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32), must have a component aim with the same funding model, programme type and contract reference number error where there is 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32 and there is no record of 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3 with the same combination of 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


, 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 and 

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_137
ErrorMessage: An occupational specialism learning aim (ZTLOSxxx) needs to be present in the learning delivery record
Intent: This rule ensures that occupational specialism learning aim is present on T Level programmes
Guidance: Ensure that a ZTLOSxxx learning aim has been added to the learner record for a T level programme
Description: If any of the learning aims are T Level funded then there must be an Occupational Specialism learning aim present in the learner's record
DetailedDescription:
If any of the learning aims are T Level funded then there must be an Occupational Specialism learning aim present in the learner's record

(error where there is a T Level funded (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 31)  learning aim
and there is no learning delivery record where


LearningDelivery. LearnAimRef


 = ZTLOSxxx
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_139
ErrorMessage: At least one subject learning aim must be closed if the Skills Bootcamp programme has been completed.
Intent: This rule ensures a skills bootcamp is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that if the skills bootcamp programme has been recorded as completed at least one of the subject learning aims must also be closed with an actual end date
Description: If the Skills Bootcamp programme has been completed, one of the subject learning aims must be closed
DetailedDescription:
If the Skills Bootcamp programme has been completed, one of the subject learning aims must be closed

error where
the contract reference number (

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


) on the component aim (AimType = 3) s the same as the programme aim (AimType =1)
and


LearningDelivery.ProgType 


= 32
And 


LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1 
And 


LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2
And 
a closed subject learning aim does not exist

 LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 3 
and 


LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not returned
and 
LARS_CategoryRef = 62 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >=  LARS_EffectiveFrom and <= LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_140
ErrorMessage: The Learning actual end date of the component aims must be returned for this programme
Intent: This rule ensures component aims within a skills bootcamp programme are closed when the programme aim has an actual end date returned
Guidance: Ensure that all component aims that are part of a skills bootcamp have an actual end date recorded which matches the corresponding programme aim,
Description: A Skills Bootcamp learner must not have open component aims where the corresponding programme aim has an actual end date
DetailedDescription:
A Skills Bootcamp learner must not have open component aims where the corresponding programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1) has been closed (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is returned).

error where


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32
And


LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 3
And 


LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not returned
And 
LearnActEndDate for the latest programme aim (AimType = 1) is returned (where programme aim has the same combination of

 LearningDelivery.FundModel


, 

LearningDelivery.ProgType 


and

 LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


 as the component aim)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_141
ErrorMessage: There must be a Skills Bootcamp subject learning aim in an open Skills Bootcamp programme
Intent: This rule ensures that an open skills bootcamp programme has an open skills bootcamp subject learning aim associated with it
Guidance: Ensure that all component aims that are part of a skills bootcamp have an actual end date recorded which matches the corresponding programme aim,
Description: If there is an open Skills Bootcamp programme then there must be one of the subject learning aim present in the programme with the same contract reference number.
DetailedDescription:
If there is an open Skills Bootcamp programme then there must be one of the subject learning aim present in the programme with the same contract reference number.

error where
the contract reference number (

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber)


 on the component aim (

AimType


 = 3) is the same as the programme aim (AimType =1)
and


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32
And


LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1
and


LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not returned
and a subject learning aim does not exist 


LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 3
and
LARS_CategoryRef  = 62 (where LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef = LARS_LearnAimRef and LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate >=  LARS_EffectiveFrom and <= LARS_EffectiveTo in LARS_LearningDeliveryCategory)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_142
ErrorMessage: The Total Negotiated Price Record must not be on or after the learning start date of an open programme aim where the learner has previously withdrawn.
Intent: This rule ensures that the total negotiated price has been returned correctly
Guidance: Ensure that the total negotiated price on the withdrawn programme aim is not before the start of the open programme, it is important to check that the correct TNP records are correct and allocated to the correct programme ensuring dates match
Description: For open apprenticeship standard programmes started on or after 1 August 2022 where the learner has previously withdrawn or temporarily withdrawn due to an agreed break in learning the apprenticeship financial record date for a total negotiated price record on that withdrawn programme aim must not be on or after the learning start date of an open programme aim.
DetailedDescription:
For open apprenticeship standard programmes started on or after 1 August 2022 where the learner has previously withdrawn (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 =3) or temporarily withdrawn due to an agreed break in learning (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 =  6) the apprenticeship financial record date for a total negotiated price record on that withdrawn programme aim must not be on or after the learning start date of an open programme aim.

Where there is an open apprenticeship standard programme aim


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2022-08-01
and


LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1
and


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25
And


LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not returned
and there is a closed apprenticeship standard programme aim 
AimType = 1
And


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25
and


LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 3 or 6
and


AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and

 AppFinRecord.AFinDate


 on the closed programme aim is >= the 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


of the open programme aim
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_143
ErrorMessage: The Learning actual end date for the latest programme aim must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest component aim.
Intent: This rule ensures that the Skills Bootcamp programme structure is recorded correctly and the actual end date of the programme aim is not before component aims have closed.
Guidance: Ensure that the actual end date on the programme aim is not recorded before the latest component aims actual end date, the programme aim cannot be closed until the last component aim is closed.
Description: For a Skills Bootcamp learner, where the Learning actual end date has been returned for the programme aim, it must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest aim within that programme.
DetailedDescription:
For a Skills Bootcamp learner, where the Learning actual end date has been returned  (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is known) for the programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), it must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest aim within that programme.  

(error where


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32
and
the latest programme aim

 LearnActEndDate


 is <  latest component 

LearnActEndDate


 (AimType = 3) 
with the same combination of 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


, 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 and 

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_144
ErrorMessage: The Learning actual end date for the latest programme aim must not be before the Learning actual end date of the latest component aim.
Intent: This rule ensures that the Skills Bootcamp achievement date is not recorded before the start date of any associated skills bootcamp programme aims start date
Guidance: Ensure that the achievement date is recorded correctly for the skills bootcamp and the date must not be before the learning start date of the programme aim
Description: For a Skills Bootcamp learner started on or after 1 August 2023, the Achievement date must not be before the earliest start date of any programme aims with the same contract reference number.
DetailedDescription:
For a Skills Bootcamp learner started on or after 1 August 2023, the Achievement date must not be before the earliest start date of any programme aims with the same contract reference number.

(error where


LearningDelivery. AimType


 = 1
and


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2023-08-01
and


LearningDelivery.ProgType 


= 32
and


LearningDelivery.AchDate


 is returned
and


LearningDelivey.AchDate


 < the earliest 

LearnStartDate


 of any programme aims (

LearningDelivery. AimType


 = 1) with the same Contract Reference Number (

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_146
ErrorMessage: The learner is currently apprenticeship funded and cannot start an Adult skills funded English/maths aim
Intent: This rule ensures that if a learner is enrolled on an apprenticeship they cannot start an adult skills fund funded aim at the same time
Guidance: Ensure that the no adult skills fund funded English and Maths are not started at the same time as the learner is on an apprenticeship, check the learning aims to ensure that there is no overlap, there must be at least a one day gap in-between one ending and the other starting in the ILR.
Description: Adult skills funded English or maths aim cannot be started while a learner is on an apprenticeship funded programme
DetailedDescription:
Adult skills funded English or maths aim (DD40 = Y) cannot be started while a learner is on an apprenticeship funded programme (DD32 = Y). 

(error where (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 DD40 = Y) >= (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 DD32 = Y))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_147
ErrorMessage: The Technical Qualification and the Occupational Specialism must match on Programme Type, Framework code and Pathway in the LARS Framework Aims table
Intent: This rule ensures that the T level technical qualification and occupational specialism mates in the LARS database
Guidance: Ensure that both the T level technical qualification and occupational specialism match in LARS database, update the ILR accordingly to ensure that the correct T level is recorded
Description: If there is an open T Level Technical Qualification and there is an open Occupational Specialism have been returned, these must have the same matching record of Framework code and Pathway in the Framework Aims table in LARS.
DetailedDescription:
If there is an open T Level Technical Qualification (LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not returned) and there is an open Occupational Specialism (LearningDelivery. LearnAimRef = ZTLOSxxx and 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 is not returned) have been returned, these must have the same matching record of Framework code and Pathway in the Framework Aims table in LARS.

Error where
Learning Delivery record contains (


LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef where LARS_LearnAimRefType = 1468,


LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef = ZTLOSxxx and where LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate is not returned or NULL for these learning aims
) and there is no matching record of LARS_FworkCode and LARS_PwayCode in the Framework Aims table in LARS for these Learning aims.
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_148
ErrorMessage: The learner must be earning below the earnings threshold by returning LDM 391 or the learner's prior attainment must be below a full level 3
Intent: This rule ensures adult skills fund funding is allocated correctly using the learnings threshold
Guidance: Ensure that both the T level technical qualification and occupational specialism match in LARS database, update the ILR accordingly to ensure that the correct T level is recorded
Description: For starts on or after 1st August 2024, and the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim, then the learner must be earning below the earnings threshold or the learner's Prior Attainment is below a full level 3
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1st August 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


>= 2024-08-01),  and the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378) for learners aged between 19 -23 at the start of the aim ((

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


) >= 19 years and <=23 years) then the learner must be earning below the earnings threshold (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 391) or the learner's Prior Attainment is below a full level 3  (

PriorAttain.PriorLevel


 =1,2,3,4,5,99)

error where 


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


>= 2024-08-01
and 


LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode 


= 378
and


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


- 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 >= 19 years and <=23 years
and
there is no record where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 391
and
there is no record where 

PriorAttain.PriorLevel


 =1,2,3,4,5,99
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_149
ErrorMessage: The learning start date of this aim cannot before the learning start date of the programme aim
Intent: This rule ensures that the Skills Bootcamp programme is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that the start date of the subject learning aim is not before the start date of any associated programme aim
Description: For a Skills Bootcamp learner starting a programme on or after 1 August 2024, the learning start date of the subject learning aim must not be before the earliest start date of any programme aims with the same contract reference number.
DetailedDescription:
For a Skills Bootcamp learner starting a programme on or after 1 August 2024, the learning start date of the subject learning aim must not be before the earliest start date of any programme aims with the same contract reference number.

error where


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


>= 2024-08-01
and


LearningDelivery. AimType


 = 1
and


LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 32
and


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


of the Subject Learning aim (LARS_CategoryRef  = 62 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef 


= LARS_LearnAimRef)) < the earliest LearnStartDate of any programme aims (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) with the same contract reference number (

LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: R_151
ErrorMessage: If the learner is earning below the earnings threshold, LDM 391 must be returned
Intent: This rule ensures that if the level 3 free courses for jobs has been returned for a learner who is 24 that they are earning under the earnings threshold
Guidance: Ensure that if the learner is 24 at the start of the aim and recorded on level 3 free courses for jobs that the learner is also earning below the earnings threshold and recorded with LDM 391
Description: For starts on or after 1st August 2024 for learners aged 24  at the start of the aim who are Adult Skills fund funded  and the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' Learning LDM code 378 has been returned, the learner must be earning below the earnings threshold and recorded with LDM 391
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1st August 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01),  for learners aged 24  at the start of the aim (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 >= 24 years)    who are Adult Skills fund funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38) and the 'Level 3 Free Courses for Jobs' Learning Delivery Monitoring code has been returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378), then the learner must be earning below the earnings threshold (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 391) 

error where 


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01
and 


LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 >= 24 years
and


LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38
and


LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and

 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 378
and
there is no record where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType 


= LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 391
Exclusions: This rule is not triggered for devolved authorities where the delivery exclusion is used (LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType = DAM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 023
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FD_ALSCost_AR
ErrorMessage: The ALSCost is out of range
Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for ALS cost
Description: The ALSCost must be in the range stated in the ILR specification
DetailedDescription:
The 

ALSCost 


is out of range
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FD_ALSCost_AL
ErrorMessage: The length of the value returned for ALSCost is not between 1 and 6 characters
Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for ALS cost
Description: The Learning support cost must be between 1 and 6 characters long
DetailedDescription:
Learner.ALSCost


 <> null and number of characters >6

Name: FD_AimType_MA

Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for Aim Type
Description: AimType is mandatory
DetailedDescription:
LearningDelivery.AimType 


is null

Name: FD_AimType_AL

Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for Aim Type
Description: The number of digits for Aim type must be 1
DetailedDescription:
LearningDelivery.AimType 


<> null and number of characters > 1

Name: FD_AimSeqNumber_MA

Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for Aim Sequence Number
Description: AimSeqNumber is mandatory
DetailedDescription:
LearningDelivery.AimSeqNumber 


is null

Name: FD_AimSeqNumber_AR
ErrorMessage: The AimSeqNumber is out of range
Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for Aim Sequence Number
Description: The AimSeqNumber must be in the range stated in the ILR specification
DetailedDescription:
The 

AimSeqNumber 


is out of range
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FD_AimSeqNumber_AL
ErrorMessage: The length of the value returned for AimSeqNumber is not between 1 and 2 characters
Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for Aim Sequence Number
Description: The number of digits for Aim sequence number must be 2 or less
DetailedDescription:
LearningDelivery.AimSeqNumber


 <> null and number of digits >2
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FD_AFinType_MA
ErrorMessage: The Apprenticeship Financial Type has not been returned
Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for Apprenticeship financial details
Description: AFinType is mandatory
DetailedDescription:
ApprenticeshipFinancialRecord.AFinType


 is null
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FD_AFinType_AP
ErrorMessage: The AFinType does not match the validation pattern
Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for Apprenticeship financial details
Description:
The 

AFinType 


does not match the validation pattern
DetailedDescription:
ApprenticeshipFinancialRecord.AFinType


 <> null and number of characters > 3
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: FD_AFinType_AL
ErrorMessage: The length of the value returned for AFinType is not between 1 and 3 characters
Intent: This rule ensures that the ILR field matches the schema as specified in the ILR specification
Guidance: Field definition rules for Apprenticeship financial details
Description: The Apprenticeship Financial Type must be between 1 and 3 characters long
DetailedDescription:

Name: DD17
ErrorMessage: N/A
Intent: This shows the Derived data criteria for exceeding financial contributions
Guidance:
Validation rules that use this Derived data:


R72
R73
Description: Apprenticeship standard total negotiated price exceeds threshold for maximum core government contribution (calculated from matching programme aims)
DetailedDescription:
If 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 81 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25 AND 
2/3 * (


ApprenticeshipFinancialRecord.AFinAmount


 where (

ApprenticeshipFinancialRecord.AFinType


 = TNP AND 

ApprenticeshipFinancialRecord.AFinCode


 = 1 where the 

ApprenticeshipFinancialRecord.AFinDate 


is the most recent) + ApprenticeshipFinancialRecord.AFinAmount where (ApprenticeshipFinancialRecord.AFinType = TNP AND ApprenticeshipFinancialRecord.AFinCode = 2 where the ApprenticeshipFinancialRecord.AFinDate is the most recent) 
for all programme aims with LearningDelivery.AimType = 1 and the same value of Learner.LearnRefNumber, LearningDelivery.ProgType, and LearningDelivery.StdCode 
) 
GREATER THAN 
LARS_CoreGovContributionCap in the LARS_StandardFunding table where LearningDelivery.StdCode = LARS_StandardCode and LARS_CoreGovContributionCap is the cap applicable on the earliest LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate or LearningDelivery.OrigLearnStartDate for all programme aims with the same value of Learner.LearnRefNumber, LerningDelivery.ProgType and LearningDelivery.StdCode in the LARS_StandardFunding table), set DD17 to Y, otherwise set to N
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

DetailedDescription:
Calculate the checksum digit based on characters 1 to 8 using the formula [11-((9*1st digit+8*2nd digit+7*3rd digit+6*4th digit+5*5th digit+4*6th digit + 3*7th digit + 2*8th digit)mod 11)] if result = 11 set DD14 to 0, if result = 10 or the 

LearningDeliveryWorkPlacement.WorkPlaceEmpId


 is not 9 characters in length set DD14 to 'X', otherwise set DD14 to number of the result (1-9)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

DetailedDescription:

 LearningDelivery.PartnerUKPRN 


 <> valid lookup on Org_PartnerUKPRN)

Name: StdCode_03
ErrorMessage: The Apprenticeship standard code must not be returned
Intent: This rule ensures that the standard code is only returned for apprenticeship standards and not any other provisions
Guidance: Check the LARS database to ensure that the standard code is available on the correct learner start date and is valid until the end of the planned duration
Description: If returned the apprenticeship standard code must be a valid look up on the LARS validity table
DetailedDescription:
If the learning aim is not part of an apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 <> 25), then the Apprenticeship standard code must not be returned 

(error where

 LearningDelivery.StdCode


 is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Guidance: Check the LARS database to ensure that the standard code is available on the correct learner start date and is valid until the end of the planned duration
Description: If returned the apprenticeship standard code must be a valid look up on the LARS validity table
DetailedDescription:
If returned the apprenticeship standard code (

LearningDelivery.Stdcode


) must be a valid look up on the LARS validity table (LARS_StandardCode on the LARS_StandardValidity tables)

(error where LearningDelivery.Stdcode <> valid lookup on LARS_StandardCode on the LARS_StandardValidity tables)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

DetailedDescription:

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25), then the Apprenticeship standard code must be returned

LearningDelivery.StdCode 


is unknown)

Description: If it is  an apprenticeship standard,  a T Level Foundation Year,  a skills bootcamp, a combined authority programme or the programme type is not present the Pathway must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If it is  an apprenticeship standard,  a T Level Foundation Year,  a skills bootcamp, a combined authority programme or the programme type is not present (

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 24, 25, 30, 32, 33 or LearningDelivery.ProgType is unknown), the Pathway must not be returned

(error where LearningDelivery.ProgType = 24, 25, 30 32, 33 or not returned and 

LearningDelivery.Pwaycode


 is known)
