 = SOF and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 108)) OR (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 10), and the Planned learning hours are 10 or less (

Learner.PlanLearnHours


 <= 10), and the Unique learner number has been returned (Learner.ULN <> 9999999999), the Given name must be returned 


(error where 

Learner.GivenNames


 is unknown or contains all whitespace)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: GivenNames_02
ErrorMessage: The learner's Given names must be returned
Intent: To ensure that a learners given name is recorded
Guidance: To ensure that the learners given name is recorded and the field is not 'null' or whitespace filled
Description: If the learner is community learning funded and the Planned learning hours are greater than 10, the learners given name must be recorded and the field should not be 'null' or whitespace filled
DetailedDescription:
If all aims are community learning funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99 and (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 108)) OR (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 10), and the Planned learning hours are greater than 10 (

Learner.PlanLearnHours


 > 10), the Given name must be returned 

(error where 

Learner.GivenNames


 is unknown or contains all whitespace)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: GivenNames_01
ErrorMessage: The learner's Given names must be returned
Intent: To ensure that a learners given name is recorded
Guidance: Ensure that the learners given name is recorded and the field is not 'null' or whitespace filled
Description: The learners given name should be recorded and the field should not be 'null' or whitespace filled
DetailedDescription:
The learner's Given names must be returned

(error where 

Learner.GivenNames


 is unknown or contains all whitespace)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by community learning aims (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 10) or (

LearningDelivery.FundModel =


 99 and  (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 108))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LLDDHealthProb_07
ErrorMessage: The LLDD and Health Problem record has not been returned and the learner does consider himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem
Intent: This rule ensures that the LLDD health problem is recorded for community learning funded learners who's planned learner hours are greater than 10.
Guidance: If this rule is triggered and the learner is Community learning funded then the LLDD health problem category is required on learners records where they have disclosed that they have a disability. Check the record and update the category correctly.
Description: If the LLDD and Health problem is recorded as code 1 and the learner is Community learning funded or funding model 99 and the planned learning hours is more than 10, then the LLDD health problem category is required.
DetailedDescription:
If the LLDD and health problem is 'Learner considers himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem' (

Learner.LLDDHealthProb


 = 1), and all aims are community learning funded ((

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


= 10) or (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and

 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 108)), and the planned learner hours are greater than 10 (

Learner.PlanLearnHours >


 10), then a LLDD and Health Problem record must be returned


(error where there is no record of 

LLDDandHealthProblem


)

Name: LLDDHealthProb_06
ErrorMessage: The LLDD and Health Problem record has not been returned and the learner does consider himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem
Intent: To ensure the correct LLDD health problem category code has been entered if the learner has declared they have an applicable disability
Guidance:
Please record the applicable LLDD health problem category and resubmit your data, if the learner does not have a disability the LLDDhealthProb code needs to be recorded as code 2 '

Learner does not consider himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability and/or health problem.
Description:
If the LLDD and health problem is recorded as code 1 'Learner considers himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem, then a LLDD and Health Problem record must be returned 


Error where there is no record of LLDDandHealthProblem code in the learners ILR data.
DetailedDescription:
If the LLDD and health problem is 'Learner considers himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem (Learner.LLDDHealthProb = 1)', then a LLDD and Health Problem record must be returned 


(error where there is no record of LLDDandHealthProblem)
Exclusions:
Community learning aims (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10)
None Funded provision (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 99)
Learners aged 25 years or over at the start of learning  ((DD06 - Learner.DateOfBirth) >= 25 years)

Name: LLDDHealthProb_04
ErrorMessage: The LLDD and Health Problem record has been returned and the learner does not consider himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem
Intent: This rule ensures that a learner does not have a LLDD code returned against there record when they have declared they do not have an applicable disability.
Guidance: If this error has triggered and the learner has declared a disability then code 2 cannot be returned code 1 must be used in its place.
Description: If the learner's LLDD and health problem is 'Learner does not consider himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem" then code 2 cannot be returned.
DetailedDescription: If the learner's LLDD and health problem is 'Learner does not consider himself or herself to have a learning difficulty and/or disability or health problem' (Learner.LLDDHealthProb = 2), then a LLDD and Health Problem record must not be returned (error where the LLDDandHealthProblem record is known)

Name: LLDDHealthProb_01
ErrorMessage: The LLDD and health problem is not a valid code
Intent: This rule ensures that the LLDD Health Category recorded in the ILR is valid in the ILR Specification
Guidance: Please ensure that the LLDD code recorded in the ILR is valid for the academic year in which the data is being submitted ensuring that there is no end date on the code.
Description: The Learners LDD and health problem must be valid in the ILR Specification for the academic year in which the data is being submitted.
DetailedDescription: The learner's LLDD and health problem must be a valid lookup (error where Learner.LLDDHealthProb <> valid lookup on ILR_LLDDHealthProb)

Name: DateOfBirth_01
ErrorMessage: The Date of birth must be returned
Intent: To ensure that a learners Date of birth has been recorded
Guidance: Ensure that the learners Date of birth has been recorded
Description: If the aim is funded by 16 - 19, Adult skills, Apprenticeships, Adult Skills Fund or Skills Bootcamp provision, the learners Date of birth must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the aim is funded by 16 - 19, Adult skills, Apprenticeships, Adult Skills Fund, or Skills Bootcamp provision ( 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 25, 82, 35, 36, 37, 38 or 81), the Date of birth must be returned)

(error where 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 is unknown)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by OLASS learning aims (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 034)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ConRefNumber_03
ErrorMessage: The Contract reference number must not be returned for this Funding model
Intent: To ensure that only valid aims have a Contract reference number returned
Guidance: Ensure that for all Community Learning, Tailored Learning, 16-19, Adult Skills, Adult Skills Fund, Other Adult, Other 16-19 or Non-funded contracts, the contract reference is not returned
Description: For Community Learning, Tailored Learning, 16-19, Adult Skills, Adult Skills Fund,  Other Adult, Other 16-19 or Non-funded contracts, the contract reference number must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
For Community Learning, Tailored Learning, 16-19, Adult Skills, Adult Skills Fund, Apprenticeships, Other Adult, Other 16-19 or Non -funded contracts (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 10,11, 25, 35, 38, 81, 82, 99), the contract reference number must not be returned 

(error where LearningDelivery.ConRefNumber is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Removed funding model 36 from the rule

Name: DateOfBirth_57
ErrorMessage: The planned duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration for an apprenticeship standard
Intent: To ensure that learners starting aims on or after 1 August 2025 who are 16 or over must have a planned duration of 242 days
Guidance: Ensure that, for aims starting on or after 1 August 2025, where the learner is 16 or over at the start of the aim, the duration between the learners start and planned end date must be 242 days
Description: For aims starting on or after 1 August 2025 apprenticeship learners who are 16 and over must have a planned duration of over 242 days between the learners start and planned end date
DetailedDescription:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2025 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate 


>= 2025-08-01), that are an apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25), and a programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType 


= 1), and if the learner is 16 or over (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

Learner.DateOfBirth


 >= 16 year),  then the planned duration of the apprenticeship must be 242 days or more

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate 


< 242 days)
Exclusions:
This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule at version 1

Name: DateOfBirth_58
ErrorMessage: The actual duration of the programme does not reach the required minimum duration for an apprenticeship standard
Intent: To ensure that learners starting aims on or after 1 August 2025 the actual duration of an apprenticeship is no less than 242 days
Guidance: Ensure that, for aims starting on or after 1 August 2025,  the actual duration between the learners start and actual end date must be a minimum 242 days
Description: For aims starting on or after 1 August 2025 apprenticeship learners who are 16 and over must have a duration of over 242 days between the learners start and actual end date
DetailedDescription:
For aims starting on or after 1 August 2025 (L

earningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-01), that are an apprenticeship standard (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36 and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType = 25


), and a programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1) and the learner has completed all learning activities (

LearningDelivery.CompStatus


 = 2), then the duration of the apprenticeship must not be less than 242 days

(error where

 LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 < 242 days)
Exclusions:
This rule is not not triggered by aims that are a restart (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for version 1

Name: PHours_08
ErrorMessage: Planned hours must not be less than 187 hours
Intent: This rule ensures that from the 1st of August 2025 the Phours field must not have a value lower than 187 recorded in accordance with the apprenticeship funding rules.
Guidance: Ensure that the value recorded in the Phours field is no less than 187
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2025, where the planned hours field has been returned, the value must not be less than 187 hours for apprenticeships.
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2025,  where the planned hours field has been returned, the value must not be less than 187 hours for apprenticeships.

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-01 
and


LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 36
and 


LearningDelivery.PHours


 < 187
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by Restarts (

LearningDelivery.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - Change to rule to include and on or prior to 31 July 2025

Name: LearnDelFAMType_131
ErrorMessage: An LDM code is required to show how this learner is funded
Intent: To ensure that aim starts on or after 1 August 2025 an LDM code is recorded to show how the Tailored learning provision is funded
Guidance: Ensure that, the relevant LDM code 399, 400 or 401 is recorded to show how the provision is funded
Description: For starts on or after the 1 August 2025 who are Tailored Learning funded an LDM code is required to show how the provision is funded
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after the 1 August 2025  (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2025-08-01) and are Tailored Learning funded  (

LearningDelivery.FundModel 


= 11) an LDM code is required to show how the learner is funded


(error where  there is no record of (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode = 399 or 400 or 401)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule at version 1

Name: LearnDelFAMDateFrom_07
ErrorMessage: The Date applies from must be within the Learning start date and the Learning actual end date
Intent: To ensure that Event indicator is returned,  and that the date applies from is  on or after the learning start date and on or before the learning actual end date of the programme aim.
Guidance: Ensure that, Event indicator is returned,  and that the date applies from is  on or after the learning start date and on or before the learning actual end date of the programme aim.
Description: If the Event Indicator has been returned, the date applies from must be on or after 1 August 2025
DetailedDescription:
If the Event Indicator (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType


 = EVI) has been returned, the date applies from must be on or after the learning start date and on or before the learning actual end date of the programme aim.

error where


LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType


 = EVI and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom


 is < 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


  or >

 LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 of 

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for Version 1

Name: LearnDelFAMDateFrom_05
ErrorMessage: The Date applies from must be returned for the Event Indicator
Intent: To ensure that date applies from is returned for the event indicators
Guidance: Ensure that, where the event indicator FAM type is returned, the 'Date applies from' is also returned
Description: If the Event Indicator FAM type is returned then the Date applies from must be returned.
DetailedDescription:
If the Event Indicator FAM type is returned (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = EVI), then the Date applies from must be returned.

(error where
there is a record of 


LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = EVI 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom


 is not returned)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for Version 1

Name: LearnDelFAMDateFrom_06
ErrorMessage: The Date applies from must not be before 1 August 2025
Intent: To ensure that Event indicator is not used before the 1st of August 2025
Guidance: Ensure that, the date applies on the event indicator is after the 1st of August 2025
Description: If the Event Indicator has been returned, the date applies from must be on or after 1 August 2025
DetailedDescription:
If the Event Indicator (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFamType


 = EVI) has been returned, the date applies from must be on or after 1 August 2025  

error where
there is a record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.Le arnDelFAMType 


= EVI and  

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMDateFrom


 is < 1 August 2025
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for Version 1

Name: LearnDelFAMType_133
ErrorMessage: The Event Indicator must be returned on the Programme aim
Intent: To ensure that the event indicator is only recorded for skills bootcamps programme aims only
Guidance: Ensure that, the Event indicator is only recorded on Skills bootcamp programme aims
Description: If the Event Indicator (EVI) has been returned, it must be on the programme aim
DetailedDescription:
If the Event Indicator (EVI) has been returned, it must be on the programme aim. 

error where
there is a record of 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType 


= EVI and 

LearningDelivery.AimType 


<> 1
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for version 1

Name: LearnDelFAMType_132
ErrorMessage: The Event Indicator is not valid for this learning aim
Intent: To ensure that the event indicator is only recorded for skills bootcamps
Guidance: Ensure that, the Event indicator is not used for any other provision other than Skills bootcamps
Description: The Event indicator must only be returned for Skills Bootcamps
DetailedDescription:
The Event indicator must only be returned for Skills Bootcamps

error where
there is a record of

 LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = EVI and 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 <> 32 or not returned
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - New rule for version 1

Name: EmpStat_01
ErrorMessage: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies prior to this Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that, where To ensure that, for certain funding models and date range, an Employment status record has been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date
Guidance: To ensure that, for adult funding models (FM = 35, 81 or 99) and aim start dates between 1 August 2012 and 31 July 2014, and the learner is over 19 at the start, an Employment status record has been returned that applies prior to the aim start date
Description: If the Learning start date is on or after 1 August 2012 and on or before 31 July 2014, and the aim is adult skills funded or non-funded (FM = 35, 81 or 99), and the learner is aged 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, there must be an employment status on or before the learning start date
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning start date is on or after 1 August 2012 and on or before 31 July 2014 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2012-08-01 and =< 2014-07-31), and the aim is adult skills funded or non-funded (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35, 81 or 99), and the learner is aged 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, there must be an employment status on or before the learning start date

(error where there is no Employment status record where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 <= 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 of the learning aim)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered by Community learning aims (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 99 and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 108), or for apprenticeships (DD07 = Y)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpStat_02
ErrorMessage: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies prior to this Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that, for certain apprenticeships and start dates, an Employment status record has been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship, with a start date on or before 31 July 2014, there must be an Employment status record with a Date that applies on or before the Programme start date
Description: If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship, and the aim is a programme aim, with a start date on or before 31 July 2014, there must be an Employment status record with a Date that applies on or before the Programme start date
DetailedDescription:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship (DD07 = Y), and the aim is a programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), with a start date on or before 31 July 2014 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < 2014-07-31), there must be an Employment status record with a Date that applies on or before the Programme start date

(error where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 > 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpStat_21
ErrorMessage: An Employment status record has not been returned that applies prior to the Learning start date
Intent: To ensure that, for Adult Skills Fund provision, learners who are 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started have an employment status recorded
Guidance: Ensure that, for Adult Skills Fund provision, where the learner is 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record has been returned
Description: For Adult Skills Fund provision, and the learner is 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record must exist
DetailedDescription:
For Adult Skills Fund provision (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38), and the learner is 19 or over on 31 August of the teaching year in which the learning started, an Employment status record must exist

(error where 

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 38 and there is no Employment status record where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 < 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 of the learning aim)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_01
ErrorMessage: The Employment status monitoring type and code is not valid
Intent: To ensure that, where returned, the Employment status monitoring type and code are valid
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the learners Employment status monitoring type and code are valid lookups
Description: If an Employment status monitoring type is returned, the Employment status monitoring code must be a valid lookup for that Employment monitoring status type
DetailedDescription:
If an Employment status monitoring type is returned (

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 is known), the Employment status monitoring code must be a valid lookup for that Employment monitoring status type

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode


 <> valid lookup on ILR_ESM_CODE)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_02
ErrorMessage: The learner's Employment status is 'in paid employment' and the Employment intensity indicator has not been returned
Intent: To ensure that, where returned, the Employment status monitoring type and code are valid for starts on or after 1 August 2012
Guidance: Ensure that, where the date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2012, and the Employment status is 'In paid employment', an Employment intensity indicator has been returned
Description: If the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2012, and the Employment status is 'In paid employment', an Employment intensity indicator must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2012 (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 => 2012-08-1), and the Employment status is 'In paid employment' (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 = 10), an Employment intensity indicator must be returned

(error where there is no Employment status record with a 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = EII for this 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 )
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_05
ErrorMessage: The learner's Employment status is 'in paid employment' and the Length of unemployment has been returned
Intent: To ensure that an Employment status of employed is not returned with ta Length of unemployment record assigned to it
Guidance: Ensure that, an employment status of employed is not returned with Length of unemployment assigned to it
Description: If the Employment status is 'In paid employment', the Length of unemployment must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Employment status is 'In paid employment' (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat 


= 10), then the Length of unemployment must not be returned

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = LOU for that Employment status record)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_07
ErrorMessage: The learner is self employed and the Employment status is not 'in paid employment'
Intent: To ensure that, where returned, a self employed learners employment status is recorded correctly
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learner is self employed, the employment status record must be 'In paid employment'
Description: If Employment status monitoring code is 'Learner is self employed, the Employment status must be 'In paid employment'
DetailedDescription:
If Employment status monitoring code is 'Learner is self employed (

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = SEI), the Employment status must be 'In paid employment'

(error where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 <> 10 for that Employment status record)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_08
ErrorMessage: The Length of unemployment has not been returned
Intent: To ensure that, where the learner is unemployed, that the length of unemployment has been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learner's employment status is 'Not in paid employment and looking for work', that the Length of unemployment has been returned
Description: If the date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2012, and the Employment status is 'Not in paid employment and looking for work', then the Length of unemployment must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2012 (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 => 2012-08-01), and the Employment status is 'Not in paid employment and looking for work' (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 = 11), then the Length of unemployment must be returned

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 <> LOU)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered for for Employment status records that apply to 16-19 non-apprenticeship funding learning aims or skills bootcamps (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 25, 82 or 37)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_09
ErrorMessage: The Length of employment has not been returned
Intent: To ensure that, where the learner is an apprentice, a complete employment status record has been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learner is an apprentice, starting on or after 1 August 2013 and are in paid employment, a Length of Employment indicator is returned
Description: If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship programme, and the Employment status record that applies to the start date of the programme aim is 'In paid employment', and the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2013, then a Length of Employment indicator must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship programme (DD07 = Y), and the Employment status record that applies to the start date of the programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1),  is 'In paid employment' (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 = 10), and the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2013 (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 => 2013-08-01), then a Length of Employment indicator must be returned

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 <> LOE for this Employment status record)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_10
ErrorMessage: The Length of employment has been returned
Intent: To ensure that, where the learner is unemployed, the Length of employment has not been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learner Employment status is 'Not in paid employment', that the Length of employment has not been returned
Description: If the Employment status is 'Not in paid employment', then the Length of employment must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Employment status is 'Not in paid employment' (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 = 11 or 12), then the Length of employment must not be returned

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


e = LOE for this Employment status record)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_11
ErrorMessage: The Length of employment has been returned
Intent: To ensure that, where the learner is unemployed, the Length of employment has not been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learner Employment status is 'Not in paid employment', that the Length of employment has not been returned
Description: If the Employment status is 'Not in paid employment', then the Length of employment must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
The Date employment status applies must not be after the 'Valid to' date for this 

ESMType


 and 

ESMCode




(error where 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 > 'Valid to' in ILR_ESMTypeCode)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_12
ErrorMessage: The Employment intensity indicator or Self employed indicator has been returned
Intent: To ensure that, where the learner is unemployed, that the Employment intensity indicator or Self employed check are not used
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learner's employment status is 'Not in paid employment', that an Employment intensity indicator or Self employed indicator is not returned
Description: If the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2013, and the Employment status is 'Not in paid employment', then an Employment intensity indicator or Self employed indicator must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Date employment status applies is on or after 1 August 2013 (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.DateEmpStatApp


 => 2013-08-01), and the Employment status is 'not in paid employment' (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpSta


 = 11 or 12), then an Employment intensity indicator or Self employed indicator must not be returned

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = EII or SEI for this Employment status record)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_15
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than one record with an ESM type of SEI, EII, LOU, LOE, BSI, PEI, or SEM
Intent: To ensure that the Employment status monitoring type SEI, EII, LOU, LOE, BSI, PEI or SEM is only used once per learner record
Guidance: Ensure that, if the learner's Employment status monitoring type is SEI, EII, LOU, LOE, BSI, PEI or SEM there is only a single occurrence of one code returned
Description: If the Employment status monitoring type is SEI, EII, LOU, LOE, BSI, PEI or SEM then there must be only one occurrence of the code
DetailedDescription:
If the Employment status monitoring type is SEI, EII, LOU, LOE, BSI, PEI or SEM then there must be only one occurrence

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = SEI, EII, LOU, LOE, BSI, PEI or SEM and occurrence > 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_16
ErrorMessage: The Small employer indicator has been returned and the Learner's Employment status is 'Not in paid employment'
Intent: To ensure that apprentices who work for a Small employer cannot be recorded as 'Not in paid employment'
Guidance: Ensure that, for apprentices where the Small employer indicator has been returned, the employment status cannot be 'Not in paid employment'
Description: If it is an apprenticeship standard and the Small employer indicator has been returned, then the employment status must not be 'Not in paid employment'
DetailedDescription:
If it is an apprenticeship standard and the Small employer indicator has been returned, then the employment status must not be 'Not in paid employment'

(error where 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 25 and 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = SEM and 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode


 = 1 and 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 = 11 or 12)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_17
ErrorMessage: The learner must be receiving work related benefits for this Learning Delivery Monitoring code to be used
Intent: To ensure that, for learners with LDM code 375 returned, who are unemployed, that the learner's Benefit Status Indicator has been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, for learners with LDM code 375 returned (sector based work academies pre-employment training) and the learner is in receipt of Job Seekers Allowance (JSA), Universal Credit or Employment and Support Allowance (all categories), the learner's Benefit Status Indicator has been returned
Description: If 'sector based work academies pre-employment training' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned, and the 'Learner is in receipt of Job Seekers Allowance (JSA)', 'Learner is in receipt of Universal Credit' or 'Learner is in receipt of Employment and Support Allowance (all categories)' Benefit Status Indicator must be returned
DetailedDescription:
If 'sector based work academies pre-employment training' learning delivery monitoring code has been returned, then the 'Learner is in receipt of Job Seekers Allowance (JSA)', 'Learner is in receipt of Universal Credit' or 'Learner is in receipt of Employment and Support Allowance (all categories)' Benefit Status Indicator must be returned

(error where 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 375 and 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = BSI and 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode


 <> 1,4, 5 or not returned)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_18
ErrorMessage: The redundancy indicator has been returned and the Learner's Employment status is 'In paid employment'
Intent: To ensure that learner's marked as 'In paid employment', cannot be also marked as 'Learner has been made redundant'
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learner's Employment status is 'In paid employment', then the Other Employment Type 'Learner has been made redundant' has not been returned
Description: If the Employment status is 'In paid employment', then the Other Employment Type 'Learner has been made redundant' must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Employment status is 'In paid employment' (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat 


= 10), then the Other Employment Type 'Learner has been made redundant' must not be returned

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = OET and 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode


 = 1 for that Employment status record)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_19
ErrorMessage: The 'Small or Medium Employer' indicator has been returned but the Learner's Employment status is 'Not in paid employment'
Intent: To ensure that, where the Other Employment Type is ' Small or Medium Employer', the learner's employment status is 'In paid employment'
Guidance: Ensure that, where the learner's Employment status is 'In paid employment', then the Other Employment Type 'Learner has been made redundant' has not been returned
Description: If the Other Employment Type is ' Small or Medium Employer' then the learner's employment status must be 'In paid employment'
DetailedDescription:
If the Other Employment Type is ' Small or Medium Employer' then the learner's employment status must be 'In paid employment'

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = OET and 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode


 =  2
AND 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 <> 10 or not returned)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: ESMType_20
ErrorMessage: There must not be more than one of the same OET codes recorded on the employment status
Intent: To ensure that there is a maximum of one occurrence Other employment type returned in the learner's Employment status record
Guidance: Ensure that, if the Other employment type has been returned, there is only one occurrence of this code in the learner's Employment status record
Description: If the Other Employment Type has been returned there must not be more than one occurrence of the same code for the employment status record
DetailedDescription:
If the Other Employment Type has been returned there must not be more than one occurrence of the same code for the employment status record

(error where 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMType


 = OET and 

EmploymentStatusMonitoring.ESMCode


 and occurrence of the same 

ESMcode


 > 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpId_10
ErrorMessage: The Employer identifier has not been returned
Intent: To ensure that, for an apprenticeship programme, a valid Employer ID has been returned in the learner's Employment status record that applies on the programme start date
Guidance: Ensure that, where a learner is undertaking an apprenticeship programme, and is 'in paid employment' on the programme start date, there is an Employer identifier that applies to the programme start date
Description: If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship programme, and the aim is a programme aim, and is 'in paid employment' on the programme start date, then there must be an Employer identifier that applies to the programme start date
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Employer identifier (

LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId


 is known) must either be the default number or be a valid lookup on the EDS system 
If the learner is undertaking an apprenticeship programme (DD07 = Y), and the aim is a programme aim (

LearningDelivery.AimType


 = 1), and is 'in paid employment' (

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 = 10)on the programme start date, then there must be an Employer identifier that applies to the programme start date

(error where 

LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EmpId_14
ErrorMessage: The Employer Identifier has been returned and the Learner's Employment status is 'Not in paid employment'
Intent: To ensure that, for an apprenticeship programme where the learner is recorded as 'Not in paid employment', an Employer ID has not been returned in the learner's Employment status record
Guidance: Ensure that, where the record is an apprenticeship and the employment status is 'Not in paid employment', the Employer ID has not been returned
Description: If the record is an apprenticeship and the employment status is 'Not in paid employment' then the Employer Identifier must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If it is an apprenticeship and the employment status is 'Not in paid employment' then the Employer Identifier must not be returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.ProgType


 = 2,3,20,21,22,23,25 and 

LearnerEmploymentStatus.EmpStat


 = 11 or 12 and 

LearningEmploymentStatus.EmpId


 has been returned)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AddHours_01
ErrorMessage: The Additional delivery hours must not be returned for learning aims that started prior to 1 August 2015
Intent: To ensure that only valid aims have Additional delivery hours recorded against them
Guidance: Ensure that Additional delivery hours are only recorded for Adult Skills, Apprenticeships or Other Adult learning aims, where the aim start is on or after 1 August 2015
Description: The Additional delivery hours must only be recorded for Adult Skills, Apprenticeships or Other Adult learning aims, with a Learning start date on or after 1 August 2015
DetailedDescription:
The Additional delivery hours must only be recorded for Adult Skills, Apprenticeships or Other Adult learning aims (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 35, 36, 38 or 81), with a Learning start date on or after 1 August 2015 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.AddHours


 is known and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < 2015-08-01)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AddHours_02
ErrorMessage: The Additional delivery hours must not be returned for EFA, Community Learning or Non-funded provision
Intent: To ensure that only valid aims have Additional delivery hours recorded against them
Guidance: Ensure that for Community Learning, 16-19, Other 16-19, Skills Bootcamps or Non-funded provision, the Additional delivery hours field is not completed 5
Description: For Community Learning, 16-19, Other 16-19, Skills Bootcamps or Non-funded provision, the Additional delivery hours must not be recorded
DetailedDescription:
For Community Learning, 16-19, Other 16-19, Skills Bootcamps or Non-funded provision (

LearningDelivery.FundModel


 = 25, 82, 10, 37 or 99), the Additional delivery hours must not be recorded 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.AddHours


 is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AddHours_03
ErrorMessage: The Additional delivery hours must only be returned for ESOL qualification or unit aims
Intent: To ensure that only valid aims have Additional delivery hours recorded against them
Guidance: Ensure that where the Additional delivery hours have been returned, the aim is an ESOL qualification or unit aim
Description: Where the Additional delivery hours have been returned, they must only be recorded for ESOL qualification or unit aims
DetailedDescription:
Where the Additional delivery hours have been returned (

LearningDelivery.AddHours


 is known), they must only be recorded for ESOL qualification or unit aims

(error where LARS_BasicSkillsType_Lookup <> 36, 37, 38, 39, 40, 41, or 42 (where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => LARS_EffectiveFrom (and =< LARS_EffectiveTo or LARS_EffectiveTo = null))
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AddHours_04
ErrorMessage: The Additional delivery hours must not exceed 24 hours in a day
Intent: To ensure that only valid aims have Additional delivery hours recorded against them
Guidance: Ensure that where the Additional hours are greater than 60, the average number of additional hours per day over the aim planned duration must not be greater than 24
Description: If the Additional delivery hours are greater than 60, then the average number of additional hours per day must not be greater than 24
DetailedDescription:
If the Additional delivery hours are greater than 60, then the average number of additional hours per day must not be greater than 24

(error where 

LearningDelivery.AddHours


 > 60 and 

LearningDelivery.AddHours


 / (

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 + 1) NOT<= 24)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AddHours_05
ErrorMessage: The Additional delivery hours should not exceed 35 hours in a week
Intent: To ensure that only valid aims have Additional delivery hours recorded against them
Guidance: Ensure that where the Additional hours are greater than 60,  then the average number of additional hours per week over the planned duration is not greater than 35
Description: If the Additional delivery hours are greater than 60, then the average number of additional hours per week should not be greater than 35
DetailedDescription:
If the Additional delivery hours are greater than 60, then the average number of additional hours per week should not be greater than 35

(error where 

LearningDelivery.AddHours


 > 60 and 

LearningDelivery.AddHours


 / (

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 + 1) / 7)) NOT <= 35)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: AddHours_06
ErrorMessage: The Additional delivery hours divided by the number of days of study is not greater than 9 and less than 24
Intent: To ensure that only valid aims have Additional delivery hours recorded against them
Guidance: Ensure that where the Additional hours are returned,  the average number of Additional delivery hours per day is greater not than 9 and less than 24
Description: The average number of Additional delivery hours per day should be not greater than 9 and less than 24
DetailedDescription:
The average number of Additional delivery hours per day should not be greater than 9 and less than 24 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.AddHours


 / (

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 + 1) > 9 AND 

LearningDelivery.AddHours


 / (

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


 - 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 + 1) < 24)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: OutGrade_01
ErrorMessage: The Outcome grade is not a valid code
Intent: To ensure that a valid aim Outcome grade is returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if returned, the aim Outcome grade must be a valid lookup in Appendix Q
Description: If returned, the Outcome grade must be a valid lookup in Appendix Q
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Outcome grade (

LearningDelivery.OutGrade


 is known) must be a valid lookup in Appendix Q

(error where 

LearningDelivery.OutGrade


 <> a valid lookup on ILR_OutGrade)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: OutGrade_04
ErrorMessage: The Outcome grade must not be returned for this Outcome
Intent: To ensure that a valid aim Outcome code and grade are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, if the aim Outcome is 'Learning activities are complete but the outcome is not yet known' (Outcome code = 8), the Outcome grade is not returned
Description: If the Outcome is 'Learning activities are complete but the outcome is not yet known' or is not returned, then the Outcome grade must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Outcome is 'Learning activities are complete but the outcome is not yet known' or is not returned (

LearningDelivery.Outcome


 = 8 or unknown), then the Outcome grade must not be returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.OutGrade


 is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: OutGrade_05
ErrorMessage: The Outcome grade is not valid for this Outcome
Intent: To ensure that a valid aim Outcome code and grade are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where the aim Outcome grade is  'FL', 'U', 'N', 'X' or 'Y', the Outcome is not 'Achieved'
Description: If the Outcome grade is  'FL', 'U', 'N', 'X' or 'Y' the Outcome must not be 'Achieved'
DetailedDescription:
If the Outcome grade is  'FL', 'U', 'N', 'X' or 'Y' (

LearningDelivery.OutGrade


 = FL, U, N, X or Y)  the Outcome must not be 'Achieved' 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.Outcome


 = 1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: OutGrade_06
ErrorMessage: The Outcome grade is not valid for this Outcome
Intent: To ensure that a valid aim Outcome code and grade are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where the Outcome is 'No achievement', the Outcome grade is 'FL', 'U', 'N', 'X' or 'Y' or not returned
Description: If the Outcome is 'No achievement', the Outcome grade must be 'FL', 'U', 'N', 'X' or 'Y' or not returned
DetailedDescription:
If the Outcome is 'No achievement' (

LearningDelivery.Outcome


 = 3) the Outcome grade must be 'FL', 'U', 'N', 'X' or 'Y' or not returned

(error where 

LearningDelivery.OutGrade


 <> FL, U, N, X, Y or unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: OutGrade_07
ErrorMessage: The Outcome grade is not valid for this type of qualification
Intent: To ensure that a valid aim Outcome code and grade are returned
Guidance: Ensure that, for GCSE, A-level, AS-level or A2 level, where the Learning actual end date is on or after 1 August 2014 and the Outcome is 'Achieved', the Outcome grade (where it has been returned) is a valid grade for that qualification
Description: If the Learning actual end date is on or after 1 August 2014, and the Outcome is 'Achieved', and the aim is a GCSE, A-level, AS-level or A2 level,  and the Outcome grade has been returned, then it must be a valid grade for that qualification
DetailedDescription:
If the Learning actual end date is on or after 1 August 2014 (

LearningDelivery.LearnActEndDate


 >= 2014-08-01), and the Outcome is 'Achieved' (

LearningDelivery.Outcome


 = 1), and the aim is a GCSE, A-level, AS-level or A2 level ((where 

LearningDelivery.LearnAimRef


 = LARS_LearnAimRef) and the LARS_LearnAimRefType = 0001, 0002, 0003, 1413, 1422, 1430, 1433, 1434, 1435, 1453 or 2999),  and the Outcome grade has been returned (

LearningDelivery.OutGrade


 is known), then it must be a valid grade for that qualification

(error where 

LearningDelivery.OutGrade


 does not match the associated valid Grade for the LearnAimRef type in AppendixQ.Annex1)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: DD13
ErrorMessage: N/A
Intent: This shows the Derived data criteria for the Latest Learning actual end date of the apprenticeship framework programme
Description: Latest Learning actual end date of the apprenticeship framework programme
DetailedDescription: Latest Learning actual end date of the apprenticeship framework programme (held at aim level, calculated from matching programme aims)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LSDPostcode_02
ErrorMessage: The learning aim start date postcode is not valid on the start date of the learning aim and the source of funding
Intent: To ensure that only valid postcodes are used for adult skills or Community Learning funded aims
Guidance: Ensure that, for starts on or after 1 August 2019 and before 1 August 2021, that are adult skills or Community Learning funded (and are not programme components, Restarts, Postcode exclusions, OLASS learners or postcode ZZ99 9ZZ) the Learning start date postcode is valid on the learning aim start date for the Source of funding listed
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2019 and before 1 August 2021, that are adult skills or Community Learning funded, the Learning start date postcode must be valid on the learning aim start date for the Source of funding listed
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2019 and before 1 August 2021 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2019-08-01 and 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < 2021-08-01), are adult skills or Community Learning funded (

LearningDelivery.Fundmodel


 = 35 or 

LearningDelivery.Fundmodel


 = 10), the Learning start date postcode (

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


) must be valid on the learning aim start date (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


) for the Source of funding listed

(error where DD35 = Y and 

LSDPostcode


 does not exist in the Postcodes.AEBPostcodes or (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 for the 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF) <> Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding) for the 

LSDPostcode


 or 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveFrom date for the 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 where ((

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 for the 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding) or 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveTo date for the 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 where ((

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 for the 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered where the Programme Type has been returned (ProgType is known) and Providers with an organisation type of Long term Residential College (

LearningProvider.UKPRN


 = Org_Details.UKPRN and LongTermResid = 1), Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES), Postcode exclusions (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 001)
OLASS learning aims (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = LDM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 034) 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 = ZZ99 9ZZ
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LSDPostcode_03
ErrorMessage: The Learning start date postcode is not in the correct format
Intent: To ensure that the Learning start date postcode is in the correct format
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Learning start date postcode conforms to the valid postcode format (the first part should be 1 or 2 numbers or 1 number and a capital letter, and the second part should be nXX - where n = 0-9 and XX are capital letters excluding C, I, K, M, O and V)
Description: If returned the Learning start date postcode must conform to the valid postcode format
DetailedDescription:
If returned the Learning start date postcode must conform to the valid postcode format

(error where The first part of the 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 <> valid format of 1 or 2 capital letters followed by (1 or 2 numbers or 1 number and a capital letter) and the second part of the 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 <> valid format of (nXX) where n = 0-9 and XX are capital letters excluding C, I, K, M, O and V)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LSDPostcode_04
ErrorMessage: The learning aim start date postcode is not valid on the start date of the learning aim and the source of funding
Intent: To ensure that only valid postcodes are used for adult skills or Community Learning funded aims
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2021 and on or prior to 31 July 2024, are adult skills or Community Learning funded, the Learning start date postcode must be valid on the learning aim start date for the Source of funding listed
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2021 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 => 2021-08-01) and on or prior to 31 July 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 <= 2024-07-31), are adult skills or Community Learning funded (

LearningDelivery.Fundmodel


 = 35 or 

LearningDelivery.Fundmodel


 = 10), the Learning start date postcode (

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


) must be valid on the learning aim start date (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


) for the Source of funding listed

(error where LSDPostcode does not exist in the Postcodes.AEBPostcodes or (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 for the 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF) <> Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding) for the LSDPostcode or 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveFrom date for the 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 where ((

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 for the 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding) or 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveTo date for the 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 where ((

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 for the 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding))
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered for Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES) and Postcode exclusions (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 001) and 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 = ZZ99 9ZZ)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LSDPostcode_05
ErrorMessage: The Learning start date postcode is not valid
Intent: To ensure that only valid postcodes are used for Adult skills funded or Tailored learning funded aims
Guidance: Ensure that, for starts on or after 1 August 2024, that are adult skills or Community Learning funded, the Learning start date postcode is valid on the list of complete UK postcodes table
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2024, are Adult Skills Fund or Tailored Learning funded, the Learning start date postcode must be returned and be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01), are Adult Skills Fund or Tailored Learning funded (

LearningDelivery.Fundmodel


 = 38 or 

LearningDelivery.Fundmodel


 = 11), the Learning start date postcode (

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


) must be returned and be a valid postcode on the list of complete UK postcodes table

(error where 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 <> (a valid lookup on Postcodes.PostcodeValidity)
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered where 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 = ZZ99 9ZZ or are  programme component aims (

LearningDelivery.Aimtype


 = 3)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: LSDPostcode_06
ErrorMessage: The learning aim start date postcode is not valid on the start date of the learning aim and the source of funding
Intent: To ensure that only valid postcodes are used for Adult skills funded or Tailored learning funded aims
Guidance: Ensure that, for starts on or after 1 August 2024 that are Adult Skills Fund or Tailored Learning funded, the Learning start date postcode is valid on the learning aim start date for the Source of funding listed
Description: For starts on or after 1 August 2024, that are Adult Skills Fund or Tailored Learning funded, the Learning start date postcode must be valid on the learning aim start date for the Source of funding listed
DetailedDescription:
For starts on or after 1 August 2024 (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 >= 2024-08-01), are Adult Skills Fund or Tailored Learning funded (

LearningDelivery.Fundmodel


 = 38 or 

LearningDelivery.Fundmodel


 = 11), the Learning start date postcode (

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


) must be valid on the learning aim start date (

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


) for the Source of funding listed


(error where 

LSDPostcode


 does not exist in the Postcodes.AEBPostcodes or ((

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 for the 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF) <> Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding) for the LSDPostcode or 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 < Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveFrom date for the 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 where ((

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 for the 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding) or 

LearningDelivery.LearnStartDate


 > Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.EffectiveTo date for the 

LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 where ((

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 for the 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = SOF) = Postcodes.AEBPostcodes.SourceOfFunding))
Exclusions:
This rule is not triggered for Restarts (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = RES), Postcode exclusions (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 = DAM and 

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMCode


 = 001) or where


LearningDelivery.LSDPostcode


 = ZZ99 9ZZ
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: PriorLearnFundAdj_01
ErrorMessage: The Funding adjustment for prior learning must not be returned
Intent: To ensure that only valid aims have a Funding adjustment for prior learning returned
Guidance: Ensure that for Community Learning, 16-19, Other 16-19 or Non Funded provision (that are not Advanced Learner Loans), the Funding adjustment for prior learning is not returned
Description: For Community Learning, 16-19, Other 16-19 or Non Funded provision, and are not Advance Learner Loans, the Funding adjustment for prior learning must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
For Community Learning, 16-19, Other 16-19 or Non Funded provision (

LearningDelivery.FundMode


l = 25, 82, 10 or 99), and are not Advance Learner Loans (

LearningDeliveryFAM.LearnDelFAMType


 <> ADL), the Funding adjustment for prior learning must not be returned 

(error where 

LearningDelivery.PriorLearnFundAdj


 is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: OtherFundAdj_01
ErrorMessage: The Other funding adjustment must not be returned for this Funding model
Intent: This rule ensures that the other funding adjustment is not used for Community learning or 16-19 funded provision
Guidance: Ensure that the other funding adjustment field is not returned
Description: For Community Learning, 16-19 or Other 16-19, the Other funding adjustment field must not be returned
DetailedDescription:
For Community Learning, 16-19 or Other 16-19 (LearningDelivery.FundModel = 25, 82 or 10), the Other funding adjustment field must not be returned 

(error where LearningDelivery.OtherFundAdj is known)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EPAOrgID_01
ErrorMessage: The end point assessment organisation is not valid for this standard on this planned end date
Intent: To ensure that the end point assessment organisation is valid for the standard on the programme planned end date
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the 'End point assessment organisation' is valid on the planned end date of the apprenticeship standard being delivered
Description: If returned, the 'End point assessment organisation' must be valid for the standard being delivered on the planned end date of the apprenticeship
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the 'End point assessment organisation' (

Learning.Delivery.EPAOrgID


) must be valid for the standard being delivered on the planned end date of the apprenticeship 

(error where 

Learning.Delivery.EPAOrgID


 <> a valid lookup  (EPAReferenceData Organisation table) on 

LearningDelivery.LearnPlanEndDate


 for 

LearningDelivery.StdCode


)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EPAOrgID_02
ErrorMessage: The End point assessment organisation payment record has been returned but there is no record of the End point assessment organisation
Intent: To ensure that the end point assessment organisation ID is recorded where an end point assessment price has been returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where an end point assessment price has been returned, an end point organisation ID is also returned
Description: If an end point assessment price record has been returned, there must be an End Point assessment organisation
DetailedDescription:
If an end point assessment price record has been returned (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode


 = 2 or 4), there must be an End Point assessment organisation

(error where 

Learning.Delivery.EPAOrgID


 is unknown)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: EPAOrgID_03
ErrorMessage: The End point assessment organisation has been returned but there is no record of the associated financial record
Intent: To ensure that, where an end point assessment organisation has been returned, there is also an associated financial record returned
Guidance: Ensure that, where an end point assessment organisation ID has been returned, an end point assessment price is also returned
Description: If the End point assessment organisation has been returned, there must be an associated price record
DetailedDescription:
If the End point assessment organisation has been returned (

Learning.Delivery.EPAOrgID


 is known) there must be an associated price record

(error where there is no record where (

AppFinRecord.AFinType


 = TNP and 

AppFinRecord.AFinCode


 = 2 or 4)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year

Name: SWSupAimId_01
ErrorMessage: The Software supplier aim identifier is not in the correct format
Intent: To ensure that the Software supplier aim identifier is in the correct format
Guidance: Ensure that, where returned, the Software supplier aim identifier adheres to the UUID standard
Description: If returned, the Software supplier aim identifier should adhere to the UUID standard
DetailedDescription:
If returned, the Software supplier aim identifier (

LearningDelivery.SWSupAimId


 is known) should adhere to the UUID standard

(error where 

LearningDelivery.SWSupAimId


 <> valid UUID)
ChangeSummary: Version 1 - The rule has been rolled over from the previous year
